name: Uzumaki Naruto
description: A Genin from Team 7, Naruto is an orphan with the goal to one day become Hokage. Using his signature move, Shadow Clones, Naruto is able to perform powerful moves such as the Uzumaki Naruto Combo and the Rasengan.

skills.name: Uzumaki Naruto Combo
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. During 'Shadow Clones' this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Overwhelming Chakra Wave
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto will gain 1 random energy after 1 turn. For 1 turn 'Uzumaki Naruto Combo' and 'Rasengan' will be unable to be used.

skills.name: Shadow Clones
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. For 3 turns 'Uzumaki Naruto Combo' will deal 10 additional damage and this skill will be replaced by 'Rasengan'.

skills.name: Sexy Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rasengan
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto deals 45 damage to one enemy and stuns their skills for 1 turn.

name: Haruno Sakura
description: A Genin from Team 7, Sakura is very intelligent, but self-conscious about herself. Having just recently received training from Tsunade, Sakura is now able to deliver powerful punches and heal her own allies.

skills.name: KO Punch
skills.description: Haruno Sakura deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. During 'Inner Sakura', 'KO Punch' deals 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Cure
skills.description: Haruno Sakura heals herself or an ally for 25 health.

skills.name: Inner Sakura
skills.description: For 4 turns, Haruno Sakura will gain 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all enemy stun effects. During this time 'KO Punch' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Sakura Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Haruno Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Sasuke
description: A Genin from Team 7, Sasuke is the lone survivor of the Uchiha clan and has sworn vengeance against his brother. Using his sharingan, Sasuke is able to anticipate incoming attacks and is capable of advanced offensive moves.

skills.name: Lion Combo
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke deals 35 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 10 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.

skills.name: Chidori
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 25 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.

skills.name: Sharingan
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke targets one enemy. For 3 turns, Uchiha Sasuke will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill will end if Uchiha Sasuke dies.

skills.name: Swift Block
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuka Kiba
description: A Genin from Team 8, Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, and is both short-tempered and impulsive. Using his dog, Akamaru, Kiba is capable of powerful taijutsu or fusing with Akamaru to become a deadly double headed dog.

skills.name: Garouga
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Double Headed Wolf' this skill costs 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Double Headed Wolf
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. For 3 turns, 'Garouga' will cost 1 random energy less.* During this time, Inuzuka Kiba gains 15 points of damage reduction.*

skills.name: Dynamic Marking
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba targets one enemy, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. During this time, 'Garouga' and 'Double Headed Wolf' will deal 5 additional damage to them. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Shino
description: A Genin from Team 8, Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, and a very reserved and tactical fighter. Using the bugs that live inside his body, Shino is able to leech the chakra off his enemies, or protect his entire team.

skills.name: Chakra Leach
skills.description: Aburame Shino deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Female Bug
skills.description: Aburame Shino targets one enemy. For 3 turns, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 5. During this time, 'Chakra Leach' will deal 5 additional damage to them. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Bug Wall
skills.description: Aburame Shino grants his team 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Shino Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hinata
description: A Genin from Team 8, Hinata is the next in line in the Hyuuga clan, but she is shy and very withdrawn. Using the trademark Byakugan of the Hyuuga, Hinata is able to delicately target an enemy's Chakra Points while defending the team.

skills.name: Hinata Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hyuuga Hinata deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. If used during 'Byakugan', this skill will also remove 1 random energy each turn.

skills.name: Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Hyuuga Hinata deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies and grants her team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. If used during 'Byakugan', this skill will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Byakugan
skills.description: Hyuuga Hinata gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, 'Hinata Gentle Fist' and 'Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms' will be improved.

skills.name: Hinata Block
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nara Shikamaru
description: A Genin from Team 10, a member of the Nara clan, Shikamaru is considered to be the smartest Genin of all the Konoha 11. Using his bloodline, Shikamaru can manipulate the shadows in the battlefield to disable and attack his enemies.

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru targets one enemy for 5 turns. During this time 'Shadow-Neck Bind' and 'Shadow Imitation' will be improved on them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

skills.name: Shadow-Neck Bind
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru makes all enemies unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable* and deals 15 damage to them for 1 turn. This skill lasts 1 additional turn on enemies affected by 'Meditate'.

skills.name: Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru stuns all enemies' physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill lasts 1 additional turn on enemies affected by 'Meditate'.

skills.name: Shikamaru Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akimichi Chouji
description: A Genin from Team 10, Chouji is a member of the Akimichi clan, a large eater, and a close friend to his allies. While innately strong, Chouji is able to sacrifice his own life using special pills from his clan to become insanely powerful.

skills.name: Partial Double Size
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji deals 20 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Meat Tank
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns and becomes invulnerable for 2 turns*.

skills.name: Akimichi Pills
skills.description: For the rest of the game, 'Partial Double Size' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Meat Tank' will deal 10 additional damage. Akimichi Chouji takes 20 affliction damage.* This skill can only be used three times.

skills.name: Effortless Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yamanaka Ino
description: A Genin from Team 10, Ino is a member of the Yamanaka clan, and a very confident and vain girl. Ino is able to use a variety of abilities to take over and control her enemies, making it difficult to tell friend from foe.

skills.name: Mind Body Disturbance
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. One random enemy will take 30 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino targets one enemy for 4 turns, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and stunning their skills. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Art of the Valentine'.

skills.name: Chakra Hair Strand Trap
skills.description: For 1 turn, if one target enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will have the cooldowns of their skills increased by 1 for 2 turns. This skill is invisible until triggered.

skills.name: Ino Block
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Art of the Valentine
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino deals 25 damage to one enemy.

name: Rock Lee
description: A member of team Gai; Lee is a genin with no talent at all in ninjutsu or genjutsu, so he has focused his life all on taijutsu. With his powerful hand to hand techniques, Lee can crush any defense with his immense power.

skills.name: High Speed Taijutsu
skills.description: Rock Lee deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns and takes 10 affliction damage*. The following 3 turns, Rock Lee will gain 10 points of damage reduction** and that enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Front Lotus'**. This skill stacks and will deal 15 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.

skills.name: Front Lotus
skills.description: Rock Lee deals 30 damage to one enemy, takes 10 affliction damage* and gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks. This skill deals 30 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.

skills.name: Fifth Gate Opening
skills.description: Rock Lee removes all harmful effects on him, losing 30 health*, and then becoming invulnerable to all harmful skills for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Final Lotus'. The affliction damage dealt by this skill cannot be ignored and cannot kill Rock Lee. This skill can only be used if Rock Lee has 80 or less health.

skills.name: Lee Block
skills.description: This skill makes Rock Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Final Lotus
skills.description: Rock Lee deals 100 damage to one enemy.

name: Tenten
description: A member of team Gai, Tenten is a tomboyish weapon specialist who believes a kunoichi can be as strong as a male ninja. In battle, Tenten surrounds the battlefield in weapons, using them for damage and for disabling her opponents.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Tenten deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all others. All enemies will take 10 additional damage from 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' and will have their physical and energy damage lowered by 10 additional points from it.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Trap
skills.description: Tenten deals 5 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their physical and energy damage will be lowered by 5. All stacks of 'Twin Rising Dragons' will be removed from all targets afterwards.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Full Release
skills.description: Tenten becomes invulnerable to non-strategic skills for 1 turn and improves her harmful skills until the next time she uses one; this doesn't stack. 'Twin Rising Dragons' will apply its non-damage effect twice and the damage reduction effect of 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Spiked Boulder Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Tenten invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Neji
description: A member of team Gai; Neji is the most talented member of the Hyuuga clan in both mind and body. Neji can use the most powerful techniques of his clan, shutting down an enemy's chakra or defending with an absolute defense.

skills.name: Neji Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, this enemy's non-affliction damage will be lowered by 5.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji deals 10 damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji deals 40 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Byakugan Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Gaara
description: A Jinchuuriki from the Village of Sand, Gaara is an unstable ninja with the Shukaku, the one-tailed beast. With the Shukaku, and his own abilities, Gaara can manipulate the sand in his gourd to crush the enemy, or defend himself.

skills.name: Sand Coffin
skills.description: Gaara stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Sand Burial'.

skills.name: Sand Clone
skills.description: Until the next time Gaara receives new non-affliction damage, he will ignore all enemy stun effects. This skill cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Armor of Sand
skills.description: Gaara gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill cannot stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Shield of Sand
skills.description: This skill makes Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sand Burial
skills.description: Gaara kills one enemy. This skill requires 'Sand Coffin' to be active on this enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Kankuro
description: The brother of Gaara, and a master puppeeter, Kankuro is one of the three sand siblings. With his puppets, Kankuro is able to use the varied abilities hidden inside them to attack his enemies, or even protect himself.

skills.name: Black Secret Machine One Shot
skills.description: Kankuro deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Poison Bomb'.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: Kankuro deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, these enemies will take 5 additional damage from 'Black Secret Machine One Shot'.

skills.name: Puppet Preparation
skills.description: Kankuro gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. For 4 turns, 'Black Secret Machine One Shot' and 'Poison Bomb' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Puppet Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Kankuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Temari
description: The elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro, Temari is a somewhat cruel and blunt ninja that fights using the wind at her side. With her fan, Temari can create powerful gusts of wind that she can manipulate at her desite.

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind
skills.description: Temari deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Temari will be invulnerable to non-mental skills.

skills.name: Summoning: Quick Beheading Dance
skills.description: Temari deals 35 piercing damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Dust Wind
skills.description: Temari makes her team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 20 less damage.

skills.name: Backflip
skills.description: This skill makes Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kinuta Dosu
description: One of the three sound genin, and possibly the strongest; Dosu is an intelligent and patient ninja that likes to act with logic. Using a powerful sound based arm, Dosu can disable his enemies by disrupting their hearing and throwing them off.

skills.name: Resonating Echo Drill
skills.description: Kinuta Dosu deals 20 damage to one enemy. This enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. The following turn, 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage to them.

skills.name: Sound Manipulation
skills.description: Kinuta Dosu deals 10 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage with non-affliction skills. During 'Melody Arm Tuning', this skill's non-damage effects will last permanently instead and may stack.

skills.name: Melody Arm Tuning
skills.description: For the following 4 turns, 'Resonating Echo Drill' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Agile Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Kinuta Dosu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tsuchi Kin
description: One of the three sound genin; Kin is a confident ninja that likes to toy with her enemies before finishing them off. Using a set of needles and bells, Kin has a number of different effects she can create to attack her enemies.

skills.name: Illusion Bell Needles
skills.description: One enemy takes 15 damage. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells', that enemy will take 25 additional damage. If used one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap', Tsuchi Kin will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Needle and Bell Trap
skills.description: One enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells', that enemy will also be stunned for 1 turn. If used one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles', that enemy will also take 10 damage.

skills.name: Unnerving Bells
skills.description: One enemy loses 1 random energy. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap', that enemy will also take 10 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. If used one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles', that enemy will also take 10 additional damage from energy skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sharp Analysis
skills.description: This skill makes Tsuchi Kin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Abumi Zaku
description: One of the three sound genin; Zaku is a willful individual who has a very strong desire to win and succeed. Using the implanted tubes in his arm, Zaku can create powerful waves of chakra, or alter the wind ever so gently to protect an ally.

skills.name: Decapitating Airwaves
skills.description: Abumi Zaku deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Extreme Decapitating Airwaves' may be used.

skills.name: Wall of Air
skills.description: Abumi Zaku targets one ally. The following turn, the first non-strategic skill used on this ally will be countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Extreme Decapitating Airwaves
skills.description: Abumi Zaku deals 45 damage to all enemies. This skill requires 'Decapitating Airwaves' to be used in the previous turn.

skills.name: Airwave Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Abumi Zaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Young Kakashi
description: A jounin at the age of 13 and the son of the legendary White Fang, Kakashi is a member of Team Minato. Using his early ninjutsu, and borrowed sharingan, Kakashi can fight any adult on an equal level.

skills.name: White Fang Slash
skills.description: Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Amateur Raikiri
skills.description: Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Implanted Sharingan
skills.description: For 2 turns, if one enemy uses a new skill that removes/steals/gains energy, Young Kakashi will gain 1 random energy. If they use a skill that stuns, Young Kakashi's skills will stun for 1 turn. If they use a skill that damages, Young Kakashi's skills will deal 10 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and ends when triggered.

skills.name: Sword Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Young Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Obito
description: A minor member of the Uchiha clan and a chuunin, Obito is a member of Team Minato. While Obito does not possess any singular powerful ability, he can use all of what he knows with his developing sharingan to put up a fight.

skills.name: Piercing Stab
skills.description: Uchiha Obito deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Obito Great Fireball
skills.description: Uchiha Obito deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal 30 affliction damage instantly and have no cooldown.

skills.name: Obito Sharingan
skills.description: Uchiha Obito targets one ally. For 4 turns, Uchiha Obito will gain 15 points of damage reduction. If Uchiha Obito dies, that ally will gain 5 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage permanently. This skill becomes 'Sharingan-Enhanced Parry' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Obito Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Obito invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sharingan-Enhanced Parry
skills.description: Uchiha Obito makes his allies invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nohara Rin
description: A chuunin medical nin assigned to Team Minato, Rin is a quiet and passive girl who focuses on keeping her team mates alive. Using her healing abilities, and her intelligence, Rin is able to heal her allies while trapping her enemies.

skills.name: Pit Trap
skills.description: For 1 turn, Nohara Rin will gain 15 points of damage reduction and one target enemy will take 15 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability at the end of their turn. If that enemy uses a new skill, they will also take another 15 damage from this skill. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability. This skill's damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Nohara Rin.

skills.name: Rin Mystical Palm Healing
skills.description: Nohara Rin heals herself or an ally for 25 health and removes all enemy affliction skills on this character.

skills.name: Medical Kit
skills.description: Nohara Rin targets herself or an ally. For 3 turns, that character will be healed for 10 health each turn. During this time, any healing skills used by the target will heal 10 additional health and they will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills.

skills.name: Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Nohara Rin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hanabi
description: The younger sister of Hinata, Hanabi is a Hyuuga clan member who trains endlessly to prove herself. Hanabi's skills surpass her elder sister's, and while lacking in strength, Hanabi makes up for it with her tenacity and speed.

skills.name: Hanabi Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hyuuga Hanabi deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, everytime this enemy uses a new energy removal, drain or gain skill, they will lose 1 random energy.*

skills.name: Hanabi Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hyuuga Hanabi deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, everytime this enemy uses a skill with a non-conditional stun effect, they will be stunned for 1 turn.*

skills.name: Unyielding Tenacity
skills.description: For 2 turns, Hyuuga Hanabi will be unable to be killed and will ignore all enemy stun effects. During this time, 'Hanabi Gentle Fist' and 'Hanabi Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven' will cost 1 random energy instead and Hyuuga Hanabi will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Hanabi Byakugan
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hanabi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Drunken Lee
description: Having accidentally drank sake, Lee's hidden Drunken Fist powers have awakened, completely changing his fighting style. While drunk, Lee attacks randomly, but is harder to stop the more he keeps fighting.

skills.name: Unpredictable Assault
skills.description: Drunken Lee deals 20 damage to one random enemy. This skill cannot be countered. Each time this skill is used, it will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Drunken Counter
skills.description: Drunken Lee targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first harmful non-strategic skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will have 'Unpredictable Assault' applied on them. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Drunken Fist
skills.description: Drunken Lee deals 15 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, Drunken Lee will ignore all enemy stun effects, and 'Unpredictable Assault' will become targetable while dealing 5 additional damage.*

skills.name: Drunken Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Drunken Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rehabilitated Gaara
description: After his fateful encounter with Naruto, Gaara has left behind his murderous ways, and has instead rehabilitated. Gaara has honed his abilities to shape and craft his sand, allowing him to create giant waves of sand or quicksand traps.

skills.name: Sand Mastery
skills.description: Rehabilitated Gaara deals 15 damage to one enemy for 3 turns and gains 35 points of permanent destructible defense.* This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Prison Sand Burial
skills.description: For 1 turn, all enemies' non-strategic skills will have their costs increased by 1 random energy. This skill will end on them if they use a new non-strategic skill. Afterwards, this skill will be replaced by 'Desert Imperial Funeral' for 1 turn.

skills.name: Quicksand Waterfall Flow
skills.description: Rehabilitated Gaara deals 15 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time, all destructible defense skills that the enemy team uses will grant 10 less destructible defense, and all destructible defense skills Rehabilitated Gaara's team uses will grant 10 additional destructible defense.*

skills.name: Shield of Shukaku
skills.description: This skill makes Rehabilitated Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desert Imperial Funeral
skills.description: Rehabilitated Gaara targets all enemies affected by 'Prison Sand Burial', destroying their destructible defense then dealing 40 piercing damage to them.

name: Oboro
description: A Rain Genin in the Chuunin exams, Oboro is vindictive ninja that specializes in genjutsu. Using the various illusions that Oboro creates, he is able to hide his true self while attacking from below.

skills.name: Exploding Kunai
skills.description: Oboro deals 15 damage to all enemies and reduces their damage by 5 for 1 turn. During 'Haze Clone', this skill will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Earth Swim
skills.description: Oboro deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and affliction skills for 1 turn. During 'Haze Clone', this skill will target all enemies and will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Haze Clone
skills.description: For 2 turns, 'Exploding Kunai' will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage and 'Earth Swim' will target all enemies and will cost 1 less random energy. During this time, Oboro will become invulnerable to non-strategic skills.

skills.name: Oboro Hiding Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Oboro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shigure
description: A genin from the village of rain, Shigure is a strong, but arrogant ninja. Using a number of Umbrellas, Shigure is able to attack all enemies with sharp senbon needles, or focus everything to one enemy.

skills.name: Umbrella Toss
skills.description: For 4 turns, 'Needle Barrage' and 'Sprinkling Needles' will deal 5 additional damage. During this time Shigure will have 5 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Needle Barrage
skills.description: Shigure deals 30 damage to one enemy affected by 'Sprinkling Needles'.

skills.name: Sprinkling Needles
skills.description: Shigure deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, 'Needle Barrage' can be used on them. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Umbrella Block
skills.description: This skill makes Shigure invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akadou Yoroi
description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Yoroi is a capable, but brash ninja who likes to toy with his enemies. Yoroi is capable of absorbing the strength of his enemies, and make it his own in more than one way.

skills.name: Energy Drain
skills.description: Akadou Yoroi steals 20 health from one enemy then lowers their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Akadou Yoroi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Draining Assault
skills.description: For 3 turns, Akadou Yoroi steals 15 health from one enemy each turn. Their non-affliction damage will be lowered by 5 for 2 turns.* The following 2 turns, Akadou Yoroi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Chakra Focus
skills.description: For 2 turns, if 'Energy Drain' or 'Draining Assault' are used, they will also steal 1 random energy for their duration.

skills.name: Chakra Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akadou Yoroi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tsurugi Misumi
description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Misumi likes taking the initiative when it comes to combat. Misumi can flex his muscles and bones, twisting them to wrap around his enemies, or even defend his allies.

skills.name: Flexible Twisting Joints
skills.description: Tsurugi Misumi gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and targets one enemy or one member of his team. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage that ignores invulnerability. If used on a member of his team, they will gain 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Soft Physique Modification
skills.description: Tsurugi Misumi targets one enemy. For 2 turns, all new harmful skills used on Tsurugi Misumi will be reflected onto that enemy instead. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Tighten Joints
skills.description: Tsurugi Misumi gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Soft Physique Modification' is active, the enemy targeted by it will also take 20 damage and be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Misumi Block
skills.description: This skill makes Tsurugi Misumi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Umino Iruka
description: An instructor for Konoha, Iruka is a caring man who has acted like something of a father and mentor to Naruto throughout his youth. Iruka fights with his allies in mind, preferring to protect them and help them as support.

skills.name: Shuriken Throw
skills.description: Umino Iruka deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 25 health Umino Iruka has lost.

skills.name: Ally Shield
skills.description: Umino Iruka makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sealed Bomb Square Release
skills.description: The following turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 40 damage that ignores invulnerability, and for 1 turn they will take 25 additional damage from physical and energy skills. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Iruka Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Umino Iruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mizuki
description: An instructor for Konoha, Mizuki is a chuunin, and old friend of Iruka that over time grew jealous and petty. While Mizuki doesn't have any special abilities, he knows to instead be patient, and wait until the right time to strike.

skills.name: Kunai Assault
skills.description: Mizuki deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Execution Shuriken
skills.description: Mizuki deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 20 health they have lost. This skill can only be used twice. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Genjutsu Ambush Tactics
skills.description: After 1 turn, Mizuki will become invulnerable, 'Kunai Assault' will deal 30 damage instantly and 'Execution Shuriken' will deal 30 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible the first turn and will end if Mizuki receives new non-affliction damage.

skills.name: Effortless Side-Step
skills.description: This skill makes Mizuki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Jiroubou
description: A member of the Sound Five, Jiroubou is the largest member of the team, and while he appears calm, is actually arrogant and easy to anger. Jiroubou uses his fists to attack his enemies or can manipulate the battleground around him.

skills.name: Arhat Fist
skills.description: Jiroubou deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Earth Mausoleum Dumpling' will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Earth Mausoleum Dumpling
skills.description: Jiroubou deals 20 damage to all enemies. The following turn, 'Arhat Fist' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Earth Prison of Magnificent Nothingness
skills.description: For 3 turns, Jiroubou and all allies will gain 45 points of destructible defense. During this time, one target enemy will have 1 random energy stolen each turn. This skill's energy drain effect will end if Jiroubou's destructible defense is destroyed.

skills.name: Terra Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Jiroubou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kidoumaru
description: A member of the Sound Five, Kidoumaru resembles a spider in both appearance and fighting style. Kidoumaru is able to trap enemies in his web while assaulting them from afar with both spiders and powerful arrows.

skills.name: Spider Bow: Fierce Rip
skills.description: Kidoumaru deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Summoning: Kyodaigumo
skills.description: Kidoumaru deals 10 damage to all enemies for 5 turns. During this time, Kidoumaru will gain 10 points of damage reduction* and all enemies who use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 1.

skills.name: Spiral Web
skills.description: Kidoumaru targets himself or one ally. The following turn, the first non-strategic skill used on the target will be countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Golden Armor
skills.description: This skill makes Kidoumaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tayuya
description: A member of the Sound Five, Tayuya is the only female member of the team, and the most foul-mouthed one too. Tayuya uses her flute to both trap her enemies in genjutsu while controlling the beasts she summons.

skills.name: Summoning: Doki
skills.description: Tayuya deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Tayuya will gain 10 points of damage reduction*. During this time, 'Demonic Flute: Phantom Wave' will also remove 1 random energy from its target if used*.

skills.name: Demonic Flute: Phantom Wave
skills.description: Tayuya deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. During 'Summoning: Doki', this skill will also remove 1 random energy from its target.

skills.name: Demonic Flute
skills.description: Tayuya stuns all enemies' non-mental skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Tayuya invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sakon and Ukon
description: A member of the Sound Five, Sakon, along with his brother Ukon, are nearly identical twins with a bloodline that let them live inside one another's body. Sakon and Ukon can double team an enemy, or invade another's body.

skills.name: Gattling Punch
skills.description: Sakon and Ukon deal 40 damage to one enemy. During 'Parasite Demon Demolition', this skill will deal 10 less damage.

skills.name: Parasite Demon Demolition
skills.description: Sakon and Ukon deal 20 affliction damage to one enemy permanently. During this time, Sakon and Ukon will gain 15 points of damage reduction and 'Gattling Punch' will deal 10 less damage. This skill cannot be used while active. This skill ends if 'Rest' or 'Summoning: Rashoumon' are used, or if the enemy or Sakon and Ukon die.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Sakon and Ukon heal themselves for 30 health. If 'Parasite Demon Demolition' is active, it will end.

skills.name: Summoning: Rashoumon
skills.description: This skill makes Sakon and Ukon invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Parasite Demon Demolition' is active, it will end.

name: Kimimaro
description: A member of the Sound Five, Kimimaro was the leader, and the strongest of the team before his illness. Kimimaro's bloodline grants him unstoppable offensive power, however, his illness is slowly killing him, giving him precious little time.

skills.name: Dance of the Camellia
skills.description: Kimimaro deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Kimimaro will take 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Dance of the Clematis
skills.description: Kimimaro deals 40 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Kimimaro will take 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Dance of the Seedling Fern
skills.description: Kimimaro deals 30 damage to all enemies and reduces their physical and energy damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Kimimaro will take 10 affliction damage for 2 turns.*

skills.name: Bone Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Kimimaro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mitarashi Anko
description: A former student of Orochimaru and bearer of the Cursed Seal, Anko is now a teacher at Konoha. Having learned from Orochimaru, Anko utilizes various types of poisons and forbidden techniques to dismantle her enemies.

skills.name: Dual Pin
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 5 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Twin Snakes Mutual Death'.

skills.name: Dragon Fire
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, these enemies will take 5 additional damage from Mitarashi Anko's other skills.

skills.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Hand
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. The following 3 turns, this enemy will take 5 affliction damage each turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Quick Reflexes
skills.description: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Twin Snakes Mutual Death
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko targets the enemy affected by 'Dual Pin' and herself, killing both targets. This skill cannot be ignored.

name: Gekko Hayate
description: A Jounin and exam proctor from Konoha; while sickly and afflicted with a chronic cough, he is calm and composed. Hayate is an expert sword user, and is well acquainted with using stealth to increase the deadliness of his attacks.

skills.name: Crescent Moon Slash
skills.description: Gekko Hayate deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Dance of the Crescent Moon
skills.description: Gekko Hayate deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the first harmful skill used on Gekko Hayate will be countered.

skills.name: Meld into Shadows
skills.description: Gekko Hayate gains 25 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, he will gain 15 points of damage reduction. The turn after, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 3 turns, Gekko Hayate's skills will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Backflip Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Gekko Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shizune
description: The apprentice to Tsunade, and the niece of Dan, Shizune is a calm, practical but loyal ninja of Konoha's medical squad. Shizune is agile and quick, able to attack continually when not using her powerful medical jutsu to heal her allies.

skills.name: Prepared Needle Shot
skills.description: Shizune deals 15 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Poison Mist
skills.description: Shizune deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy for 3 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

skills.name: Healing Resuscitation Regeneration
skills.description: Shizune heals one ally for 35 health and removes all harmful affliction skills from them.

skills.name: Shizune Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Shizune invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hatake Kakashi
description: The squad leader of Team 7, known as the Copy Ninja, Kakashi is a man who puts the life of his teammates above all else. Kakashi is able to copy the abilities of his enemies while using his own original technique, the Raikiri.

skills.name: Sharingan Counter
skills.description: The following turn, the first physical, energy or strategic skill used on Hatake Kakashi will be countered and will replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Summoning: Ninja Dogs
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, 'Raikiri' will deal 50 additional damage to this enemy.

skills.name: Raikiri
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Clever Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yuhi Kurenai
description: The squad leader of Team 8, Kurenai is a caring woman and a close companion to Asuma. Kurenai is a genjutsu master, being able to use a variety of illusions to disrupt and trap her enemies in nigh impossible to escape illusions.

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Entrap
skills.description: Yuhi Kurenai targets one enemy. For 2 turns, they will take 10 damage each turn, will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 10, and the cost of their skills will be increased by 1 random energy.

skills.name: Illusionary Tree Meld
skills.description: Yuhi Kurenai gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense and 5 additional points for every skill Yuhi Kurenai has used. The additional destructible defense is reset when this skill is used.

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death
skills.description: Yuhi Kurenai stuns one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tree Binding Death Attack'.

skills.name: Vanishing Illusion
skills.description: This skill makes Yuhi Kurenai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Tree Binding Death Attack
skills.description: Yuhi Kurenai deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy affected by 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death'.

name: Sarutobi Asuma
description: The squad leader of Team 10, Asuma is the son of the 3rd Hokage; Asuma is a chronic smoker that fights to protect his allies. Asuma fights with a pair of trench knives, augmented by his chakra to a highly deadly degree.

skills.name: Flying Swallow
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Sarutobi Asuma's team will gain 15 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Blow' and 'Sharpen Blades' will be replaced by 'Flying Kick'.* This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sharpen Blades
skills.description: The next time 'Flying Swallow' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This effect stacks and will end when 'Flying Swallow' is used.

skills.name: Self-Sacrifice
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma targets one ally. Permanently, all harmful skills used on this ally will be reflected to Sarutobi Asuma. During this time, Sarutobi Asuma can use this skill again for no cost to cancel it.

skills.name: Knife Block
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Finishing Blow
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Flying Kick
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

name: Maito Gai
description: The squad leader of Team Gai, and father-like figure to Lee, Gai is a passionate man that's always there for those who need him. In combat, Gai's taijutsu has no equal, being able to open the Eight Gates and pound away at all threats.

skills.name: Leaf Whirlwind
skills.description: Maito Gai deals 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Sixth Gate Opening', this skill will be improved and deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Sixth Gate Opening
skills.description: Maito Gai takes 30 affliction damage.* This effect cannot kill Maito Gai. The following 2 turns, 'Leaf Whirlwind' will deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time, Maito Gai is invulnerable.

skills.name: Counter Punch
skills.description: Maito Gai targets one enemy. If this enemy uses a new harmful skill the following turn, they will be countered and take 30 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Gai Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Gai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uzumaki Kushina
description: The mother of Uzumaki Naruto, wife to Minato and once the jinchuuriki to the nine-tailed fox. Kushina specializes in unique sealing and barrier techniques that can hinder and disable even the strongest of enemies.

skills.name: Four Symbols Seal
skills.description: Uzumaki Kushina deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage from non-affliction skills. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Life Link
skills.description: Uzumaki Kushina targets herself and one enemy. For 3 turns, if either Uzumaki Kushina or this enemy die, the other will die as well. This effect ignores invulnerability. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Life Transfer'. This skill can only be used if Uzumaki Kushina's health is at 60 or below. This skill cannot be countered, reflected, removed or prevented and it will not interact with other skills.

skills.name: Adamantine Sealing Chains
skills.description: Uzumaki Kushina targets one enemy, first removing all helpful effects on them and then stunning them and making them invulnerable to helpful skills for 2 turns. They will be invulnerable to harmful skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Adamantine Covering Chains
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Kushina invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Life Transfer
skills.description: Uzumaki Kushina heals one ally for 20 health and takes 20 affliction damage.*

name: Namikaze Minato
description: A Jounin, and Squad Leader of Konoha, known as the Yellow Flash, Minato is the father of Naruto. Minato fights using space-time jutsu and a number of unique kunai to teleport around the battlefield.

skills.name: Flying Thunder God
skills.description: Namikaze Minato deals 30 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Wide Area Sensing
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, Namikaze Minato will gain 1 random energy each turn and 'Flying Thunder God' will not make him invulnerable if used. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Custom Kunais
skills.description: Namikaze Minato targets one ally permanently. If they are targeted by a new harmful skill, Namikaze Minato will deal 15 piercing damage to the enemy who used the skill. This skill lasts until Namikaze Minato dies and cannot be used on an ally already affected by it.

skills.name: Flying Light
skills.description: This skill makes Namikaze Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Baki
description: A Jounin of the Sand Village, and the leader of Gaara's team; Baki is cruel and ruthless, despite his normally calm nature. Baki fights using both taijutsu and ninjutsu together with top of the line Sand Village branded Flak Jackets.

skills.name: Sudden Strike
skills.description: Baki destroys one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Wind Blade
skills.description: Baki destroys one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 40 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Flak Jacket
skills.description: Baki targets himself or an ally, granting this character 50 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, they will ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage. This skill ends if the destructible defense is destroyed.

skills.name: Baki Teleportation
skills.description: This skill makes Baki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yakushi Kabuto
description: Kabuto is the close assistant and confidant to Orochimaru; calm, logical and highly intelligent, Kabuto is a mystery to many. Kabuto knows how to disrupt an enemy's body while regenerating his own.

skills.name: Chakra Scalpel
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy and they will take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills. The following turn, 'Chakra Scalpel' will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Yin Healing Wound Destruction
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto first removes all enemy affliction skills from himself, then heals himself for 15 health each turn for 5 turns. This skill becomes 'Critical Injury' for 5 turns after used.

skills.name: Temple of Nirvana
skills.description: The following turn, any enemy that does not use a new skill will be stunned for 1 turn and take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Dead Soul Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Critical Injury
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto deals 25 damage to one enemy.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the three sannins, Tsunade is a gambling, sake drinking loving woman with a tough exterior but soft interior. Tsunade is an expert at medical jutsu, using it to remove all her wounds, or delivering high impact kicks.

skills.name: Heavenly Foot of Pain
skills.description: Tsunade deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Creation Rebirth
skills.description: Tsunade removes all harmful effects on her and then sets her health to 100 (this is a healing effect).

skills.name: Major Summoning: Katsuyu
skills.description: Tsunade heals herself and her allies for 45 health. For the rest of the game, Tsunade's team will be healed for 5 health each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Slug Division'. This skill will end if Tsunade dies.

skills.name: Elbow Block
skills.description: This skill makes Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Slug Division
skills.description: Tsunade heals her team for 10 health and grants them 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

name: Jiraiya
description: One of the three sannins, Jiraiya is a perverted frog hermit who travels the world in search of some sort of knowledge. Using numerous frog based summons, Jiraiya can greatly hinder his enemies all while setting them ablaze.

skills.name: Great Spitting Fireball
skills.description: Jiraiya deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and 10 affliction damage to all others.

skills.name: Summoning: Toad Mouth Bind
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, if Jiraiya or one of his allies receives a new harmful physical skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Gamabunta
skills.description: Jiraiya deals 25 affliction damage to all enemies. For the rest of the game, the enemy team will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills and this skill will be replaced by 'Toad Oil Flame Bullet'.

skills.name: Spiked Buddha
skills.description: This skill makes Jiraiya invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Toad Oil Flame Bullet
skills.description: Jiraiya deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the three sannins, Orochimaru craves nothing more than to learn all the jutsu and abilities in the world. Orochimaru uses his snake summons and cursed seals to various effects, beating down his enemies regardless of their defenses.

skills.name: Kusanagi
skills.description: Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense then deals 25 damage to them.

skills.name: Cursed Seal Technique
skills.description: Orochimaru targets one ally or one enemy, dealing 15 affliction damage to them. The target will gain 1 random energy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Manda
skills.description: Orochimaru deals 45 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, Orochimaru will gain 1 additional random energy each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Constrict and Bite'. This skill will end if Orochimaru dies.

skills.name: Earth Clone Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Constrict and Bite
skills.description: Orochimaru stuns one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, Orochimaru will deal 30 damage to them.

name: Edo Tensei Hashirama
description: The first Hokage, and founder of the Hidden Leaf Village; Hashirama, a member of the legendary Senju clan. Hashirama has the unique ability to give life to trees, creating them, and manipulating them to assault the enemy team while protecting his own.

skills.name: Tree Wave Destruction
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants his team 5 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Tree Strangulation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and energy skills for 1 turn. During 'A World of Trees', this skill will stun all skills.

skills.name: A World of Trees
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies' physical, energy and strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy and their cooldowns will be increased by 1 turn. During this time, this skill can be used again to grant Edo Tensei Hashirama's team 30 points of permanent destructible defense and to stun all enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Tobirama
description: The second Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; Tobirama, a member of the Senju clan, puts the well being of the village and people above all else. Tobirama is a master of many jutsu, using both ninjutsu and genjutsu to stop the enemies in different ways.

skills.name: Water Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama makes one enemy ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn and deals 15 damage to them.

skills.name: Water Colliding Wave
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns and stuns their affliction skills each turn. During this time, 'Water Assault' will deal 15 additional damage.*

skills.name: Bringer of Darkness
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama makes his team invulnerable to all physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Encampment Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sarutobi Hiruzen
description: The third and most recent Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village to die; Hiruzen, known as the God of Shinobi was considered to be one of the strongest ninja to ever live in his prime. While powerful using just his normal jutsu, Hiruzen is able to pull out a trump card when desperation strikes.

skills.name: Fire Dragon Flame Bullet
skills.description: Sarutobi Hiruzen deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 affliction damage.

skills.name: Dead Demon Consuming Seal
skills.description: Permanently, one enemy takes 40 affliction damage, is stunned and cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable each turn. Sarutobi Hiruzen himself takes 20 affliction damage and is stunned each turn. This skill cannot be removed or ignored and will end when Sarutobi Hiruzen dies.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Enma
skills.description: Sarutobi Hiruzen and his team will become invulnerable for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Sarutobi Hiruzen will deal 5 damage to all enemies each turn, Sarutobi Hiruzen's team will gain 5 points of damage reduction, and this skill will be replaced by 'Adamantine Prison Wall'. This skill will end if Sarutobi Hiruzen dies.

skills.name: Earth-Style Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Hiruzen invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Adamantine Prison Wall
skills.description: For 1 turn, Sarutobi Hiruzen and his team will gain 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction and they cannot be killed.

name: Hokage Minato
description: The fourth Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; considered to be one of the fastest ninja ever, Minato is a talented man, and the father of Uzumaki Naruto, and the one who sealed the Kyuubi inside of him. Having mastered the time-space skills, Minato is capable of merging them with powerful ninjutsu for powerful effects.

skills.name: Hiraishin Rasengan
skills.description: Hokage Minato deals 35 damage to one enemy that ignores invulnerability. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 blue energy only. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Space-Time Barrier
skills.description: Hokage Minato targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the first new harmful skill used on this character will be reflected onto the enemy team and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Partial Dead Demon Consuming Seal
skills.description: Hokage Minato deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy, permanently lowering their non-affliction damage by 5. Hokage Minato will take 15 affliction damage.

skills.name: Kunai Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hokage Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Demon Brothers
description: A duo of Mist ninja who work for Zabuza, the Demon Brothers specialize in assassinating their targets with their shuriken chain. Using their weapons and teamwork, the Demon Brothers can gang up on one enemy, disable him, and then kill him.

skills.name: Chain Wrap
skills.description: Demon Brothers stun one enemy's physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Chain Shred'.

skills.name: Bladed Gauntlet
skills.description: Demon Brothers deal 30 damage to one enemy. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap', it will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Water Melding
skills.description: Demon Brothers gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense and 1 green energy.

skills.name: Vanish
skills.description: This skill makes Demon Brothers invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chain Shred
skills.description: Demon Brothers target one enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap', dealing 45 piercing damage to them and re-applying 'Chain Wrap' on them.

name: Haku
description: The sole survivor of the Yuki clan, and the subordinate of Zabuza; Haku, despite being young, holds enough potential strength to surpass almost any ninja. Using his ice based bloodline, and his intelligence, Haku can attack and defend nearly simultaneously.

skills.name: Flying Water Needles of Death
skills.description: Haku deals 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals', this skill targets all enemies.

skills.name: Acupuncture
skills.description: Haku targets one enemy or one ally. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned and be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an ally, all enemy stun skills on them will be removed and they will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. During 'Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals', this skill targets all allies and enemies and costs 1 additional random energy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals
skills.description: For 3 turns, Haku will become invulnerable. The following 3 turns, 'Flying Water Needles of Death' will target all enemies and 'Acupuncture' will target all allies and enemies and cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Needle Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Haku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Momochi Zabuza
description: Zabuza is a missing-nin from the Hidden Mist Village that specializes in silent assassination. Using the various ninjutsu abilities Zabuza has, he is able to attack his enemies all at once, or stealthily try to kill them.

skills.name: Soundless Murder
skills.description: Momochi Zabuza deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Hidden Mist', this skill will deal 15 additional damage and will ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Water Dragon Missile
skills.description: Momochi Zabuza deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hidden Mist
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies' physical and energy skills will cost 1 additional random energy and Momochi Zabuza will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 2 turns, 'Soundless Murder' will deal 15 additional damage and will ignore invulnerability. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Water Clone Zabuza
skills.description: This skill makes Momochi Zabuza invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kyuubi Naruto
description: Naruto's anger and desperation has forced the Kyuubi's chakra to come up to the surface, changing Naruto into a single-minded beast with a nearly endless amount of chakra. With the Kyuubi chakra around Naruto, he is able to unleash powerful waves of raw chakra to endow his power further, or gather it back to guard and heal him.

skills.name: Kyuubi Rasengan
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. Kyuubi Naruto will take 5 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Kyuubi Rage
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage. 'Kyuubi Chakra' may not be used during this time.*

skills.name: Kyuubi Chakra
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto heals himself for 15 health each turn for 5 turns. During this time, Kyuubi Naruto will gain 15 points of damage reduction and 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal 5 less damage. 'Kyuubi Rage' may not be used during this time.

skills.name: Kyuubi Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Cursed Seal Sasuke
description: Having gotten used to the Cursed Seal, Sasuke is able to draw Orochimaru's vile chakra through it, becoming a twisted hideous version of himself, but also getting stronger and faster. With the Cursed Seal, Sasuke's powers have exponentially increased, allowing him to pierce or trap enemies with his dark chakra.

skills.name: Corrupt Chidori
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke deals 45 damage to one enemy, reducing their non-affliction damage by 20 for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dark Void
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke stuns one enemy for 2 turns, makes them invulnerable to harmful skills for 1 turn and invulnerable to helpful skills for 2 turns. When this skill ends, this enemy will take 55 damage. This skill will end if Cursed Seal Sasuke dies.

skills.name: Cursed Seal
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and takes 15 affliction damage* that cannot kill him. For 1 turn, 'Corrupt Chidori' will cost 1 random energy instead and 'Dark Void' will cost 2 random energies instead. For 2 turns, Cursed Seal Sasuke will ignore healing effects.

skills.name: Sharingan Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shukaku Gaara
description: Having lived inside him the whole time, Shukaku is one of the nine tailed beasts and is very eager to escape and cause chaos to the world. While Shukaku slowly takes over Gaara, his own power increases, allowing him to demolish his foes with powerful sand attacks.

skills.name: Sand Claw
skills.description: Shukaku Gaara deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Constricting Sand Prison
skills.description: Shukaku Gaara deals 10 damage to one enemy each turn. The first skill that this enemy uses will be countered, and this skill will end.

skills.name: Sand Transformation
skills.description: Shukaku Gaara will gain 10 points of destructible defense each turn for 4 turns. When this skill ends, for 3 turns 'Sand Claw' will cost 1 less random energy and 'Constricting Sand Prison' and 'Sand Transformation' will be replaced.

skills.name: Thick Sand Coat
skills.description: This skill makes Shukaku Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Drilling Air Bullet
skills.description: Shukaku Gaara deals 60 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: True Awakening
skills.description: The following turn, 'Sand Claw' and 'Drilling Air Bullet' will deal double damage.

name: Hoshigaki Kisame
description: Formerly one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist Village, Kisame is an S-Rank missing ninja that is now a member of Akatsuki, having been partnered with Uchiha Itachi. Using his powerful, and ominous sword, mixed with his powerful water based ninjutsu, Kisame can disable enemies in every manner of way.

skills.name: Samehada Slash
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their energy, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Samehada Shred
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns, stealing 1 random energy from them each turn.

skills.name: Water Shark Projectile
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Samehada Scale Block
skills.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Itachi
description: The only other surviving Uchiha, Itachi is a master of doujutsu, an S-Rank missing nin, and a member of Akatsuki, having been partnered with Hoshigaki Kisame. Despite being powerful, Itachi is slowly going blind, making his abilities weaker, but when Itachi activates his Sharingan he becomes an unstoppable force of pure power.

skills.name: Mangekyou Sharingan
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Uchiha Itachi becomes invulnerable to non-strategic skills, enhances 'Amaterasu' and 'Tsukuyomi', increases their cooldowns by 2 turns, and doubles their costs. During this time, Uchiha Itachi will take 15 affliction damage each turn* and ignore healing effects and this skill cannot be used again.

skills.name: Amaterasu
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will target all enemies and deal double damage. This skill will end if Uchiha Itachi dies and cannot be reflected. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Tsukuyomi
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn*. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will last 3 turns.

skills.name: Sharingan Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Itachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uzumaki Naruto (S)
description: Having trained with Jiraya for almost three years, Naruto has grown, both mentally and physically. With his training behind him, Naruto is able to utilize his clones even more, granting him strong defense while augmenting his already powerful rasengan.

skills.name: Oodama Rasengan
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto (S) deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Mass Shadow Clones
skills.description: The following turn, Uzumaki Naruto (S) will counter the first new harmful skill used on him and 'Oodama Rasengan' will be replaced by 'Rasenshuriken'. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Chakra Boost
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto (S) removes all harmful skills on him then gains 2 random energies. The following turn, Uzumaki Naruto (S) will gain 10 points of damage reduction and 'Oodama Rasengan' will cost 2 random energies.

skills.name: Shadow Clone Save
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Uzumaki Naruto (S) deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 50 additional damage to an enemy countered by 'Mass Shadow Clones'. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Sarutobi Konohamaru
description: The grandson of the 3rd Hokage, Hiruzen, Konohamaru has spent his youth working hard to accomplish his dream of one day following under his grandfather's steps. With his hard work, Konohamaru has learned actual abilities that flow around his agility and speed.

skills.name: Konohamaru Rasengan
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru targets one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, that enemy will take 25 damage, and 15 additional damage if they used a new skill that turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Agile Backflip
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru will counter the next new harmful non-strategic skill used on him. Each time this skill is used, it will cost 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill cannot be used while active. This skill is invisible. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Quick Recovery
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru targets one ally. The following turn, the first time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 15. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Haruno Sakura (S)
description: With her extensive training under Tsunade for the last two and a half years, Sakura has gained a greater understanding of healing and the human body. While Sakura's physical strength and healing prowess have both increased, her greatest ability is a powerful chakra storing seal taught to her by Tsunade.

skills.name: Chakra Enhanced Punch
skills.description: Haruno Sakura (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. While 'Chakra Gathering' is active, this skill will deal 35 damage to one enemy, and 10 damage to all other enemies.

skills.name: Superior Healing
skills.description: Haruno Sakura (S) heals half of one ally's missing health, rounded, and removes all enemy affliction skills from them. While 'Chakra Gathering' is active, this skill will cost 1 random energy and have no cooldown.

skills.name: Chakra Gathering
skills.description: Haruno Sakura (S) gains 3 seals. During this time, each skill that Haruno Sakura (S) uses other than her invulnerability will use up 1 Seal. While 'Chakra Gathering' is active, Haruno Sakura (S) can use this skill again for no cost to heal herself for 15 health and remove all harmful effects on her.

skills.name: Insightful Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Haruno Sakura (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sai
description: A current member of the Elite ANBU Root, Sai is a quiet, but expressive individual with a mysterious past. Sai uses a set of brushes with a special ink to give life to his art, from tigers to lions to bears, that allow him to compete with his enemies.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Lions
skills.description: Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Sai will gain 20 points of destructible defense.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Snake
skills.description: Sai stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability. During 'Adaptive Painting', this skill will be replaced.

skills.name: Adaptive Painting
skills.description: For 3 turns, any ally that is targeted by a new direct stun skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn; any ally that has energy removed/stolen will gain 1 random energy, and any ally that successfully receives new non-affliction damage by an enemy will increase Sai's damage by 10 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ink Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Bird
skills.description: Sai deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuka Kiba (S)
description: Over the last several years. Kiba, and his dog, Akamaru have grown considerably, not wanting to be left last in their group. Having improved their team work, and provided they are given enough time, Kiba and Akamaru can become unstoppable rampaging beasts.

skills.name: Three-Headed Wolf
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba (S) gains 30 points of damage reduction and ignores enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tail Chasing Rotating Fang'.

skills.name: Rotating Fang
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 30 damage to one enemy and 20 damage to another random enemy. During 'Three-Headed Wolf', this skill will instead deal 20 damage to all other enemies.

skills.name: Fang Over Fang
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 35 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy and then reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 permanently. During 'Three-Headed Wolf', this skill will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Hide in the Shade
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Tail Chasing Rotating Fang
skills.description: Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 40 damage to all enemies and stuns them for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Shino (S)
description: Still as mysterious and secretive as ever, Shino has improved greatly over the years, learning and practicing with his loyal bugs. With his new found mastery, Shino can disable enemies even harder while slowly waiting for his bugs to erupt from their bodies and destroy them.

skills.name: Insect Swarm
skills.description: Aburame Shino (S) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, that enemy will be invulnerable to all friendly skills. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Insect Consumption'.

skills.name: Insect Barricade
skills.description: The following turn, the first new harmful skill used on one ally or Aburame Shino (S) will be countered, 'Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation' will be placed on the countered enemy and then activated. If this skill does not counter an enemy skill, Aburame Shino (S) will gain 1 red energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation
skills.description: Aburame Shino (S) targets one enemy. After 3 turns, they will take 25 affliction damage and all other copies of this skill on them will be activated. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Insect Cocoon
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Insect Consumption
skills.description: Aburame Shino (S) steals 1 random energy from one enemy affected by 'Insect Swarm' and increases the damage that enemy receives from 'Insect Swarm' by 5 that turn.

name: Hyuuga Hinata (S)
description: With the Chuunin Exam behind her, and with Naruto's words deep in her heart, Hinata has grown and become stronger and a woman. With her mastery of the Hyuuga clan tactics, Hinata can give life to powerful chakra lions while hindering her enemies' chakra paths.

skills.name: Pressure Point Closure
skills.description: Hyuuga Hinata (S) targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage to them, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn, and removing all stacks of 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' from them (including the skill itself). During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists
skills.description: This skill deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each 'Pressure Point Closure' stack. Once used, this skill removes all stacks of 'Pressure Point Closure' from the targeted enemy.

skills.name: Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field
skills.description: For 4 turns, if an enemy uses a new harmful skill, the energy cost increase of 'Pressure Point Closure' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently.

skills.name: Byakugan Sight
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nara Shikamaru (S)
description: Once known to be one of the laziest ninja, Shikamaru has worked tireless to become not only stronger, but a leader too. More than ever before, Shikamaru excels at coming up with long winded and convoluted plans meant to defeat any enemies in his path.

skills.name: Shadow Sewing
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru (S) deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by Long-Range Tactics, it will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Long-Range Tactics
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru (S) targets one enemy. That enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned 2 turns and Nara Shikamaru (S) will be invulnerable during this time.

skills.name: Expert Analysis
skills.description: For 3 turns, any time that one target enemy uses a new skill, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all helpful counters and reflect skills on them will be ignored for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Panicked Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akimichi Chouji (S)
description: After nearly three years, Chouji has developed in both strength and size, mastering the Akimichi clan techniques. No longer does Chouji need the Akimichi pills to tap into his true strength, instead, he merely needs to control his chakra and become a force to reckon with.

skills.name: Expansion Technique
skills.description: For 4 turns, Akimichi Chouji (S) gains 25 points of destructible defense, Spiked Meat Tank will do its alternate effects and have 1 less turn of cooldown, and Mega Palm Thrust will be improved.

skills.name: Spiked Meat Tank
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji (S) targets one ally or himself and will counter all enemy non-mental skills used on the target for 1 turn. The countered enemies will take 25 damage. This skill is invisible. Alternate: Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mega Palm Thrust
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. During Expansion Technique, this damage is improved to 40, the targeted enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn, and this skill has an 1 turn cooldown.

skills.name: Effortful Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yamanaka Ino (S)
description: Not one to be left behind, Ino has trained non-stop to improve her abilities and teamwork. With her improved techniques, Ino can not only control her enemies, but her allies too all while seeing everything on the battlefield.

skills.name: Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (S) targets one enemy. After 1 turn, that enemy will take 15 damage and if that enemy uses a new harmful skill during this time, they will be countered and this skill will be replaced by the skill they used for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected and is invisible.

skills.name: Proxy Surveillance
