skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (S) targets all enemies. For 3 turns, everytime they use a new skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. During this time, all new invisible skills they use will become visible. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Mind Clone Switch
skills.description: For 2 turns, both of Yamanaka Ino (S)'s allies will ignore all harmful effects other than damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible and will end if Yamanaka Ino (S) dies.

skills.name: Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rock Lee (S)
description: Now a chuunin, Lee has trained endlessly with Gai, and not only learned new abilities, but has learned what it truly means to fight. In battle, Lee now fights for his friends and allies, growing stronger as they fall around him.

skills.name: Leaf Rising Wind
skills.description: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns. This skill will deal 10 additional damage, and the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn for each ally that is dead.

skills.name: Leaf Great Whirlwind
skills.description: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to one enemy and gaining 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will deal 10 additional damage and grant 10 additional damage reduction. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for every ally that has been killed.

skills.name: Maximum Force Blast
skills.description: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. This skill will deal 15 additional damage for each ally that is dead and 15 additional damage for every 30 health that Rock Lee (S) has lost.

skills.name: Jumping Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Rock Lee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tenten (S)
description: Now a chuunin, Tenten has added a myriad of powerful and potent weapons in her arsenal, even procuring the legendary fan of the sage of the six paths. Having an arsenal of weapons at her side, Tenten can chose to fight at different levels, upgrading her weapons until she finds something suitable for her battle.

skills.name: Kunai Grenade
skills.description: Tenten (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Chain Spin
skills.description: Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Weapon Upgrade
skills.description: Tenten (S) gains 5 points of destructible defense. The first time this skill is used, it will replace 'Kunai Grenade' and 'Chain Spin'. The second time it is used, they will be replaced again. The third time this skill is used, it will reset, and her skills will revert back to the original ones.

skills.name: Leaping Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Tenten (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heavenly Chain Disaster
skills.description: Tenten (S) deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Iron Protection Wall
skills.description: Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn and grants them 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Bashousen: Coil of Wind
skills.description: The following turn, any new non-mental skill used on Tenten (S) or her team will be reflected onto the character who used it. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Bashousen: Coil of Fire
skills.description: Tenten (S) targets all enemies, dealing 10 damage and 10 affliction damage* to them. They will then receive 5 affliction damage* for the following 3 turns.

name: Hyuuga Neji (S)
description: The only of the original genins to become a Jounin, Neji has only increased his already powerful set of abilities and skills during the near three years of time. While still being able to rely on his pressure point attacks, Neji is now also able to unleash giant waves of chakra for brutish damage as well.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Mountain Crusher
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji (S) targets one enemy, destroying any destructible defense they have and dealing 45 damage to them.

skills.name: Byakugan - Eight Trigrams Field
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Hyuuga Neji (S) will be countered and this skill will be replaced by 'Pressure Point Strike'. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Byakugan Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Neji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Pressure Point Strike
skills.description: Hyuuga Neji (S) attacks one enemy countered by 'Byakugan - Eight Trigrams Field' or this skill, dealing 5 damage and removing 1 random energy from them. The following turn this skill will deal 5 additional damage and will remain replaced. This effect stacks and is cumulative until Hyuuga Neji (S) stops using this skill.

name: Hatake Kakashi (S)
description: Kakashi has not let the years pass by idle, and has trained as hard as any other, improving his sharingan and his own unique jutsu. While Kakashi's raikiri is still a potent finisher, he is now also able to rely on his kamui, aiming it at his enemies or even rescuing his allies.

skills.name: Lightning Beast Fang
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Raikiri'.

skills.name: Kakashi Kamui
skills.description: If used on an enemy, they will receive 40 piercing damage, and for 1 turn their cooldowns will be increased by 1 and their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. If used on an ally or himself, all harmful effects on them will be removed and they will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Team Tactics
skills.description: For 3 turns, Hatake Kakashi (S)'s allies will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1. The following 3 turns, the first new harmful skill used by one enemy will be copied and will replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Bunshin Stand-in
skills.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Finishing Raikiri
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi (S) targets one enemy, dealing 30 piercing damage to them. This skill will deal 10 additional damage to that enemy if they are stunned or if 'Lightning Beast Fang' was used on them the previous turn.

name: Yamato
description: A member of the secretive ANBU organization and a man who was once injected with the cells of Hashirama, the 1st Hokage. Due to the cells that live inside of him, Yamato is capable of small scale wood element abilities, from trapping enemies to protecting his comrades.

skills.name: Bliss-Bringing Hands
skills.description: Yamato targets one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them and making them ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Clone
skills.description: Yamato targets one ally or himself for 1 turn, countering the first physical, energy or strategic skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the enemy and granting that ally 20 points of destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Wood Release: Four-Pillar Prison
skills.description: This skill can be used on one enemy or one ally. If used on an enemy, that enemy will have their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. If used on an ally, that ally will gain 40 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Yamato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Maito Gai (S)
description: Still the leader of Team Gai, Gai is not one to let himself fall behind in terms of training and strength. Gai no longer feels the need to go straight into the highest level of gates that he can, instead taking his time, until the time requires the green beast of Konoha to go all out.

skills.name: Nunchaku Taijutsu
skills.description: Maito Gai (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new harmful physical skill on Maito Gai (S), he will deal 10 damage to them.*

skills.name: Fiery Kick
skills.description: Maito Gai (S) targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them and reducing all non-affliction damage they deal by 20 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Single Gate Release
skills.description: Maito Gai (S) receives 5 affliction damage*, but permanently gains 5 points of damage reduction and increases the damage of 'Nunchaku Taijutsu' and 'Fiery Kick' by 5. At 6 usages of this skill, 'Fiery Kick' will be replaced by 'Morning Peacock', and at 7 usages of this skill, it will be replaced by 'Daytime Tiger'. This skill can only be used 7 times.

skills.name: Muscle Block
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Gai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Morning Peacock
skills.description: Maito Gai (S) deals 60 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

skills.name: Daytime Tiger
skills.description: Maito Gai (S) deals 300 damage to one enemy.

name: Sarutobi Asuma (S)
description: Somehow continuing to avoid lung cancer, Asuma has remained the leader of Team 10 through the years. With the secret techniques of the fire temple, Asuma is able to attack and defend while waiting for the opportune moment to slice some heads off.

skills.name: Thousand-Armed Murder
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense and instantly deals 30 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma (S) deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies. He targets all enemies each turn, increasing the cooldowns of their skills by 1 turn. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.

skills.name: Decapitate
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma (S) targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is 25 or less, he will instantly kill that enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning - Ignite
skills.description: Sarutobi Asuma (S) deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for each stack of 'Ash Pile Burning' on them. This skill will end 'Ash Pile Burning', it cannot be countered or reflected, and it ignores invulnerability.

name: Yamashiro Aoba
description: A Konoha jounin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Aoba while reserved in public, is more than willing to boast and brag in private. While a man of many talents, Aoba specializes in genjutsu that takes on the form of crows, being able to use them for all manner of purposes.

skills.name: Scattering Thousand Crows Technique
skills.description: Yamashiro Aoba deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, Yamashiro Aoba and his team will have 5 points of damage reduction.* This skill can stack.

skills.name: Crow Assault
skills.description: Yamashiro Aoba deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time that enemy cannot use skills with a non-conditional stun effect (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Convergence of a Murder
skills.description: Yamashiro Aoba targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each active 'Scattering Thousand Crows Technique' on the target.

skills.name: Crow Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Yamashiro Aoba invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Izumo and Kotetsu
description: A pair of Konoha chuunin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Izumo and Kotetsu are close friends, and great teammates. While individually not as strong as many others.

skills.name: Mace Crush
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu deal 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Guided Shell Mace' can be used.

skills.name: Guided Shell Mace
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy, decrease their non-affliction damage by 5 for 1 turn and make them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill requires either 'Mace Crush' or 'Syrup Snare Field' to be used the previous turn.

skills.name: Syrup Snare Field
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu make their team invulnerable to physical and affliction skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Guided Shell Mace' can be used.

skills.name: Lunging Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Izumo and Kotetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuka Tsume
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Inuzuka clan, and the mother of Kiba, Tsume, much like her son, is a wild and impatient woman with an often odd sense of humor. Like other members of her clan, Tsume fights one with her companion, Kuromaru, while allowing her wild instincts to take over.

skills.name: Summon Kuromaru
skills.description: For 4 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Fierce Bite' and any enemy that uses a new harmful non-affliction skill on Inuzuka Tsume will receive 10 damage.

skills.name: Passing Fang
skills.description: Inuzuka Tsume deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. All stun skills that enemy uses will also be decreased by 2 turns. If 'Summon Kuromaru' is active, this skill will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Flashbang
skills.description: Inuzuka Tsume targets herself and her allies, making them invulnerable to non-affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times in a game. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Man-Beast Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Tsume invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Fierce Bite
skills.description: Inuzuka Tsume targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them that ignores invulnerability. If that enemy dies that turn, then for 2 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will have her non-conditional damage increased by 10, she will ignore enemy stun effects, and she cannot be killed.

name: Akimichi Chouza
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Akimichi clan, and the father of Chouji, Chouza is a brave, wise man that instills great confidence in his allies. In a fight, Chouza uses his size to become a nuisance to his enemies while granting safety to his team.

skills.name: Chain Bind
skills.description: Akimichi Chouza deals 5 damage to one enemy and lowers all physical and energy damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn. Akimichi Chouza's team will also gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Chouza Meat Tank
skills.description: Akimichi Chouza targets one enemy for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to them and granting his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. During this time, the damage lowering effect of 'Chain Bind' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

skills.name: Partial-Size Smash
skills.description: This skill can be used on a member of Akimichi Chouza's team or one enemy. If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on a member of Akimichi Chouza's team, for 1 turn the next non-mental harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 10 damage. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Chouza Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouza invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Morino Ibiki
description: A Konoha jounin, and the leader of the Torture and Interrogation force, Ibiki is a hard, sadistic man, who enjoys communicating through pain. Like his personality, Ibiki enjoys torturing his enemies, putting them in awkward situations where they have no choice but to lose.

skills.name: Payback
skills.description: Morino Ibiki permanently gains 10 points of damage reduction. For the rest of the game, Morino Ibiki can use this skill to deal 10 damage to one enemy, and 5 additional damage for each time a new damage skill was used on Morino Ibiki since this skill was used. This damage resets each time it is used.

skills.name: Summoning: Iron Maiden
skills.description: Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, each time that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense when this skill is used.

skills.name: Summoning: Torture Chamber
skills.description: Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and mental skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns, each turn that enemy does not use a new skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense when this skill is used.

skills.name: Close Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Morino Ibiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hiashi
description: Head of the Hyuuga clan, and father to both Hinata and Hanabi, Hiashi is a strict, but caring man who would do anything for his clan. In battle, there is no equal when it comes to mastering the Hyuuga clan abilities.

skills.name: Master Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hyuuga Hiashi deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. The following turn, another random enemy will take 20 damage and lose 1 random energy.

skills.name: Master Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hyuuga Hiashi becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Wall Palm
skills.description: The next turn, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on one ally or Hyuuga Hiashi will have that skill reflected back to one random enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Hiashi Byakugan
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Torune
description: A member of the Aburame clan, and a member of Anbu Root, Torune can almost be said to have no personality of his own, other than his undying loyalty to Danzo. Unlike other members of his clan, Torune employs a unique type of bug that lets him outright destroy both flesh and chakra.

skills.name: Kunai Wave
skills.description: Aburame Torune targets one enemy, whose skills will cost 1 additional random energy for 2 turns*. All allies of that enemy will take 15 damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Insect Armor
skills.description: Aburame Torune gains 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of destructible defense permanently. During this time any enemy that uses a new skill on him will take 5 affliction damage instantly and 5 additional damage from 'Nano Beetles' permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be removed from Aburame Torune.

skills.name: Nano Beetles
skills.description: Aburame Torune targets one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This skill cannot be ignored or removed and this skill stacks.

skills.name: Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yamanaka Fu
description: Fu is a member of the Yamanaka clan and a member of Anbu Root. Fu is a skilled genjutsu user and the partner of Torune.

skills.name: Tanto Slash
skills.description: Yamanaka Fu deals 25 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Quickened Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Yamanaka Fu targets one enemy, stunning all their friendly skills and making them invulnerable to all friendly skills for 2 turns.

skills.name: Mind Puppet Switch
skills.description: Yamanaka Fu targets one ally or himself. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a physical, energy or strategic skill against the target of this skill will be countered. The countered enemy will have all their skills replaced by 'Mind Puppet Switch - Attack' for 2 turns, take 20 additional damage from 'Tanto Slash' also for 2 turns and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: High Jump
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Fu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mind Puppet Switch - Attack
skills.description: This skill deals 10 damage to one enemy.

name: Shimura Danzo
description: The leader of Anbu Root, Danzo wishes nothing more than to become the Hokage, and while an extreme man with few morals, Danzo only wishes to protect Konoha. Thanks to Orochimaru, Danzo has gained access to many forbidden sharingan techniques that allow him to dominate any foe before him. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Pavera

skills.name: Vacuum Sphere
skills.description: Shimura Danzo deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 10 additional damage to an enemy stunned by Self-Cursing Seal.

skills.name: Self-Cursing Seal
skills.description: Shimura Danzo targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 20 piercing damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. This skill is replaced by Reverse Four Symbols Sealing for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Baku
skills.description: Shimura Danzo targets all characters, first removing all active skills from them and then dealing 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns.

skills.name: Izanagi
skills.description: For 1 turn, Shimura Danzo will ignore all enemy damage dealt. This skill is invisible and will have its cooldown increased by 1 turn each time it is used. After used, this skill will be replaced with Hostage Shield for 1 turn.

skills.name: Reverse Four Symbols Sealing
skills.description: Shimura Danzo deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. Shimura Danzo will also take 10 affliction damage and remove all enemy skills on himself.

skills.name: Hostage Shield
skills.description: For 1 turn, all harmful skills used on Shimura Danzo will be reflected to one target enemy instead. This skill is invisible.

name: Tsunade (S)
description: No longer just a Sannin, Tsunade is the new Kage of Konoha, and has taken a large amount of responsibility on her shoulders. Knowing that holding back is no longer an option, Tsunade taps into her seal to gain an impressive power over her foes.

skills.name: Heavenly Spear Kick
skills.description: Tsunade (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If an ally was affected by 'Enhanced Healing Wave' the previous turn, they also cannot be killed 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will destroy destructible defense and it will deal 40 piercing damage, but will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Enhanced Healing Wave
skills.description: Tsunade (S) targets one ally, healing them for 40 health. If empowered, this skill will heal 50 health instead.

skills.name: Tsunade: Strength of a Hundred Seal
skills.description: Tsunade (S) heals herself for 25 health. The next two times Tsunade (S) uses a skill, it will be empowered. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade (S) for 50 health and grant her 2 random energies.

skills.name: Tsunade Protection
skills.description: This skill makes Tsunade (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will make Tsunade (S)'s entire team invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Senju Hashirama
description: A member of the Senju clan, and one of the greatest warriors during the Warring States Period who went on to create Konoha. Even before becoming the Hokage, Hashirama proved his power and ability with his unmatched Wood Release jutsus.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Dragon
skills.description: For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to energy skills* and he will steal 1 random energy from one enemy each turn.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Human
skills.description: For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to physical skills* and he will deal 20 damage to one enemy each turn.

skills.name: Wood Release: True Thousand Hands
skills.description: Senju Hashirama grants 30 points of destructible defense to himself and his allies for 3 turns. For 3 turns, Wood Release: Wood Dragon' and Wood Release: Wood Human' will last 1 additional turn and cost 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Sage Knowledge
skills.description: This skill makes Senju Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Maki
description: Maki is a kunoichi of the Hidden Sand Village and the student of Pakura. Maki is also a member of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Sealing Squad.

skills.name: Weighted Net Scroll
skills.description: Maki gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, if any enemy uses a new skill on Maki, their skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This effect ignores invulnerability. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Humidified Cloth
skills.description: Maki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Binding Cloth
skills.description: Maki targets one enemy dealing 25 damage to them and then stunning their non-mental skills for 2 turns. During this time this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills.

skills.name: Cloth Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Maki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kankuro (S)
description: In the last couple years Kankuro has become a Jounin and has created a new puppet. He is now able to harness three puppets at once and is a more versatile combatant. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Yaseen16

skills.name: Kuroari Trap
skills.description: Kankuro (S) targets one enemy, countering any harmful skill they use for 1 turn. If countered, that enemy will take 100% more damage from Karasu Knives the following turn. This skill is invisible until triggered.

skills.name: Karasu Knives
skills.description: Kankuro (S) targets an enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Sanshouo Shield
skills.description: For 3 turns, Kankuro (S) and his allies will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage. This skill becomes Defensive Puppet Control for 3 turns after used.

skills.name: Puppet Distraction
skills.description: This skill makes Kankuro (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Defensive Puppet Control
skills.description: Kankuro (S) targets one ally or himself, granting them 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

name: Temari (S)
description: Temari has grown over the years. She is now a Jounin as well as the sister of Kankuro and Gaara. Temari is also the Hidden Sand Village's ambassador to the Hidden Leaf Village.

skills.name: First Moon
skills.description: 'Wind Scythe' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. Temari (S) gains 15 points of damage reduction permanently and this skill becomes 'Second Moon' permanently when used.

skills.name: Ally Protection
skills.description: Temari (S) targets one ally. For 1 turn, that ally will gain 20 points of damage reduction and they cannot be killed.

skills.name: Wind Scythe
skills.description: Temari (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Fan Offensive Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Temari (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Second Moon
skills.description: Temari (S) ends 'First Moon'. Temari (S) gains 5 points of damage reduction and 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction permanently and 'Wind Scythe' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill becomes 'Third Moon' permanently when used.

skills.name: Third Moon
skills.description: Temari (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes them deal 5 less damage for 1 turn.

name: Chiyo
description: The grandmother of Sasori and elder ninja of the Sand Village, Chiyo is a well known and accomplished puppet master and builder. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Father and Mother
skills.description: Chiyo targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new physical skill, they will take 10 damage. During this time, this skill and 'Chikamatsu Collection: Ten Puppets' will be replaced by 'Puppet Performance: Two as One' and 'Puppet Performance: Weapon Enhancements'. This skill ends if Chiyo dies.

skills.name: Chikamatsu Collection: Ten Puppets
skills.description: Chiyo gains 10 points of damage reduction permanently. During this time, 'Father and Mother' and this skill will be replaced by 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1' and 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 2'. 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1' and 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 2' cycle between their effects with each use.

skills.name: One's Own Life Reincarnation
skills.description: Chiyo targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health. Chiyo will instantly die when this skill is used. This skill can only be used if Chiyo has 50 or less health and its self-death effect cannot be ignored. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Skillful Block
skills.description: This skill makes Chiyo invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Puppet Performance: Two as One
skills.description: Chiyo targets herself or one ally for 1 turn, making them ignore enemy damage for 1 turn. During this time, the first enemy that uses a new skill on that target will take 15 damage and will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Puppet Performance: Weapon Enhancements
skills.description: Chiyo deals 5 damage to all enemies and targets her allies for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that target them with a new skill will be dealt 10 damage.

skills.name: Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1
skills.description: Dual Blades: Chiyo deals 20 damage to one enemy. / Small Bombs: Chiyo deals 20 affliction damage* to one enemy. / Spinning Orb: Chiyo deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. / Sealing Lion Head: Chiyo stuns one enemy's physical and strategic skills for 2 turns.

skills.name: Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 2
skills.description: Arm Cage: Chiyo deals 10 damage to all enemies and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. / Cable Pierce: Chiyo deals 20 damage to all enemies. / Suction Crushing: Chiyo deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and stuns their strategic skills for 1 turn. / Lion Closing Roar: Chiyo reduces all enemies' non-affliction damage by 10 for 3 turns.

name: Kazekage Gaara
description: After a few short years and much soul-searching, Gaara has risen to be his village's Kazekage. Rather than destroying others he now protects those he cares about to prove his existence. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Desert Missile
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. This effect lasts 1 additional turn for each Desert Charge Kazekage Gaara has and then removes all Desert Charges on him.

skills.name: Desert Prison
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill grants Kazekage Gaara 1 Desert Charge.

skills.name: Sand Summoning
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara gains 5 points of permanent damage reduction and 1 Desert Charge. His allies gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense. 'Desert Missile' and 'Desert Prison' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sand Sphere
skills.description: This skill makes Kazekage Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desert Charge
skills.description: This is a Desert Charge.

name: Akatsuchi
description: Akatsuchi is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village. Akatsuchi is a powerful shinobi who uses brute strength and earth style jutsus in combat.

skills.name: High Speed Assault
skills.description: Akatsuchi deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Golem
skills.description: Akatsuchi deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, Akatsuchi gains 10 points of damage reduction*, High Speed Assault costs 1 less random energy* and 'Golem Chakra Devour' deals 5 less damage* and costs 1 less random energy*.

skills.name: Golem Chakra Devour
skills.description: Akatsuchi deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Aerial Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Akatsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kurotsuchi
description: Kurotsuchi is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village and the Partner of Akatsuchi. She is also the granddaughter of the third Tsuchikage.

skills.name: Lava Quicklime
skills.description: Kurotsuchi deals 25 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Water Trumpet' will deal 5 additional damage. The next time 'Water Trumpet' is used, it will stun its target for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Trumpet
skills.description: Kurotsuchi deals 20 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Earth Spears
skills.description: Kurotsuchi deals 20 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, all enemies affected by this skill will be invulnerable to friendly skills.

skills.name: Evasiveness
skills.description: This skill makes Kurotsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Ittan
description: Ittan is a Hidden Rock Village shinobi who is battle hardened and extremely calm during battle.

skills.name: Battlefield Trenches
skills.description: All enemies will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills for 2 turns. During this time Ittan will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 'Moving Earth Core' will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Moving Earth Core
skills.description: Ittan deals 30 damage to one enemy and reduces the damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Dome
skills.description: Ittan targets one ally and himself, making both invulnerable to physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Trench Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Ittan invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kitsuchi
description: Kitsuchi is a jounin of the Hidden Rock Village and the son of the Sandaime Tsuchikage as well as the father of Kurotsuchi. Kitsuchi is also the commander of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Second Division.

skills.name: Granite Fist
skills.description: Kitsuchi targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. That enemy will be unable to use counter skills for 1 turn (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Earth Rising Excavation
skills.description: Kitsuchi deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their stun skills and the counter effects of their skills will last 1 turn less. This skill also grants Kitsuchi 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Release: Earth Sandwich
skills.description: Kitsuchi deals 45 damage to one enemy. This enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills will be stunned for 2 turns.

skills.name: Earth Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Kitsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shee
description: Shee is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and a sensor. Shee is one of the Raikage's most reliable shinobi.

skills.name: Sensor Awareness
skills.description: Shee deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if a new enemy skill is used on Shee, he will be invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Shee heals one ally or himself for 25 health.

skills.name: Lightning Illusion Flash
skills.description: Shee targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. That enemy will be invulnerable to new friendly skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Defensive Reaction
skills.description: This skill makes Shee invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Atsui
description: Atsui is a skilled swordsmen of the Hidden Cloud Village as well as the hot blooded brother of Samui.

skills.name: Kenjutsu Fire Release
skills.description: For 3 turns, Atsui will have 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and any enemy that uses a skill on Atsui will be dealt 10 affliction damage. Fire Wall will cost 1 random energy less during this skill and Flame Beheading will deal an additional 10 damage.

skills.name: Fire Wall
skills.description: Atsui targets all enemies. For 1 turn, all enemies will be dealt 25 affliction damage that ignores invulnerability if they use a new skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Flame Beheading
skills.description: Atsui deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Kenjutsu Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Atsui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Omoi
description: Omoi is a Hidden Cloud Village shinobi and a student of Killer Bee. Having been trained by Killer Bee naturally he is an exceptional swordsman.

skills.name: Crescent Moon Reverse Beheading
skills.description: For 1 turn, all harmful skills used on Omoi will be countered and the countered enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible. This skill becomes Crescent Moon Beheading permanently when used.

skills.name: Lightning Charged Sword
skills.description: Omoi targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them and stunning their strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Paper Trap
skills.description: Omoi targets one ally or himself. The first enemy to use a skill on the target of this skill will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. This skill stacks, is invisible and is permanent until triggered.

skills.name: Kenjutsu Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Omoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Crescent Moon Beheading
skills.description: Omoi deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be stunned for 1 turn and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable also for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Crescent Moon Reverse Beheading' when used.

name: Dodai
description: Dodai is a skilled sensor shinobi and a lava release user as well. His intelligence is his most powerful asset and he will need it to survive this war.

skills.name: Rubber Wall
skills.description: For 3 turns, Dodai and his allies will gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Communication Telepathy
skills.description: Dodai deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn that enemy will be unable to use skills with non-conditional stun effects (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Rubber Ball and Rope
skills.description: Dodai deals 35 damage to one enemy and makes one random ally invulnerable for 1 turn. The following 4 turns, the target enemy will have their skills stunned by Communication Telepathy.

skills.name: Lava Release Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Dodai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Darui
description: Darui is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and the right hand of the Fourth Raikage. Despite his dull appearance, Darui is a formidable shinobi.

skills.name: Laser Circus
skills.description: Darui targets one enemy, stunning their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. All other enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Electric Water Encampment Wall
skills.description: Darui deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies. The following turn, Laser Circus and Black Panther Lightning will deal 5 additional damage to them.

skills.name: Black Panther Lightning
skills.description: Darui deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Cleaver Sword Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Darui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nii Yugito
description: A kunoichi from the Hidden Cloud Village, Nii Yugito holds within her the two-tailed beast. She has full control over the bijuu Nibi, and is able to transform into it and use its powers to fight.

skills.name: Nibi Transformation
skills.description: Nii Yugito gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and replaces 'Explosive Tags Area Sealing' and 'Long Claws Airborne Reach' permanently. This skill can be used while active to cancel itself.

skills.name: Explosive Tags Area Sealing
skills.description: Nii Yugito targets herself permanently. The next time 'Spectral Fireball' or 'Claw Swipe' is used, that skill will ignore invulnerability and deal piercing damage, and then this skill will end. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. During 'Nibi Transformation' this skill will be replaced by 'Spectral Fireball'.

skills.name: Long Claws Airborne Reach
skills.description: Nii Yugito deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. The next time 'Spectral Fireball' or 'Claw Swipe' is used, that skill will also make its targets invulnerable to friendly effects for 1 turn, and then this skill will end. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. During 'Nibi Transformation' this skill will be replaced by 'Claw Swipe'.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: This skill make Nii Yugito invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Spectral Fireball
skills.description: Nii Yugito deals 30 damage to one enemy. That enemy will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Claw Swipe
skills.description: Nii Yugito deals 15 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

name: Killer Bee
description: Killer Bee is one of the jinchuriki from the Hidden Cloud Village. Bee is referred to as the hero of his village and possess immense physical strength as well as being an expert swordsmen.

skills.name: Kenjutsu
skills.description: For 4 turns, Killer Bee will deal 15 piercing damage to any enemy that uses a new skill on him. Buzz Saw will deal 15 additional damage during this skill.

skills.name: Buzz Saw
skills.description: Killer Bee deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 15 additional damage when Kenjutsu is active.

skills.name: Chakra Stream
skills.description: Killer Bee targets himself or an ally, countering all enemy skills used on them for 1 turn. All countered enemies will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Strong Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Killer Bee invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Utakata
description: Utakata is a missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village and the jinchuuriki of the six-tailed slug Saiken. A distant person most of the time, Utakata is a kind shinobi who uses bubble line ninjutsu in many ways.

skills.name: Soap Bubble Ninjutsu
skills.description: Utakata destroys one enemy's destructible defense then deals 20 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Drowning Bubble Technique
skills.description: Utakata targets one enemy, dealing 10 affliction damage permanently. Soap Bubble Ninjutsu will deal an additional 5 damage to any enemy affected by this skill. This skill cannot be used on an enemy currently being affected by it. This skill ends if Utakata dies.

skills.name: Rokubi Transformation
skills.description: Utakata heals himself for 25 health and gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Bubble Dome
skills.description: This skill makes Utakata invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Ao
description: Ao is a hunter-nin of the Hidden Mist Village and a skilled sensor. Ao is a veteran shinobi who has been in many battles, one of his spoils of war is the byakugan he possesses. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sensing Barrier
skills.description: Ao deals 25 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Stolen Byakugan Sight
skills.description: Ao targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. Any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will have their new invisible skills become visible and will take 10 additional damage from 'Sensing Barrier' permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible.

skills.name: Sensing Water Sphere
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to use skills with non-conditional stun, counter and reflect effects (this is a stun effect). For 2 turns, any member of Ao's team that uses a new skill will be healed for 15 health.

skills.name: Barrier Talisman: Armoured Eye
skills.description: This skill makes Ao invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Chojuro
description: Chojuro is a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village and also one of the new Swordsmen of the Mist. He possesses the chakra-based sword, Hiramekarei.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Strider
skills.description: Chojuro deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Hammer
skills.description: Chojuro makes one enemy lose all destructible defense they have and then deals 45 piercing damage to them. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Kenjutsu
skills.description: For 1 turn, Chojuro will counter all enemy non-strategic skills used on him. All countered enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Chojuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hozuki Suigetsu
description: Hozuki Suigetsu is a native of the Hidden Mist Village who was once a captive of Orochimaru. He is a dangerous individual with unique abilities and now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.name: Muscle Expansion
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu deals 20 damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Hydro Taijutsu
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rehydration
skills.description: For 2 turns, Hozuki Suigetsu will become invulnerable to strategic skills, gain 1 random energy each turn, and 15 points of permanent destructible defense each turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Water Release: Tate Eboshi' for 2 turns after used.

skills.name: Liquid Form
skills.description: This skill makes Hozuki Suigetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Release: Tate Eboshi
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes his allies invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Karin
description: Karin is a former subordinate of Orochimaru who oversaw one of his secret laboratories. She is a skilled sensor and master of chakra control who now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.name: Mind's Eye of the Kagura
skills.description: For 1 turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, it will be countered; if that enemy uses a new friendly skill, their skill's costs will be increased by 1 random energy for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Adamantine Attacking Chains
skills.description: Karin deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will be unable to use skills with a non-conditional stun effect (this is a stun effect). This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Heal Bite
skills.description: Karin targets one ally. That ally will be healed for 25 health and Karin will take 5 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Precipitous Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Karin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Juugo
description: Juugo is the origin of the Cursed Seal and now follows Sasuke. He can either be a calm natured person or a psychotic lunatic.

skills.name: Compression Blast
skills.description: Juugo deals 40 damage to one enemy, stunning their skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Killer Impulse
skills.description: Juugo deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, Juugo gains 25 points of damage reduction* and 'Fusion' will cost 1 random energy instead*.

skills.name: Fusion
skills.description: Juugo targets one ally, removing all harmful skills from them, healing them for 20 health and granting them 1 random energy. For 1 turn, 'Compression Blast' will deal 10 less damage and will cost 1 green and 1 random energy instead.

skills.name: Isolation
skills.description: This skill makes Juugo invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Cursed Seal Juugo
description: Juugo is fully transformed and no longer recognizable. Becoming a psychotic lunatic, Juugo is able to maintain absurd amounts of chakra making him nearly impossible to defeat.

skills.name: Psychotic Break
skills.description: Cursed Seal Juugo targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will be dealt 10 damage and Cursed Seal Juugo will gain 10 points of damage reduction*. During this time, 'Chakra Cannons' will deal 10 less damage and will cost 1 blue and 1 random energy and 'Body Absorption' will cost 1 random energy instead.*

skills.name: Chakra Cannons
skills.description: Cursed Seal Juugo deals 50 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Body Absorption
skills.description: Cursed Seal Juugo steals 20 health from one enemy.

skills.name: Strong Resilience
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Juugo invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Sasuke (S)
description: Sasuke has spent the last 2 years training under Orochimaru. He is now an expert swordsman and has immensely developed his lightning element techniques. His demeanor has also grown very cold and he is one of the most dangerous individuals in the ninja world.

skills.name: Chidori Nagashi
skills.description: For 1 turn, all non-mental enemy skills used on Uchiha Sasuke (S) will be countered and the countered enemies will take 5 affliction damage. This skill is invisible and becomes Binding Snake Glare Spell after being used.

skills.name: Great Dragon Fire
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (S) targets one enemy. That enemy will take 15 affliction damage for 3 turns and all enemies that use a skill on Uchiha Sasuke (S) during this time will take 5 affliction damage.* For 3 turns 'Kirin' will deal 5 additional damage.*

skills.name: Kirin
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (S) deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Protective Summoning
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Binding Snake Glare Spell
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage and stunning their skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes Chidori Nagashi' after being used.

name: Mangekyou Sasuke
description: After defeating his older brother Itachi, Sasuke has gained the Mangekyou Sharingan. That combined with his embrace of darkness makes him one of the deadliest shinobi alive.

skills.name: Amateur Susanoo
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke gains 25 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Susanoo Arrow' for 1 turn after used. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Enton Amaterasu
skills.description: For 3 turns Mangekyou Sasuke gains 10 points of damage reduction and if an enemy uses a new non-mental skill on him during this time, that enemy will be dealt 5 affliction damage instantly and then will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Dark Genjutsu
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hawk Summoning
skills.description: This skill makes Mangekyou Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Susanoo Arrow
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 40 piercing damage to them and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.

name: Yakushi Kabuto (S)
description: Kabuto is the loyal servant of Orochimaru and is a very dangerous missing-nin. He is a calculating individual who is both accomplished at combat and healing.

skills.name: Charging Mystical Palm
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes.

skills.name: Dead Soul Technique
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto (S) targets one enemy, dealing 30 piercing damage to them. For the rest of the game, that enemy will ignore healing effects.

skills.name: Medical Ninjutsu
skills.description: Yakushi Kabuto (S) heals one ally or himself for 25 health and removes all enemy affliction skills from them.

skills.name: Precise Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Jiraiya (S)
description: Jiraiya is one of the legendary Sannin that were trained by the third Hokage. Also known as the toad sage, he has been Uzumaki Naruto's teacher for the past few years.

skills.name: Katon Endan
skills.description: Jiraiya (S) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill is replaced by Toad Oil Projectile permanently after used.

skills.name: Toad Flat Shadow Control
skills.description: Jiraiya (S) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, all enemy skills that target Jiraiya (S) will be reflected onto that enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Wild Lion's Mane
skills.description: Jiraiya (S) targets one ally or himself for 3 turns. If an enemy uses a non-strategic skill on that character, that enemy will take 20 damage. If an enemy uses a new strategic skill on that character, that enemy will have their skills stunned for 1 turn and they will take 15 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Summoning Gamaken
skills.description: This skill makes Jiraiya (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Toad Oil Projectile
skills.description: Jiraiya (S) deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy and ends any control skills they are using. That enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Katon Endan' permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is replaced by 'Katon Endan' permanently after used.

name: Orochimaru (S)
description: Orochimaru returns, strong as ever and with some new tricks up his sleeve, but his body seems to be on borrowed time.

skills.name: Second Skin
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) sets his health to 100 (this is a healing effect). This skill will be replaced by 'Triple Rashoumon' permanently.

skills.name: Sword Snake Horde
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun effects of their skills will last 1 turn less.

skills.name: Extended Kusanagi
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) targets one enemy. That enemy has their non-mental skills stunned for 2 turns. During this time, this enemy takes 20 piercing damage each turn.

skills.name: Ground Mobility
skills.description: This skill makes Orochimaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Triple Rashoumon
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) targets both teams. For 2 turns, Orochimaru (S)'s team will be invulnerable to harmful skills. For 1 turn, the enemy team will be invulnerable to harmful skills. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Kisame Body Double
description: By using one of Pain's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Kisame. The body double is controlled by Kisame but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.name: Explosive Water Shock Wave
skills.description: For 4 turns, Kisame Body Double and his allies will lose 1 less energy if a energy removal or stealing skill is used on them. For 4 turns, all enemies who use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 2 turns. During this time, 'Water Prison Technique' and 'Five Man-Eating Sharks' will be improved and this skill will be replaced by 'Sentient Water Disabling'.

skills.name: Water Prison Technique
skills.description: Kisame Body Double deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills also for 1 turn. During this time, Kisame Body Double gains 15 points of damage reduction. During Explosive Water Shock Wave, this skill costs 1 random energy instead.

skills.name: Five Man-Eating Sharks
skills.description: Kisame Body Double deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During Explosive Water Shock Wave, this skill costs 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Samehada Block
skills.description: This skill makes Kisame Body Double invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sentient Water Disabling
skills.description: Kisame Body Double targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first harmful non-mental skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will have 'Water Prison Technique' applied on them. This skill is invisible.

name: Itachi Body Double
description: By using one of Pain's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Itachi. The body double is controlled by Itachi but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.name: Finger Genjutsu
skills.description: Itachi Body Double targets one enemy. If the affected enemy uses a new harmful skill, that skill will be countered, that enemy will take 10 damage, and Itachi Body Double will gain 1 genjutsu energy. The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Genjutsu Reversal
skills.description: For 2 turns, if any enemy uses a non-mental skill on Itachi Body Double, he will reflect that skill onto the enemy who used it. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Fire Release: Fireball
skills.description: Itachi Body Double attacks, dealing 20 damage to one enemy. The following turn, all enemies take an additional 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Illusionary Raven Bunshin
skills.description: This skill makes Itachi Body Double invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Deidara
description: A former ninja of the Earth Village and now a junior Akatsuki member, Deidara is able to fuse clay and chakra to create devastating explosives. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: C1: Birds
skills.description: Deidara deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this skill Deidara will be invulnerable to mental skills and this enemy's energy skills will deal 10 less damage*. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently*. This effect stacks.

skills.name: C1: Centipede
skills.description: Deidara deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn Deidara will be invulnerable to energy skills and this enemy's physical skills will deal 10 less damage. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Art is a Bang!
skills.description: Deidara deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies. Deidara will instantly die after this skill is used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and its self-death effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Clay Mold
skills.description: Deidara gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This effect stacks. The first time this skill is used, it replaces 'C1: Birds' and 'C1: Centipede' with their alternative versions. The second time this skill is used Deidara's skills will revert back to their original versions.

skills.name: C3: Statue
skills.description: Deidara deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn Deidara will be invulnerable to physical skills and this enemy's mental skills will deal 10 less damage. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: C2: Dragon
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will take 10 piercing damage if they use a new skill. During this time they will take 5 additional damage from energy skills and 'Clay Mold' will grant 10 additional destructible defense.

name: Sasori of the Red Sand
description: Sasori is a senior Akatsuki member and a legendary puppet master. He is even rumored to have defeated an entire nation with puppets alone. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Pavera

skills.name: Thousand Hands
skills.description: Sasori of the Red Sand deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns and gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense each turn. If 'Poison Gas' is used on the target in the following turn, it will last 1 additional turn on them*. The target of this skill will take 5 additional damage from 'Poison Gas' for 1 turn*.

skills.name: Poison Gas
skills.description: Sasori of the Red Sand deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy for 4 turns and gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense. During this time, if that enemy uses a new skill, they will be dealt 5 affliction damage. This skill lasts 1 additional turn if the enemy is affected by Thousand Hands. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Iron Sand
skills.description: Sasori of the Red Sand will gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense each turn for 3 turns. During this time, every enemy who uses a new skill on Sasori of the Red Sand will be dealt 5 piercing damage. For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Iron Sand World Method' and 'Thousand Hands' will be replaced by 'Iron Sand Gathering Assault'.

skills.name: Puppet Protection
skills.description: This skill makes Sasori of the Red Sand invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Iron Sand Gathering Assault
skills.description: Sasori of the Red Sand deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and makes that enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Sasori of the Red Sand also gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Iron Sand World Method
skills.description: Sasori of the Red Sand deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies. Any enemy whose health drops to 10 or below will be instantly killed. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Hidan
description: Hidan is a member of Akatsuki and a worshiper of the obscure god Jashin. He is apparently immortal and has perhaps the foulest mouth of the entire criminal organization. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Death Controlling Possessed Blood
skills.description: Hidan heals himself for 10 health and gains 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Curse of Jashin' permanently after used.

skills.name: Reaping Scythe
skills.description: Hidan deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will steal 10 health from one enemy instead of dealing damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Immortality
skills.description: Hidan will be unable to be killed for 1 turn. During 'Curse of Jashin' this skill lasts 3 turns instead.

skills.name: Insightful Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Hidan invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Curse of Jashin
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Hidan will be healed for 10 health everytime he is targeted by a new harmful non-strategic skill, before being affected by it. This skill becomes 'Impale' permanently after used.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: Hidan deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Hidan takes 10 affliction damage*. This skill cannot kill Hidan and ignores invulnerability.

name: Kakuzu
description: A missing-nin of mysterious talents and a member of Akatsuki, Kakuzu is certainly older than he appears. He seems to only be concerned with money and the bounties which provide him with it.

skills.name: Fuuton Atsugai
skills.description: Kakuzu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes Katon Zukokku permanently after used.

skills.name: Raiton Gian
skills.description: Kakuzu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage until the next time they use a new harmful skill. This skill becomes Inferno Gust permanently after used. This skill cannot stack.

skills.name: Heart Steal
skills.description: Kakuzu targets one enemy, stealing 25 health from them. If that enemy dies, Kakuzu will heal himself for 20 health.

skills.name: Iron Skin Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Katon Zukokku
skills.description: Kakuzu deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. This skill becomes 'Fuuton Atsugai' permanently after used.

skills.name: Inferno Gust
skills.description: Kakuzu deals 40 damage to one enemy, and 20 damage to all other enemies. This skill becomes 'Raiton Gian' permanently after used.

name: Hoshigaki Kisame (S)
description: Hoshigaki Kisame is the partner of Uchiha Itachi in Akatsuki. He is an expert swordsman and a missing-nin from the Hidden Mist Village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Samehada Interception
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) ends 'Samehada Fusion' and becomes invulnerable to non-energy skills for 3 turns. During this time, any enemy who uses a new energy skill on him will take 10 additional damage from 'Samehada Frenzy' permanently. This effect stacks. This skill will be replaced by 'Samehada Frenzy' permanently after used.

skills.name: Water Release: Great Shark Bullet
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) targets one enemy. After 3 turns, they will take 45 piercing damage and the other enemies will take 30 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time, whenever they use a new energy skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Samehada Fusion
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and ends 'Samehada Interception' on himself. For the rest of the game, if a new energy drain or removal skill is used on him, he will gain 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Water Prison Shark Dance' permanently after used.

skills.name: Water Isolation
skills.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 3 turns this skill can be used again to instead give Hoshigaki Kisame (S) 2 random energies and then kill him instantly. This self-death effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Samehada Frenzy
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy.

skills.name: Water Prison Shark Dance
skills.description: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy. For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will take 10 damage. During this time, their energy skills will deal 15 less damage and cost 1 additional random energy.

name: Uchiha Itachi (S)
description: Uchiha Itachi is a member of Akatsuki, and the brother of Uchiha Sasuke. He has mastered the sharingan completely.

skills.name: Susanoo Activation
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) takes 10 affliction damage*. His skills become their alternate versions and he gains 5 permanent stacking destructible defense each turn. If used again, his skills return to their original versions and he loses all destructible defense from this skill.

skills.name: Weakened Amaterasu
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This skill becomes Totsuka Sword during Susanoo Activation. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Crow Genjutsu
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) targets one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new skill, their skills will be stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible and becomes Yata Mirror during 'Susanoo Activation'.

skills.name: Vanishing Crows
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Itachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Totsuka Sword
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Yata Mirror
skills.description: For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on Uchiha Itachi (S) will be countered. The countered enemies will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

name: Konan of the Rain
description: Konan of the Rain has returned to the Hidden Rain village. Now that Uzumaki Nagato is dead she is aligned with Uzumaki Naruto and his quest for peace.

skills.name: Paper Chakram
skills.description: Konan of the Rain deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. Konan of the Rain will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn.

skills.name: Paper Ocean
skills.description: Konan of the Rain deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 piercing damage each following turn permanently.

skills.name: Explosive Tags
skills.description: Konan of the Rain deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill becomes Paper Shurikens for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Paper God Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Konan of the Rain invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Paper Shurikens
skills.description: Konan of the Rain deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. Explosive Tags will deal 10 additional damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

name: Konan
description: Konan is a member of Akatsuki and a master of origami ninjutsu, earning her the title God's Angel in Amegakure. Able to turn her body into thick sheets of paper, she is capable of multiple forms of attack.

skills.name: Paper Cut
skills.description: Konan deals 25 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Origami Blanket
skills.description: Konan targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy has their skills stunned, they are invulnerable to all new friendly skills, and they take 15 damage each turn. During this time, 'Paper Cut' will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy.*

skills.name: Dance Of The Shikigami
skills.description: Konan deals 25 damage to one enemy and 25 damage to a random different enemy.

skills.name: Onmyoji Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Konan invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uzumaki Nagato
description: Uzumaki Nagato is the leader of Akatsuki and is also known as Pain. He is in control of the six paths of Pain and was a former student of Jiraiya. Nagato possess the rinnegan and may be the strongest ninja in the shinobi world.

skills.name: Demonic Statue Summoning
skills.description: Uzumaki Nagato deals 20 damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Ethereal Dragon will deal 15 additional damage if used on any enemy affected by this skill.

skills.name: Ethereal Dragon
skills.description: Uzumaki Nagato deals 20 damage to one enemy. If their health drops to 30 or below, they will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rinne Tensei
skills.description: Uzumaki Nagato revives all dead allies. They will have 50 health. Uzumaki Nagato will die once this skill is used. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Bansho Block
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Nagato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Asura Path Pain
description: Asura Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. His body style is similar to a puppet filled with hidden weapons. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Asura Attack
skills.description: Asura Path Pain deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, the first harmful energy, mental or strategic skill used on Asura Path Pain will be countered.

skills.name: Flaming Arrow Warhead
skills.description: Asura Path Pain deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the first harmful physical or affliction-only skill used on Asura Path Pain will be countered. This skill becomes 'Flaming Arrow of Amazing Ability' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Mechanical Body: Armaments
skills.description: For 2 turns, Asura Path Pain will have 25 points of destructible defense, will ignore healing effects, his skills will have no cost and if used, they will deal 15 affliction damage* to him (that cannot kill him) for every random energy they originally cost.

skills.name: Rinnegan Awareness
skills.description: This skill makes Asura Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Flaming Arrow of Amazing Ability
skills.description: Asura Path Pain destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 45 damage to them.

name: Human Path Pain
description: Human Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is a mind reader and gathers intel for the other paths.

skills.name: Mind Invasion
skills.description: Human Path Pain deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. 'Sneak Attack' will be unable to be used for 1 turn.

skills.name: Soul Steal
skills.description: Human Path Pain targets one enemy affected by Mind Invasion the previous turn. That enemy takes 40 piercing damage. If that enemy's health drops to 15 or less, they will be instantly killed.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Human Path Pain deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Rinnegan Awareness
skills.description: This skill makes Human Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Naraka Path Pain
description: Naraka Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. He is able to interrogate his enemies at will. Naraka Path Pain can also give life as well as take it.

skills.name: Outer Path
skills.description: Naraka Path Pain gains 10 points of damage reduction* and deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 3 turns. Judgment can be used during this time* and will deal 5 additional damage to any enemy affected by this skill*.

skills.name: Judgment
skills.description: While Outer Path is being used, Naraka Path Pain targets one enemy. That enemy will take 20 damage and will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. If their health drops to 5 or below, they will be instantly killed.

skills.name: Rejuvenation
skills.description: Naraka Path Pain targets one ally or himself, healing them for 25 health and removing all enemy affliction skills from them.

skills.name: Naraka Block
skills.description: This skill makes Naraka Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Animal Path Pain
description: Animal Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This Path is able to summon a variety of different beasts for different purposes.

skills.name: Cerberus Hydra
skills.description: Animal Path Pain deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following 2 turns, any enemy that uses a skill will be dealt 15 piercing damage and Animal Path Pain's team will be grant 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Drill Bird
skills.description: Animal Path Pain deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns.

skills.name: Invisible Chameleon
skills.description: Animal Path Pain targets himself or one ally, making them ignore enemy stun effects and gain 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns.

skills.name: Panda Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Animal Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Preta Path Pain
description: Preta Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is able to nulify jutsus and is used mostly for defensive tactics. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra-Removing Grab
skills.description: Preta Path Pain deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. If 'Blocking Technique Absorption Seal' is active on this enemy, this skill will steal 1 random energy from them instead.

skills.name: Blocking Technique Absorption Seal
skills.description: Preta Path Pain targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on them for 1 turn. All countered enemies will take 10 additional damage from 'Chakra-Removing Grab' permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible.

skills.name: Ability-Disabling Grab
skills.description: Preta Path Pain targets one enemy permanently, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and reducing their non-affliction damage by 15. This skill ends if Preta Path Pain or the target enemy die or if Preta Path Pain uses any new skill.

skills.name: Agile Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Preta Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Deva Path Pain
description: Deva Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is able to use itself as the epicenter of magnetism to attract or repel all objects. This path holds the most power and is the main force in battle for Pain. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Wespro & Alexandre

skills.name: Chakra Rod
skills.description: Deva Path Pain targets one enemy, dealing 15 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Chibaku Tensei Charge
skills.description: For 3 turns, all enemies will take 10 piercing damage each turn that they do not use a new skill. First turn, they deal 10 less non-affliction damage. Second turn, they deal 15 less non-affliction damage. Third turn, they are stunned, and this skill is replaced by Chibaku Tensei permanently. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Universal Pull
skills.description: For 1 turn, Deva Path Pain will counter the first enemy skill used on him. The countered enemy will receive 25 damage and then for 2 turns that enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Shinra Tensei
skills.description: The first enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Deva Path Pain will take 10 piercing damage, make Deva Path Pain invulnerable, and this skill will end. While active, this skill will deal 10 additional damage each turn, stacking to a maximum of 40, and it cannot be used again. When triggered, this skill cannot be used for 3 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Chibaku Tensei
skills.description: Deva Path Pain deals 30 damage to all enemies. This skill becomes Chibaku Tensei Charge when used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: White Zetsu
description: White Zetsu is half of the Akatsuki member known as Zetsu. He was one of the first victims of Kaguya's Infinite Tsukuyomi. This Zetsu is capable of having hundreds of clones of himself and also copying his enemies' faces and abilities.

skills.name: Spore Technique
skills.description: White Zetsu targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the target of this skill will be healed for 5 health, gain 1 random energy each turn and ignore energy drain or removal effects and enemy stun effects. During this time, any enemy who uses a new physical skill on that character will have the cost of their non-strategic skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill ends if White Zetsu dies.

skills.name: Monstrous Clone Combination
skills.description: White Zetsu deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Parasite Clone
skills.description: White Zetsu targets one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new skill, White Zetsu will copy it for 4 turns. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Mayfly
skills.description: This skill makes White Zetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tobi
description: Not much is known about Tobi other than he appears to be a member of the Uchiha clan. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Hidden Izanagi
skills.description: For 1 turn, Tobi will be unable to be killed and 'Kamui' will deal 20 additional damage. He targets one ally or himself and for 1 turn, every enemy who uses a new skill on the target will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Kamui
skills.description: Tobi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from mental skills.

skills.name: Underground Field Control
skills.description: Tobi targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from mental skills and everytime they use a new skill, they will take 20 piercing damage.

skills.name: Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Tobi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Deidara
description: Deidara has been revived and is immediately sent out to battle. Fighting on the front lines is nothing new to this old soul.

skills.name: Katsu
skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra Clay Trap
skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara targets one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new harmful skill, that skill will be countered, that enemy will take 20 piercing damage and Katsu will deal 5 additional damage to that enemy permanently. The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sonar Bat Bombs
