skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. All enemies will take 5 additional damage from Katsu permanently. This skill becomes Jellyfish Explosives permanently when used.

skills.name: Flying Clay Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Deidara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Jellyfish Explosives
skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. The target of this skill will take 10 additional damage from Katsu permanently. This skill stacks and becomes Sonar Bat Bombs permanently when used.

name: Edo Tensei Zabuza
description: Zabuza has been summoned from the dead by Kabuto against his will, being put to fight the Allied Shinobi Forces during the war. His unique abilities will surely be put to use on the battlefield.

skills.name: Demon Shroud
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Zabuza will have 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage and enemy stun effects. Executioner's Blade Absorption and 'Executioner's Blade Strike' will be improved during this time.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade Absorption
skills.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza steals 15 health from one enemy. During 'Demon Shroud', this skill will also remove 1 random energy from the target and will have an 1 turn cooldown.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade Strike
skills.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Demon Shroud', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Mist Kunai Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Zabuza invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Haku
description: Haku is not sure why he is among the living again but his dream of protecting Zabuza pushes him to go all out on the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ice Release: Ice Spears
skills.description: Edo Tensei Haku deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and applies 'Freeze' on them.

skills.name: Ice Rock Dome of Magnificent Nothingness
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Haku's team will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage and will have 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction. During this time, any enemy that targets any of them with a new skill will have 'Freeze' applied on them and this skill will be replaced by 'Ice Release: Ice Mirror'.

skills.name: Silent Killing
skills.description: Edo Tensei Haku deals 35 damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Skilled Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Haku invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ice Release: Ice Mirror
skills.description: Edo Tensei Haku targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. The target gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction and the first enemy that uses a new skill on them will have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: The target will have the cooldown of their skills increased by 1 turn for 2 turns. This skill stacks. If applied indirectly, this skill cannot be removed.

name: Edo Tensei Sasori
description: Sasori has been resurrected in the ageless body that he had always wanted during his life. He is sent out to the battlefield in Akatsuki's Ambush Squad.

skills.name: Chakra Threads
skills.description: For 3 turns, Edo Tensei Sasori will gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and Puppet Manipulation will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Ally Control
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sasori targets an ally. For 1 turn, all enemy skills used on that character will be reflected to the user of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Puppet Manipulation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sasori attacks, dealing 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, non-affliction damage that enemy deals will be reduced by 5. If the health of the target of this skill drops to 35 or below after this skill is used on them, their physical, energy and strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Falling Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sasori invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Jinin
description: Akebino Jinin is a former member of the Seven Swordsman of the Mist who was revived by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War. Using his sword Kabutowari he will demonstrate the power of the previous generation on the battlefield.

skills.name: Silent Axe Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinin deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the target of this skill will be unable to reduce damage, become invulnerable, or use counter skills (this is a stun effect). The following turn, Kabutowari Wedge will be improved on this enemy.

skills.name: Kabutowari Wedge
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinin deals 25 damage to one enemy. If Silent Axe Slash is active on this enemy, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 4 turns.

skills.name: Kabutowari Smash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinin deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Skilled Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Pakura
description: Pakura was a reviled Shinobi of the Hidden Sand Village in the past. So much so that she was revived against her will by Kabuto to participate in the Fourth Shinobi World War.

skills.name: Scorch Release
skills.description: Edo Tensei Pakura deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, if any enemy uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Pakura, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage.

skills.name: Searing Combat
skills.description: Edo Tensei Pakura deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected by it.

skills.name: Steaming Murder
skills.description: Edo Tensei Pakura deals 45 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Scorch Release' will cost 1 random energy instead.

skills.name: Experienced Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Pakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Gari
description: Gari is a former member of the Hidden Rock Village's explosives corps. He has been summoned to do battle in the Fourth Shinobi World War and he seems to be enjoying himself.

skills.name: Explosion Release: Exploding Palm
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gari deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills. Edo Tensei Gari gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Explosion Release: Landmine Fist
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gari deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, that enemy will take 5 affliction damage each following turn and if they use a new non-conditional stun, energy removal, energy steal or energy gain skill they will lose 1 random energy. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Prepared Underground Explosion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gari gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill can be used to deal 15 affliction damage to all enemies and then regrant its destructible defense. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Gari receives new non-affliction damage.

skills.name: Taunting Stance
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Gari invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Ginkaku
description: Ginkaku is one half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.name: Shichiseiken Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. Damage Benihisago Sealing, 'Bashousen: Straight Assault' and 'Bashousen: Coil of Fire' deals to that enemy will be increased by 5 permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Silence is Golden
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage to them and stunning their physical, affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. Benihisago Sealing, 'Bashousen: Straight Assault' and 'Bashousen: Coil of Fire' will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Benihisago Sealing
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. Benihisago Sealing and 'Bashousen: Coil of Fire' will deal 5 additional damage to the target of this skill permanently.

skills.name: Shichiseiken Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ginkaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kinkaku
description: Kinkaku is the other half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.name: Bashousen: Straight Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. Benihisago Sealing will deal 5 additional damage to the target of this skill permanently. This skills stacks. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Koukinjou Counter
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku targets one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new harmful skill, that skill will be countered, that enemy will be dealt 35 damage and 'Benihisago Sealing and 'Bashousen: Straight Assault' will deal 5 additional damage to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Bashousen: Coil of Fire
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. 'Benihisago Sealing will deal 5 additional damage to them permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Koukinjou Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kinkaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Ameyuri
description: Ringo Ameyuri has been summoned from the dead by Kabuto to participate in the Fourth Shinobi World War. She wields the dual sharpest swords ever made, called Kiba.

skills.name: Lightning Rain
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ameyuri deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Ameyuris allies will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn.

skills.name: Twin Swords Self-Protection
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Ameyuri will gain 5 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 piercing damage to any enemy who uses a new skill on her. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Silent Massacre
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ameyuri deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Ameyuri's allies will ignore enemy damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Twin Kiba Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ameyuri invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kushimaru
description: Kuriarare Kushimaru was a member of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a member of the Hidden Mist Village's Anbu. During his life he committed countless atrocities and he is happy to be back from death to engage his newfound opponents.

skills.name: Silent Stiching
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kushimaru deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Spider Sewing
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kushimaru targets all enemies. Silent Stiching and Wire Crucifixion will deal 5 additional damage to them permanently. Edo Tensei Kushimaru gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and stacks.

skills.name: Wire Crucifixion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kushimaru deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Senbon Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kushimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Jinpachi
description: Munashi Jinpachi is one of the previous Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a particularly cruel individual, using his sword Shibuki. He was brought back to life by Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War.

skills.name: Explosive Tag Scroll
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense. Silent Explosion will deal 20 additional damage the next time it is used. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Silent Explosion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shibuki
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Jinpachi will be dealt 10 affliction damage instantly and then take 10 affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Shibuki Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinpachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Hanzo
description: Hanzo has been summoned back from the dead in the middle of the Fourth Shinobi World War and he is not happy about it. He will engage anyone that crosses his path as he did when he was alive.

skills.name: Kusarigama
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage. That enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Poison Sickle will deal an additional 10 damage to an enemy affected by this skill.

skills.name: Poison Sickle
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Edo Tensei Hanzo dies.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Ibuse
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo deals 25 affliction damage to all enemies and grants his team 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill becomes Ibuse: Toxic Mouth for 5 turns after used.

skills.name: Kusarigama Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hanzo invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ibuse: Toxic Mouth
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. That enemy will lose 1 random energy.

name: Edo Tensei Rasa
description: Rasa is the Fourth Kazekage of the Hidden Sand Village and the father of Gaara, Kankuro and Temari. He has been summoned to participate in the war. He will prioritize his village above all else while he is back.

skills.name: Magnet Release
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Rasa will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage and will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, Gold Dust Waterfall will deal 10 additional damage and 'Gold Dust Shield' will grant unpierceable damage reduction instead.

skills.name: Gold Dust Waterfall
skills.description: Edo Tensei Rasa deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes.

skills.name: Gold Dust Shield
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Rasa's team will gain 10 points of damage reduction* and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage*. All enemies will be dealt 10 damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Gold Dust Manipulation
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Rasa invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Ay
description: The former Third Raikage Ay is not pleased to be back among the living and forced to do battle. He does however have faith that the new generation of shinobi can defeat him and his peers.

skills.name: Four-Finger Nukite
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ay deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and then gains 10 points of damage reduction permanently. This skill becomes Three-Finger Nukite permanently after used.

skills.name: Lightning Release Shockwave
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ay deals 20 damage to one targeted enemy. One random enemy will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: One-Finger Nukite Spear
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ay deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Immense Speed
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ay invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Three-Finger Nukite
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ay deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage and grants 5 additional points of damage reduction with each use.

name: Edo Tensei Muu
description: Muu, the Second Tsuchikage, has been revived against his will to do battle. He will take advantage of the situation to make sure that the Hidden Rock Village benefits from this war. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Dustless Bewildering Cover
skills.description: Edo Tensei Muu targets himself or an ally, granting them 35 points of unpierceable damage reduction and making them ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that uses a new harmful skill on them will take 10 additional damage from 'Detachment of the Primitive World' permanently. This skill is invisible and stacks.

skills.name: Fission
skills.description: For 1 turn, if Edo Tensei Muu's health reaches 0, he will have his health set to 35. Also for 1 turn, 'Detachment of the Primitive World' will be improved. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Detachment of the Primitive World
skills.description: Edo Tensei Muu deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less damage with affliction-only skills. If improved, this skill will also deal 25 piercing damage to another random enemy and make that enemy deal 10 less damage with affliction-only skills for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Sensor Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Muu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Gengetsu
description: A member of the Hozuki clan and the Second Mizukage of the Hidden Mist Village, Gengetsu has been resurrected against his will to do battle. He does not want to hurt anyone but he is interested in the potential of the new generation. He will test their limits with his own skill.

skills.name: Steam Imp
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gengetsu deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and makes his allies ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Water Balloon Technique' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Major Summoning Giant Clam
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gengetsu grants 40 points of permanent destructible defense to himself and his allies. 'Hozuki Water Gun' will deal 5 additional damage for 5 turns. This skill becomes 'Mirage Illusion' for 5 turns after used.

skills.name: Hozuki Water Gun
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gengetsu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If that enemy's health drops to 10 or less, they will be instantly killed.

skills.name: Genjutsu Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Gengetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Balloon Technique
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gengetsu destroys one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 50 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Mirage Illusion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Gengetsu targets one enemy, reducing their damage by 100% for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

name: Edo Tensei Toroi
description: Toroi was a shinobi from the Hidden Cloud Village and he is back on the battlefield wreaking havoc as he goes. It will be a difficult situation for whoever may come across him.

skills.name: Magnetic Field
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi deals 20 damage to one enemy. If an enemy uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Toroi the following 2 turns they will ignore healing effects permanently. 'Magnetized Shuriken' and 'Magnetic Current' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shurikenjutsu
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. This skill becomes 'Magnetized Shuriken' for 4 turns when used.

skills.name: Magnetic Current
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi deals 10 damage to all enemies. 'Magnetic Field' and 'Magnetized Shuriken' will deal an additional 5 damage to the targets of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shuriken Threads
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Toroi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Magnetized Shuriken
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Magnetic Field' and 'Magnetic Current' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

name: Edo Tensei Nagato
description: Nagato has been summoned to do battle. He is fully aware of the fact that he is being controlled again as he was while he was living.

skills.name: Human Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn. If this enemy dies after this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Naraka Path' permanently.

skills.name: Preta Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato steals 20 health from one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Animal Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, all enemies that use a new skill on Edo Tensei Nagato will be dealt 10 piercing damage.* This skill becomes 'Deva Path' for 3 turns after used.*

skills.name: Asura Path Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Nagato invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Naraka Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato heals himself for 10 health and gains 1 white and 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Human Path' permanently after used.

skills.name: Deva Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato deals 15 damage to all enemies. After 1 turn, their physical, energy and affliction skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill will end on any enemy who uses a new harmful skill during this time.

name: Edo Tensei Fukai
description: Fukai, a shinobi from the Hidden Cloud Village and previous jinchuuriki of Gyuuki, has been summoned using the Impure World Reincarnation technique. He is powerless to stop himself from rampaging.

skills.name: Chakra Arms
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fukai deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. 'Continuous Tailed-Beast Bomb' and 'Jinchuuriki Telepathy' will deal 5 additional damage to them permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Continuous Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fukai deals 30 damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Fukai gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Jinchuuriki Telepathy
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fukai deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra Cloak Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fukai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Chiyo
description: Chiyo has been summoned back from the afterlife to fight against the Allied Shinobi Forces on the Fourth Shinobi World War. She may not like it but she will do her best to help her opponents out with information while she is forced to fight.

skills.name: White Secret Technique Ten Puppets
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo targets one enemy stunning their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 20 damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Possum
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be countered and then will take 20 damage and have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: White Secret Art Illusion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo deals 20 damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Chiyo will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 1 turn.

skills.name: Puppet Master Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chiyo invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kimimaro
description: Kimimaro was brought back to life by Kabuto and he is wreaking havoc on the Fourth Shinobi World War. He has no problem shredding his enemies as he marches up and down the battlefield.

skills.name: Dance of the Vine
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro deals 20 damage to all enemies, killing any enemy whose health drops to 5 or below.

skills.name: Dance of the Willow
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and 25 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Ten Finger Bullets
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro targets all enemies. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. Edo Tensei Kimimaro gains 15 points of damage reduction during this time. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Dance of the Larch
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kimimaro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Chukichi
description: Chukichi, a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village, is back on the battlefield and he is being forced to combat his comrades against his will.

skills.name: Hidden Frost
skills.description: For 2 turns, 'Jamming Jutsu' and 'Silent Assassination' will be improved and Edo Tensei Chukichi becomes invulnerable to physical and affliction skills.

skills.name: Jamming Jutsu
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chukichi targets all enemies, increasing the cost of all their skills by 1 random energy for 2 turns. This skill costs 1 random energy during 'Hidden Frost'.

skills.name: Silent Assassination
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chukichi deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. During 'Hidden Frost' this skill will deal an additional 10 damage and cost 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Ambush Diversion
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chukichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Fuguki
description: Suikazan Fuguki is back from the dead and on a rampage. It does not concern him who he attacks or who is controlling him. He used to be one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist, the one in power of Samehada.

skills.name: Needle Senbon
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 5 additional damage with each use. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Hardened Spikes
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ranged Suppression
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki deals 20 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. All skills that enemy uses during this time will have 1 turn of additional cooldown.*

skills.name: Hair Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fuguki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fukasaku and Shima
description: Fukasaku and Shima are known as the two great sage toads of Mount Myoboku. They taught both Jiraiya and Naruto sage jutsu and are each skilled in elemental techniques as well as genjutsu techniques.

skills.name: Frog Song
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima deal 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sand Dust
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima make their team invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Toad Confrontation Singing
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima deal 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns. If any enemy uses a new harmful skill during this time, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn.* This skill ends if Fukasaku and Shima die.

skills.name: Reverse Summoning
skills.description: This skill makes Fukasaku and Shima invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sennin Naruto
description: Naruto has trained on Mount Myoboku with Fukasaku and Shima and became one of the most powerful individuals in the ninja world. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Frog Kata Kick
skills.description: Sennin Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks. This skill becomes 'Recoil' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Summoning: Three Sage Toads
skills.description: Sennin Naruto targets all enemies for 1 turn, reducing their non-affliction damage by 100%. For 2 turns, 'Rasenshuriken' will cost 1 blue and 1 random energy instead. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This skill stacks and will be replaced by 'Rasengan Barrage' for 2 turns after used.

skills.name: Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Sennin Naruto deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 10 less damage. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sage Revitalization
skills.description: Sennin Naruto heals himself for 10 health and an additional 5 health for each skill he has used on the game. After this skill is used, Sennin Naruto will remove all healing increase and damage decrease stacks coming from his skills.

skills.name: Recoil
skills.description: Sennin Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to the enemy affected by 'Frog Kata Kick'. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Rasengan Barrage
skills.description: The following turn, the first enemy skill used on Sennin Naruto will be countered and the countered enemy will take 25 damage. This damage is not decreased by Sennin Naruto's skills. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This skill stacks and is invisible.

name: Sennin Jiraiya
description: Jiraiya uses sage chakra to improve his speed, strength and skills. The only downfall is that it alters his appearance similar to that of a toad and makes him unappealing to women, which makes it a last resort for the pervy sage. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Ider

skills.name: Bath of Burning Oil
skills.description: Sennin Jiraiya deals 20 damage and 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn counter skills used by that enemy will last 1 turn less.

skills.name: Kebari Senbon
skills.description: Sennin Jiraiya deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Chou Oodama Rasengan' will deal 5 less damage and cost 1 blue and 1 random energy instead.

skills.name: Chou Oodama Rasengan
skills.description: Sennin Jiraiya deals 45 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Arm Block
skills.description: This skill makes Sennin Jiraiya invunerable for 1 turn.

name: Hachibi Bee
description: Killer Bee has complete control of the Hachibi within him. This allows Bee to use all forms of the Hachibi's power at will making him a true killer shinobi.

skills.name: Chakra Bones
skills.description: Hachibi Bee gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction and increases his damage by 5 permanently. This skill can only be used 5 times.

skills.name: Lariat
skills.description: Hachibi Bee deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if that enemy uses a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Hachibi Bee deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Jinchuriki Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hachibi Bee invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto
description: Naruto, after giving into his rage and manifesting a fourth tail, ceases to be himself. In this state, Naruto becomes a mindless being of rage and destruction - but the price is his own life.

skills.name: Four Tails Transformation
skills.description: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 15 points of destructible defense permanently. He takes 5 affliction damage* each turn. He ignores healing effects and enemy stun effects. Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto can use 'Shockwave Smash' and 'Compressed Chakra Blast' while this skill is active. This skill becomes 'Enrage' permanently. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Shockwave Smash
skills.description: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to all enemies. This skill may only be used during 'Four Tails Transformation' and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Compressed Chakra Blast
skills.description: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill may only be used during 'Four Tails Transformation' and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Skin of Chakra
skills.description: This skill makes Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Enrage
skills.description: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto takes 10 affliction damage*. For 2 turns, 'Shockwave Smash' will deal 5 additional damage and 'Compressed Chakra Blast' will cost 1 random energy less.

name: Kyuubi Naruto (S)
description: Having gained complete control of all of the kyuubi's chakra, Naruto will be sure to rampage over every battlefield he comes across. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Rasengan Riot
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 5 health. This skill deals 5 additional damage and heals 5 additional health with each use.

skills.name: Absorption Rasengan
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies and gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage and grants 5 additional points of damage reduction with each use.

skills.name: Planetary Rasengan
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 45 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage and grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.

skills.name: Summoning: Gamahiro
skills.description: This skill makes Kyuubi Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Clone Dispersion' for 4 turns after used and cannot be used if 'Clone Dispersion' is active.

skills.name: Clone Dispersion
skills.description: Kyuubi Naruto (S) gains 1 blue energy. For 3 turns, the healing, damage reduction and destructible defense of 'Rasengan Riot', 'Absorption Rasengan' and 'Planetary Rasengan' respectively will target Kyuubi Naruto (S)'s entire team instead. This skill cannot be used while active.

name: Ohnoki
description: Ohnoki, renowned as ''Ohnoki of Both Scales'', was the Third Tsuchikage of Iwagakure. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Earth Release: Fist Rock
skills.description: Ohnoki deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Detachment of the Primitive World
skills.description: Ohnoki deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy and they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Dust Release Implode'.

skills.name: Earth Release: Light-Weight Rock
skills.description: If used on an ally, their non-strategic skills will cost 1 less random energy and they will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills for 2 turns. If used on an enemy, their non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy and that enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Floating
skills.description: This skill makes Ohnoki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dust Release Implode
skills.description: Ohnoki deals 50 damage to one enemy. If that enemy's health drops to 20 or less, they will be killed. This skill requires Detachment of the Primitive World to be active on the enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Terumi Mei
description: Terumi Mei is the Fifth Mizukage of the Hidden Mist Village. After the dreadful reign of Yagura Karatachi ended, she became Mizukage and worked tirelessly to reform internal policies and recreate diplomatic relations with other villages. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Lava Release: Melting Apparition
skills.description: Terumi Mei deals 10 damage to all enemies for 3 turns, each turn making them take 5 additional damage from physical skills.

skills.name: Water Release: Water & Lightning Dragon
skills.description: Terumi Mei deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns their physical, energy and affliction skills for 1 turn and makes them ignore healing effects also for 1 turn.

skills.name: Boil Release: Skilled Mist
skills.description: Terumi Mei targets all enemies for 4 turns, each turn destroying all destructible defense they have and dealing 5 affliction damage to them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Lava Release: Lava Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Terumi Mei invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an ally, they will also be invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, for 1 turn that enemy will be dealt 15 affliction damage if they use a new skill.

name: Ay
description: Ay is the Fourth Raikage of the Hidden Cloud Village. He is a stern and outspoken man but yet makes himself a shield for his village. Ay is known to be one of the fastest shinobi alive. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Lightning Chakra Mode
skills.description: For 4 turns, Ay will gain 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 5 points of destructible defense. During this time, 'Lightning Straight' will target one specific enemy instead of one random enemy. This skill becomes 'Guillotine Drop' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Liger Bomb
skills.description: Ay deals 25 damage to one enemy. This skill removes all stacks from 'Lightning Straight'. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Lightning Straight
skills.description: Ay deals 15 damage to one random enemy. Permanently, 'Liger Bomb' will deal 15 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Lightning Armor
skills.description: This skill makes Ay invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Guillotine Drop
skills.description: Ay targets one enemy, destroying any destructible defense they have and then dealing 25 piercing damage to them. Ay's skills will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn.

name: Kazahana Doto
description: Doto began the revolt in the Land of Snow whilst searching for a treasure, which resulted in him killing his brother, Kazahana Sousetsu who was the daimyou at the time. His niece, Kazahana Koyuki, fled from the Land of Snow, and became an actress named Yukie Fujikaze. ORIGINAL DESIGN: djackbyron

skills.name: Chakra Armour
skills.description: For 3 turns, Kazahana Doto will gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Ice Style: Black Dragon Blizzard
skills.description: Kazahana Doto deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Doto Punch' will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 10 less damage.

skills.name: Doto Punch
skills.description: Kazahana Doto deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. For 1 turn, 'Ice Style: Black Dragon Blizzard' will cost 1 red and 1 random energy instead and will deal 10 less damage.

skills.name: Armour Block
skills.description: This skill makes Kazahana Doto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Jiroubou
description: One of the members of the Sound Five, Jiroubou was reincarnated by Kabuto Yakushi along with his Sound Four teammates during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre & TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Aerial Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jiroubou deals 30 damage to one enemy. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Chakra Drain', it will deal 10 additional damage and will remove 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Chakra Drain
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jiroubou gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense and makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns. During this time, if that enemy use a new skill, Edo Tensei Jiroubou will gain 1 random energy. This skill will end if Edo Tensei Jiroubou dies.

skills.name: Earth Golem
skills.description: The following 3 turns, Edo Tensei Jiroubou's skills will cost 1 less random energy. Edo Tensei Jiroubou will gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Hand Block
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jiroubou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kidoumaru
description: One of the members of the Sound Five, Kidoumaru was reincarnated by Kabuto Yakushi along with his Sound Four teammates during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre & TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Third Eye
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Kidoumaru will ignore enemy stun effects and his skills will ignore invulnerability. Also for 1 turn, Edo Tensei Kidoumaru's allies will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Web Trap
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kidoumaru targets all enemies for 1 turn. If they use a new skill, they will have their physical and energy skills stunned for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Web Assault'. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Spider Bow: Final Arrow
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kidoumaru destroys all destructible defense one enemy has and deals 50 piercing damage to them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Falling Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kidoumaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Web Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kidoumaru targets enemies affected by 'Web Trap', dealing 20 damage and stunning their strategic skills for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Tayuya
description: One of the members of the Sound Five, Tayuya was reincarnated by Kabuto Yakushi along with her Sound Four teammates during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre & TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Summoning: Doki Demons
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tayuya deals 15 damage to all enemies and makes them deal 5 less physical and energy damage for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Doki Phantom
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Tayuya targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new harmful skill they will take 20 affliction damage and will have 1 random energy removed.

skills.name: Illusory Flute
skills.description: For 1 turn, the first harmful non-strategic skill used on Edo Tensei Tayuya or on an ally will be countered and that enemy will have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Backward Dash
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Tayuya invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon
description: Sakon and Ukon were reincarnated by Kabuto along with their Sound Four members during the Fourth Shinobi World War. Now immortals and enhanced by Kabuto's power, they're looking to wreak havoc on the battlefield. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre & TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Enhanced Gattling Punch
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During 'Parasite Demon Separation', this skill deals 50 damage instantly.

skills.name: Tag Team Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon deal 20 damage to one enemy and stun the target's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During 'Parasite Demon Separation' this skill deals 20 affliction damage* instead and fully stuns the enemy.

skills.name: Parasite Demon Separation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon will gain 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 4 turns. During this time, Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon's skills are improved and 'Enhanced Gattling Punch' will have a 2 turns cooldown.

skills.name: Summoning: Triple Rashoumon
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sakon and Ukon invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rinnegan Tobi
description: The Fourth Shinobi World War had its beginning declared by Tobi when the five Kage and the leader of the Land of Iron unanimously refused to surrender the Eight and Nine-Tails for the Infinite Tsukuyomi Plan. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path
skills.description: Rinnegan Tobi deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill removes all stacks from 'Energy Intangibility' and 'Physical Intangibility'. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Outer Path Chains
skills.description: For 2 turns, Rinnegan Tobi deals 15 affliction damage and steals 1 random energy from one enemy each turn. That enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Energy Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Rinnegan Tobi invulnerable to non-physical skills for 1 turn. Permanently, 'Demonic Statue of the Outer Path' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Physical Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Rinnegan Tobi invulnerable to non-energy skills for 1 turn. Permanently, 'Demonic Statue of the Outer Path' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

name: Mifune
description: Mifune is a samurai warrior and the General of the Land of Iron. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Mifune is placed in charge of the Fifth Divison, also known as the Special Battle Division. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Iaidou
skills.description: Mifune targets one enemy. The following turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful non-strategic skill, they will be countered and take 15 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Samurai Troops
skills.description: Mifune will deal 15 additional damage with 'Iai Beheading' and 'Flash' for 4 turns. During this time, this skill can be used to make Mifune's allies deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Iai Beheading
skills.description: Mifune deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy's health drops to 10 or below they will be instantly killed. This skill becomes 'Flash' permanently after used.

skills.name: Blade Block
skills.description: This skill makes Mifune invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Flash
skills.description: Mifune deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy's health drops to 10 or below, they will be instantly killed. This skill becomes 'Iai Beheading' permanently after used.

name: Butterfly Chouji
description: Chouji has evolved into butterfly mode by consuming all three akimichi's coloured pills, gaining incredible speed and strenght at the cost of rapid weight loss. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Chakra Wings
skills.description: Butterfly Chouji gains 10 points of damage reduction and 10 points of destructible defense. He will take 5 affliction* damage each turn. Butterfly Chouji can use his other skills while this skill is active. Butterfly Chouji's skills will deal 5 additional damage every turn with a max of 10 stacks. This skill may be used once and is permanent. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Butterfly Bullet Bombing
skills.description: Butterfly Chouji targets one enemy, destroying all destructible defense that target has and then dealing 20 damage to them. This skill cannot be countered and can only be used during 'Chakra Wings'.

skills.name: Enemy Immobilization
skills.description: Butterfly Chouji deals 5 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will be stunned and Butterfly Chouji will ignore enemy stun effects. This skill may only be used during 'Chakra Wings'.

skills.name: Effortless Block
skills.description: This skill makes Butterfly Chouji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Senju Tobirama
description: Tobirama was a member of the renowned Senju clan, who, together with his elder brother and the Uchiha clan, founded the first Shinobi village: the Hidden Leaf Village. Throughout his life, Tobirama created a lot of known shinobi techniques and became the Second Hokage. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet
skills.description: Senju Tobirama deals 30 damage to one enemy. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be lowered by 10 for 2 turns. 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Water Covering
skills.description: Senju Tobirama gains 10 points of destructible defense and 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. 'Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Flying Thunder God Slash
skills.description: Senju Tobirama deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered. For 1 turn Senju Tobirama's skills will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Sword Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Senju Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kakuzu
description: Kakuzu was reincarnated through the Edo Tensei jutsu used by Kabuto alongside some other Akatsuki members to fight in the approaching war. He's being used without the control of his own body but not against his own will. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Lightning Release: False Darkness
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kakuzu deals 10 damage and 10 piercing damage to one enemy. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 random energy.

skills.name: Five Hearts Release
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kakuzu targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, if they use a new skill, they will receive 5 additional damage from 'Lightning Release: False Darkness' for 1 turn. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Heart Steal'.

skills.name: Stretched Body
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kakuzu removes all harmful skills from himself and gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Clever Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heart Steal
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kakuzu makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable, steals 15 health from them and stuns their non-mental skills for 1 turn.

name: Puppet Sasori
description: Sasori's true form is a puppet body with a living core attached to it. In this form, he can use weapons like a flamethrower and water jets, while still controling a hundred puppets. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Flamethrower
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. If 'Water Stream Shooters' was used on this enemy the previous turn, they will have their non-affliction damage reduced by 10 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Stream Shooters
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If 'Flamethrower' was used on this enemy the previous turn, they will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Performance of a Hundred Puppets
skills.description: For 3 turns, 'Flamethrower' and 'Water Stream Shooters' will deal 10 additional damage. During this time, Puppet Sasori targets all enemies and everytime they use a new harmful skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Puppet Attack'.

skills.name: Living Core
skills.description: This skill makes Puppet Sasori invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Puppet Attack
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 25 damage to all enemies.

name: Ebisu
description: Ebisu is Konohamaru's teacher and protector. Although he's a pervert, he's also very disciplined and puts his life on the life to save his students. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Fire Release: Fire Dragon Bullet
skills.description: Ebisu deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: Kunai Throw
skills.description: Ebisu deals 15 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 damage and 5 additional damage for every 15 health they have lost. This additional damage ignores destructible defense. This skill ends if the enemy uses a new strategic skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Counter Attack
skills.description: Ebisu deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new strategic skill, they will be countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Kunai Block
skills.description: This skill makes Ebisu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Commander Gaara
description: Gaara has been chosen to be the main commander of the Allied Shinobi Forces in the Fourth Shinobi World War. With such a big responsability in his hands, he is now ready to take the war to a defining point and defeat any enemy he faces. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Sand Binding Prison
skills.description: Commander Gaara deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desert Layered Imperial Funeral Seal
skills.description: Commander Gaara deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, anytime an enemy uses a new non-strategic skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. For 1 turn, 'Sand Binding Prison' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Sand Eye
skills.description: Commander Gaara targets his team. For 1 turn, if Commander Gaara or an ally is affected by a new harmful physical or energy skill, they will gain 1 random energy. If they are affected by a new harmful strategic skill, they will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sand Dome
skills.description: This skill makes Commander Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fuu
description: Fuu is a kunoichi from Takigakure and the jinchuuriki of the Seven-Tails, Choumei, Fuu is a sweet-hearted young girl who is always looking for new friends. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Scale Powder
skills.description: Fuu deals 35 damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Ninja Art: Cocoon
skills.description: Fuu gains 50 points of destructible defense for 4 turns and during this time, she will ignore all harmful stun effects. After used, this skill will be replaced by 'Choumei Chakra Wave' for 4 turns.

skills.name: Net-Shaped Prison
skills.description: Fuu targets one ally or herself for 1 turn, countering the first harmful physical skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the countered enemy and stunning that enemy's physical skills for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Flying Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Fuu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Choumei Chakra Wave
skills.description: Fuu heals herself for 20 health and reapplies 'Ninja Art: Cocoon''s points of destructible defense for 4 turns. This skill cannot stack.

name: Anbu Kakashi
description: After everything that went down with his teammates, Kakashi decided to join Anbu. He quickly became one of the strongest members of the organization and even a captain of it. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Sharingan: Copy Technique
skills.description: For 1 turn, Anbu Kakashi targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill, then for 2 turns 'Sharingan: Copy Technique' will be replaced by the skill used by that enemy and 'Raikiri' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Earth Release: Modified Earth Wall
skills.description: Anbu Kakashi targets one enemy, stunning their skills and making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Permanently, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from energy skills. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Raikiri
skills.description: Anbu Kakashi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and makes them ignore healing effects for 1 turn.

skills.name: Quick Reflexes
skills.description: This skill makes Anbu Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shizune (S)
description: Shizune has grown up to be an experienced medical-nin as well as the Godaime Hokage's right hand. She is now a great kunoichi not only at healing skills but also at sealing abilities. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Full Team Recovery
skills.description: Shizune (S) heals herself and her allies for 15 health. If 'Four-Corner Sealing Barrier' was used the previous turn, she instead heals herself and her allies for 20 health and gains 1 random energy.

skills.name: Katsuyu Interception
skills.description: For 1 turn Shizune (S) targets herself or an ally. The first enemy that uses a new physical, energy or strategic skill on the target of this skill will be countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Four-Corner Sealing Barrier
skills.description: Shizune (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Team Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Shizune (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Guren
description: Guren is a kunoichi from the Hidden Sound Village and the leader of a group of Orochimaru's subordinates. She possesses the unique Crystal Release Kekkei Genkai.

skills.name: Crystal Dragon
skills.description: Guren deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Crystal Barrage'. This skill will be replaced by 'Crystal Barrage' permanently after used.

skills.name: Crystal Prison
skills.description: For 2 turns, one enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all helpful counters and reflect skills on them will be ignored. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Crystal Break'.

skills.name: Crystal Clone
skills.description: Guren targets herself for 2 turns, countering the first harmful skill used against her and dealing 20 piercing damage to the countered enemy. This skill is invisible and ends when triggered.

skills.name: Crystal Blade Block
skills.description: This skill makes Guren invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Crystal Barrage
skills.description: Guren deals 25 damage to all enemies. After this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Crystal Dragon'.

skills.name: Crystal Break
skills.description: Guren deal 25 piercing damage to the enemy affected by 'Crystal Prison'.

name: Young Kushina
description: Kushina is a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village originated from the Hidden Eddy Village's Uzumaki Clan. Due to her special origins, Kushina has a red colored hair that constantly puts her into trouble. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Red-Hot Habanero Rage
skills.description: Young Kushina gains 1 random energy. For 4 turns, Young Kushina gains 20 points of destructible defense and ignores enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Fierce Punch
skills.description: Young Kushina destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 damage to them. The following turn, 'Dropping Kick' will deal 20 additional damage and will first destroy its target's destructible defense.

skills.name: Dropping Kick
skills.description: Young Kushina deals 10 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Fierce Punch' will deal 10 additional damage and will stun its target's non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Skilled Landing
skills.description: This skill makes Young Kushina invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke
description: Sasuke is pushed into his maximum during the Chuunin Exams and ends awakening his Cursed Seal to fight the Sound Genin and save Sakura. Sasuke is not in full control of the seal yet, but his anger and power were already raised a lot. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Silent Blow
skills.description: Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke's skills will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Cursed Chidori
skills.description: Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. The following turn, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke's skills will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Cursed Sharingan
skills.description: For 3 turns, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke gains 10 points of damage reduction and targets all enemies. If they use a new harmful skill, they will receive 10 additional damage from 'Silent Blow' and 'Cursed Chidori' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered and will end if Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke dies.

skills.name: Dark Aura
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto
description: Team 7 faces Orochimaru in the Tenchi Bridge and Naruto enrages as he starts to think about Sasuke's dark path. With three tails released, Naruto has an explosive chakra and no control over his own actions. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Three-Tails Chakra Release
skills.description: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto gains 5 points of damage reduction and targets all enemies permanently. Everytime an enemy uses a new harmful skill, Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and stacks.

skills.name: Chakra Claw Assault
skills.description: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, their strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy. This skill can only be used if 'Three-Tails Chakra Release' is active.

skills.name: Claw Swipe
skills.description: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, their non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy. This skill can only be used if 'Three-Tails Chakra Release' is active.

skills.name: Enraged Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akatsuki Sasuke
description: After his fight against Itachi, Sasuke decides to take Tobi's advice and join Akatsuki in order to get help to destroy the Hidden Leaf Village. In exchange, he will hunt the remaining bijuus along with his Taka teammates. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Uncontrolled Amaterasu
skills.description: Akatsuki Sasuke deals 10 affliction damage to one random enemy. This skill deals 10 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Mangekyou Mastery
skills.description: For 4 turns, 'Uncontrolled Amaterasu' will target one specific enemy instead of one random enemy. Akatsuki Sasuke gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Mangekyou Genjutsu
skills.description: Akatsuki Sasuke stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 2 turns, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills.

skills.name: Sharingan Reflexes
skills.description: This skill makes Akatsuki Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sora
description: Sora is a monk in training from the Land of Fire's Fire Temple. He is a pseudo-jinchuuriki of Kurama, whose chakra was implanted in Sora's body by his own father, Kazuma. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Claw Swipe
skills.description: Sora deals 20 damage to one enemy. If this enemy was targeted by 'Beast Tearing Palm Counter' the previous turn or if they were countered by it, this skill will also remove 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Beast Tearing Palm Counter
skills.description: Sora targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, it will be countered and for 2 turns, that enemy will ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Beast Tearing Gale Palm
skills.description: Sora targets one enemy, stunning their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes.

skills.name: Monster Palm Block
skills.description: This skill makes Sora invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Izuna
description: Izuna is a member of the Hidden Leaf Village's Uchiha Clan and the younger brother of Uchiha Madara. He and his brother were renowned as the clan's two strongest members in their lifetime. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Sharingan Activation
skills.description: Uchiha Izuna gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense and targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if they use a new harmful skill, 'Fire Release: Fire Ball' will cost 2 random energies and 'Sharingan Genjutsu' will cost 1 random energy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Fire Release: Fire Ball
skills.description: Uchiha Izuna deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy and makes them deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sharingan Genjutsu
skills.description: Uchiha Izuna stuns one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 25 affliction damage. For 1 turn, the first enemy to use a new skill on Uchiha Izuna will take 15 affliction damage. This skill will be canceled if Uchiha Izuna is targeted by a new harmful skill.

skills.name: Sharingan Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Izuna invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Captain Temari
description: When the war begins, Temari is placed in the Fourth Division. Although Gaara is officially in command of the division and Shikamaru is in Gaara's proxy, Temari is the one who leads the division in the battlefield as well as the Wind Style Formation commanded by her. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Wind Release: Cast Net
skills.description: Captain Temari deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Wind Release: Reflective Wall
skills.description: This skill can be used on Captain Temari or on an ally. For 1 turn, the first non-strategic skill used on the target will be reflected back to one random enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Wind Formation Aid
skills.description: Captain Temari removes all harmful skills from herself. 'Wind Release: Cast Net' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Wind Release: Countering Wall
skills.description: For 1 turn, Captain Temari will counter all harmful skills used on her. The following turn, all enemies will take 10 damage. This skill is invisible.

name: Female Animal Path Pain
description: During his fight against Jiraiya, Nagato lost the Animal Path of Pain. He needed another body to recreate it and found it on a girl from the Hidden Rain Village named Ajisai. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Summoning: Ox
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 15 points of damage reduction* and 'Summoning: Rhino' will cost 1 random energy instead*.

skills.name: Summoning: Rhino
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain deals 20 damage to an enemy. This enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Summoning: Ox' will deal 10 additional damage to this enemy.

skills.name: Summoning: Centipede Protection
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Animal Mouth Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Female Animal Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Hayate
description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Hayate was brought back to life by Yakushi Kabuto. Hayate faces his former lover, Yugao, as he is controlled against his will and is obligated to fight her. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Secret Sword: Moonlight
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hayate deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Transparent Escape Technique
skills.description: For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Straight Slash'. During this time, everytime Edo Tensei Hayate is affected by a new harmful skill, 'Straight Slash' will deal 10 additional damage for 3 turns and Edo Tensei Hayate will be healed for 10 health before being affected by that skill.

skills.name: Invisible Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hayate targets one enemy. If this enemy's health is at 30 or below, they will be instantly killed. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Aerial Movements
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Straight Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hayate deals 10 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

name: Mecha Naruto
description: Mecha Naruto is a mechanized replica of Uzumaki Naruto; it is a mindless savage, attacking everything in its path. As a machine, he can manipulate his body in a variety of manners, even assuming a three-tailed form of its own.

skills.name: Missiles Assault
skills.description: For 3 turns, Mecha Naruto will deal 10 damage to all enemies and if they use a new skill, they will receive 5 damage. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Pinpoint'.

skills.name: Multiple-Bladed Vehicle
skills.description: Mecha Naruto targets all enemies for 3 turns dealing 10 piercing damage to them each turn that they do not use a new skill. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Drill Run'.

skills.name: Nine Tails Chakra Bomb
skills.description: Mecha Naruto targets one enemy with 50 or less health, instantly killing them. Afterwards, Mecha Naruto will die. This skill cannot be countered, reflected and ignores invulnerability. The self-death effect of this skill cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Awakening: Kyuubi Mode
skills.description: Mecha Naruto will ignore all non-damage harmful effects except energy cost changes and will deal 15 additional non-conditional damage with his skills permanently. This skill can only be used once and can only be used when Mecha Naruto has 40 or less health.

skills.name: Pinpoint
skills.description: Mecha Naruto stuns one enemy's non-strategic skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The turn this skill is used, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from damaging skills.

skills.name: Drill Run
skills.description: Mecha Naruto deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

name: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto
description: During his battle against Pain, Naruto lost control over his Kyuubi chakra after being subdued and seeing Hinata get extremely hurt. With six tails released, Naruto's physical power and destructive rage is insanely raised as the battle goes to its climax. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Kurama Manifestation Assault
skills.description: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto makes one enemy ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn and then deals 20 piercing damage to them. 'Raging Blow' and 'Charging Tailed-Beast Bomb' will cost 1 additional random energy and will be improved for 1 turn.

skills.name: Raging Blow
skills.description: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 15 damage to one enemy and makes them deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto takes 5 affliction damage*. If improved, this skill will deal 30 damage instead.

skills.name: Charging Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy then stuns their physical skills for 2 turns. This skill deals 10 additional damage for every 20 health Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto has lost. If improved, this skill will also heal Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto for half of his missing health. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Strategic Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Yota
description: Yota was a young child from an unknown clan with mysterious powers of weather manipulation. He was revived by Yakushi Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Weather Manipulation: Snow Counter
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yota targets a member of his team or an enemy. If used on a member of his team, the first harmful skill used on them the next turn will be countered. If used on an enemy, the first harmful skill used by them the next turn will be countered. The countered enemy will take 15 piercing damage and will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Weather Manipulation: Water Wave
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yota deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Weather Manipulation: Lightning Rain
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yota deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Weather Manipulation: Water Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Yota invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Chen
description: Chen was a jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and a legendary taijutsu master. He was reincarnated by Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War, wherein he faced Rock Lee, a ninja who reminded him of a former student he once had. ORIGINAL DESIGN: TheDarkLegend

skills.name: Leaf Dragon God's Offensive Charge
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chen deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For the following 2 turns, Edo Tensei Chen's non-conditional skills will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Leaf Gust
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chen targets himself or an ally for 1 turn, countering the first harmful skill used on them. The countered enemy will take 10 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Leaf Dragon God
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chen deals 30 damage to one enemy. If that enemy's health drops to 15 or below they will be instantly killed.

skills.name: Effortless Block
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chen invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uzuki Yugao
description: A member of Konoha's Anbu faction; Yugao is a hard working kunoichi who puts all her might into anything she does. In combat, Yugao mixes sword, speed, and jutsu for some devastating results.

skills.name: Hazy Moon Night
skills.description: Uzuki Yugao deals 50 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Moon Haze
skills.description: For 1 turn, Uzuki Yugao will gain 25 points of destructible defense and the next time 'Hazy Moon Night' is used, it will deal 25 additional damage. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Sealing Technique
skills.description: Uzuki Yugao targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will ignore all damage reduction, destructible defense, counters, reflects, invulnerabilities and ignores on them. This skill ignores invulnerability, and cannot be countered, reflected, or ignored.

skills.name: Yugao Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Uzuki Yugao invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Zaji
description: Zaji is a Konoha Chuunin, and one who constantly boasts about his abilities, regardless of it is warranted or not. Zaji is a sensor, using his abilities to sense out enemies and prevent them attacking.

skills.name: Chakra Sense
skills.description: For 2 turns, Zaji and his allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal original direct damage of 20 or less to an enemy in any form. The following 2 turns, 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Momentum Reversal
skills.description: For 1 turn, any new skill that the enemy team uses that deal 35 or more direct original damage on any of its versions will be countered. For 1 turn 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Exploding Chakra Kunai
skills.description: Zaji deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 1 turn after, that enemy will receive 15 damage.

skills.name: Zaji Kunai Block
skills.description: This skill makes Zaji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shiore Orochimaru
description: Shiore was a genin from the Hidden Grass Village that was killed by Orochimaru before the Chuunin Exams. He had his identity stolen by him afterwards. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Five Elements Seal
skills.description: Shiore Orochimaru targets one enemy, removing 1 random energy from them and making their skills cost 1 additional random energy for 1 turn. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Giant Snake Bind', this enemy will have 1 random energy stolen instead and the energy cost increase effect will last 2 turns instead.

skills.name: Fire Release: Fire Ball
skills.description: Shiore Orochimaru deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and cannot be ignored or removed.

skills.name: Giant Snake Bind
skills.description: Shiore Orochimaru stuns one enemy for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill can be used for no cost to deal 20 damage to the enemy affected by it.

skills.name: Snake Body Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Shiore Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Shisui
description: A member of the prestigious Uchiha clan, and the best friend of Uchiha Itachi; Shisui is a highly trained ninja that is utterly devoted to Konoha. Shisui is one of the few known ninjas capable of using one the most powerful genjutsu: Koto Amatsukami.

skills.name: Shisui: Susanoo
skills.description: Uchiha Shisui gains 45 points of permanent destructible defense. While Uchiha Shisui has destructible defense from this skill, it will be replaced by 'Tsukumo'. Using this skill will reset the stacks of 'Tsukumo'.

skills.name: Fire Release: Great Fireball
skills.description: Uchiha Shisui deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 1 turn. During 'Shisui: Susanoo' this skill will last 1 additional turn and have 1 turn of cooldown.

skills.name: Kotoamatsukami
skills.description: Uchiha Shisui targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime that enemy uses a new skill, Uchiha Shisui will gain 1 random energy. During this time, Uchiha Shisui can use this skill for no cost to change the target of the skill to a new enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Body Flicker
skills.description: For 2 turns, if a new harmful skill is used on Uchiha Shisui, he will become invulnerable to all other skills for the rest of that turn and will deal 15 damage to the enemy that used the harmful skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Tsukumo
skills.description: Uchiha Shisui deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 0 turns. For each turn that 'Shisui: Susanoo' is activated, the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn.

name: Uchiha Madara
description: The once leader of the Uchiha clan during the founding of Konoha who unfortunately disagreed with Konoha's kage on how to achieve peace. Madara was one of the few ninjas capable of matching Hashirama's power, with the use of his Mangekyou and Susanoo.

skills.name: Eternal Mangekyou
skills.description: For 4 turns, every original non-affliction damage dealt to Uchiha Madara will be capped at 25. This effect cannot be ignored. During this time, Uchiha Madara can use this skill again to ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 1 turn.

skills.name: Madara: Susanoo
skills.description: Uchiha Madara gains 55 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Eternal Mangekyou' is active, this skill will grant 75 points of destructible defense instead. While Uchiha Madara has destructible defense from this skill, it will be replaced by 'Armored Susanoo Assault'. Using this skill will reset the stacks of 'Armored Susanoo Assault'.

skills.name: Great Fire Annihilation
skills.description: Uchiha Madara deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy and 5 affliction damage to all others for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new skill that directly grants damage reduction or destructible defense, they will receive 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Emergency Susanoo Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Madara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Armored Susanoo Assault
skills.description: Uchiha Madara deals 30 damage to one enemy and 5 additional damage for each turn 'Madara: Susanoo' has been active.

name: Hiruko Sasori
