description: Hiruko is a puppet used by the Akatsuki shinobi, Sasori. Serving as a "puppet armor", it allowed Sasori to hide inside of it. Hiruko is a human puppet made from the corpse of a renowned shinobi - this puppet is also Sasori's favorite. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Poisonous Tail Stab
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sand Clone Trap
skills.description: For 1 turn, Hiruko Sasori will ignore all enemy damage dealt. Every enemy that use a new non-strategic skill on him during this time will take 10 affliction damage instantly and then take 10 affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks and ends when Hiruko Sasori dies. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Puppet Reveal
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on him then becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction skills for 3 turns. During this time, 'Poisonous Tail Stab' will be replaced by 'Eight Waves of Needles' and 'Sand Clone Trap' will be replaced by 'Prosthetic Arm Senbon'.

skills.name: Tail Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Hiruko Sasori invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eight Waves of Needles
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on his team and then deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies each turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Prosthetic Arm Senbon
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on his team and then deals 5 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to all enemies for 3 turns. When this skill ends, Hiruko Sasori will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ends if Hiruko Sasori dies.

name: Captain Kankuro
description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Kankuro is placed in charge of the Surprise Attack Division. He is now able to use his common original puppets with a higher control, along with the new machines in his arsenal, the puppets of Sasori and his parents. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Puppet Manipulation: Karasu & Kuroari
skills.description: Captain Kankuro gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be stunned for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Sasori' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Father & Mother' will cost 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Puppet Manipulation: Sasori
skills.description: Captain Kankuro gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 25 damage that ignores invulnerability. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Father & Mother' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Karasu & Kuroari' will cost 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Puppet Manipulation: Father & Mother
skills.description: Captain Kankuro gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Karasu & Kuroari' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Sasori' will cost 1 random energy less.

skills.name: Sasori's Chakra Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Captain Kankuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Karatachi Yagura
description: Karatachi Yagura is the jinchuuriki of the Three Tails, Isobu. He used to be the Fourth Mizukage of the Hidden Mist Village and is chiefly remembered for a bloody, despotic reign that contributed to the Hidden Mist being known as the "Bloody Mist". ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Wind Release: Passing Typhoon
skills.description: Karatachi Yagura removes all non-strategic skills from the battlefield and targets all enemies. For the following 2 turns, everytime an enemy uses a new physical skill, their physical skills will cost 2 additional random energies for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Coral Palm
skills.description: Karatachi Yagura deals 15 damage to one enemy each turn permanently. Their non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy while this skill is active. This skill ends when the target enemy uses a new non-strategic skill or when Karatachi Yagura dies and cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Karatachi Yagura deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Karatachi Yagura will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes.

skills.name: Chakra Skin
skills.description: This skill makes Karatachi Yagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Mangetsu
description: Mangetsu was a member of the Hidden Mist's Hozuki clan and was reputed as Second Coming of the Demon. He was a member of the previous Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and was the only one able to wield all the seven swords. Mangetsu is Suigetsu's older brother. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Mist Sword Summoning
skills.description: Edo Tensei Mangetsu targets one ally granting them 5 points of damage reduction and making them deal 5 additional non-affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Hydrification Technique
skills.description: Edo Tensei Mangetsu steals 20 health from one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, Edo Tensei Mangetsu will gain 1 random energy.

skills.name: Impure World Regeneration
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Mangetsu will be healed for 15 health each turn and will be unable to be killed.

skills.name: Battle Stance
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Mangetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Dan
description: Kato Dan is the former lover of Tsunade and also Shizune's uncle. He was reincarnated by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War, wherein he would be put to use his physical skills and his own special techniques against those of his village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Rapid Kick
skills.description: Edo Tensei Dan deals 10 damage to one enemy and makes them deal 5 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Rapid Kick' will deal 15 affliction damage to Edo Tensei Dan if used.*

skills.name: Spirit Transformation Technique
skills.description: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Dan will ignore all enemy damage dealt. The following turn, 'Spirit Transformation Technique' will deal 15 affliction damage to Edo Tensei Dan if used.*

skills.name: Spirit Travelling
skills.description: Edo Tensei Dan targets an enemy or an ally. If used on an enemy, they will take 10 damage. If used on an ally, they will be healed for 10 health. This skill deals 5 additional damage and heals 5 additional health for every 15 health Edo Tensei Dan has lost. This skill becomes 'Spirit World' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Dan invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Spirit World
skills.description: Edo Tensei Dan targets one character affected by 'Spirit Travelling', stunning them and making them invulnerable to further harmful and helpful skills for 1 turn.

name: White Snake Kabuto
description: After Orochimaru's death by Sasuke's hands, Kabuto got access to his master's chakra and has implanted it on his body, granting himself the ability of summoning and controlling snakes. In his new form, Kabuto allies himself with Tobi to wage war on the shinobi world. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Snake Strangulation
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy at the end of their next turn. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on White Snake Kabuto will take 15 affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Summoning: Manda II
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto deals 40 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, White Snake Kabuto will gain 1 additional random energy each turn. This skill ends if White Snake Kabuto dies.

skills.name: Impure World Reincarnation
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto targets all allies permanently. The next time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 35. This skill is invisible, can only be used once and cannot be removed.

skills.name: Snake Form Awakening
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto removes all enemy affliction skills from himself then becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. For the following 4 turns, 'Snake Strangulation' and 'Summoning: Manda II' will be replaced.

skills.name: Snake Bite
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto deals 25 damage to one enemy. If 'Snake Regeneration' was used the previous turn, this skill will also heal White Snake Kabuto for 25 health.

skills.name: Snake Regeneration
skills.description: White Snake Kabuto heals himself for 25 health. If 'Snake Bite' was used the previous turn, this skill will also deal 25 damage to one random enemy.

name: White Snake Orochimaru
description: Like a snake, Orochimaru has shed his skin, revealing his true form; an enormous white snake. As the White Snake, Orochimaru is able to regenerate without end, steal bodies and even revive himself as a dragon-like god.

skills.name: Regenerative Bite
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru targets one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them and healing himself for 30 health.

skills.name: Living Corpse Reincarnation
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru stuns one enemy's non-mental skills for 3 turns, each turn stealing 10 health from them. This skill will end if White Snake Orochimaru dies.

skills.name: Release of the White Snake
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru targets one ally, and if their health drops to 25 or below while White Snake Orochimaru is dead, that character will heal 75 health, will have all friendly and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Snake Wall
skills.description: This skill makes White Snake Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sword of Kusanagi
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense then deals 35 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Eight-Headed Serpent Assault
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru deals 20 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, if a new harmful stun skill is used on White Snake Orochimaru, he will deal 20 damage and stun that enemy for 1 turn and White Snake Orochimaru will ignore harmful stun effects for 1 turn.*

skills.name: Eight-Headed Serpent Recovery
skills.description: White Snake Orochimaru regrows his form from the body of his ally, healing 25 health each turn for 4 turns.

skills.name: Scales of the White Snake
skills.description: This skill makes White Snake Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Roshi
description: Roshi is a shinobi from the Hidden Rock Village and also the jinchuuriki of the Four-Tails, Son Goku. He is known to be one of the best Lava Release users of the whole ninja world, mastering it throughout his lifetime. ORIGINAL DESIGN: xXDanteXx

skills.name: Lava Release Chakra Mode
skills.description: Roshi gains 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time, any enemy that uses a new non-strategic skill on Roshi will take 5 affliction damage. For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Rising Lava Extent'.

skills.name: Scorching Stream Rock
skills.description: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to one random enemy for 2 turns. During this time, they will have the cost of their non-strategic skills increased by 1 random energy. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill targets a specific enemy instead of a random enemy.

skills.name: Scorching Lava Sea
skills.description: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill will have no cooldown.

skills.name: Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Roshi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rising Lava Extent
skills.description: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, they will take 10 affliction damage if they use a new harmful skill.

name: Han
description: Han is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village and the jinchuuriki of the Five-Tails, Kokuo. Han is a very capable close-range fighter, being able to destroy wide areas around him, while being protected by his armor and Kokuo's chakra. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Chakra Sharpening
skills.description: Han reduces the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently. For the rest of the game, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release'. During this time, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Han, he will be healed for 5 health and will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn (both effects happen before he is affected by the harmful skill).

skills.name: Boil Release: Unrivalled Strength
skills.description: Han deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release: Steam Dash'. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 20 affliction damage instead.

skills.name: Kokuou's Reactive Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Han targets one enemy. For 1 turn their skills will deal 100% less damage and if they use a new harmful skill they will take 40 piercing damage and will be stunned for 1 turn. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 15 less damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Disengage
skills.description: This skill makes Han invulnerable for 2 turns. During 'Chakra Sharpening' this skill will last 1 less turn and will have 1 less cooldown.

skills.name: Boil Release
skills.description: Han ends 'Chakra Sharpening' and gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Chakra Sharpening' permanently.

skills.name: Boil Release: Steam Dash
skills.description: Han deals 15 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn, they will take 10 additional damage from affliction-only skills. For 1 turn, Han will gain 10 points of destructible defense and will deal 5 damage to every enemy that uses a new skill on him. The following turn, this skill will remain replaced. This effect is cumulative until Han stops using this skill.

name: Sennin Kabuto
description: Due to the larger chakra reserves he gains from Orochimaru's remains, Kabuto is able to learn senjutsu from the White Snake Sage at the Ryuchi Cave. This allows him to enter Sage Mode, which he can use indefinitely due to his research of Juugo's passively ability to constantly absorb natural energy. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sage Art: White Rage
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time they cannot use skills with a counter effect (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Sage Art: Inorganic Reincarnation
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto targets all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, their physical and strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy, their energy skills will deal 10 less damage and their mental and affliction skills will be stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sage Chakra Transfer
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto targets one ally, granting them lifelink for 3 turns.

skills.name: Strange Transmission Distant Shadow
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto uses this skill. This skill will be replaced by 'Jiroubou: Arhat Fist' permanently after used.

skills.name: Jiroubou: Arhat Fist
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill becomes 'Kidoumaru: Spiral Web' after used.

skills.name: Kidoumaru: Spiral Web
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto targets himself or an ally. The following turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be countered. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill becomes 'Tayuya: Demonic Flute' after used.

skills.name: Tayuya: Demonic Flute
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto stuns all enemies' non-mental skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Sakon and Ukon: Rest' after used.

skills.name: Sakon and Ukon: Rest
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto heals himself for 40 health. This skill becomes 'Kimimaro: Dance of the Seedling Fern' after used.

skills.name: Kimimaro: Dance of the Seedling Fern
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto deals 30 damage to all enemies and reduces their physical and energy damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. This skill becomes 'Orochimaru: Regenerative Bite' after used.

skills.name: Orochimaru: Regenerative Bite
skills.description: Sennin Kabuto steals 40 health from one enemy. This skill becomes 'Jiroubou: Arhat Fist' after used.

name: Edo Tensei Hizashi
description: Hizashi is a member of a Hyuuga Clan's branch house, Hiashi's twin brother and Neji's father. At some point in Hizashi's life, he was branded with the clan's curse seal that would ensure his lifelong service to the main branch and that would seal his Byakugan when he died. He was reincarnated by Yakushi Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Takamaru

skills.name: Cursed Byakugan Activation
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Hizashi will lose 1 less energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction and his skills will do their alternate effects.

skills.name: Gentle Fist: Air Palm
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Alternate: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy, removes 1 random energy from them, and stuns them for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or on an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn and will counter all harmful skills used on him for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage and Edo Tensei Hizashi will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. Alternate: This skill's effects are all applied regardless of its target. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Gentle Fist Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hizashi invulnerable for 1 turn. Alternate: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, their damage will be reduced by 20 for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

name: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku
description: Kinkaku possesses chakra traces of the Nine-Tails mixed in due to him and his brother being swallowed and regurgitated by the Nine-Tails after surviving two weeks inside its stomach by eating some of its chakra-imbued flesh.

skills.name: Burning Tail Slam
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku deals 30 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 5 health.

skills.name: Imbued Chakra Release
skills.description: Permanently, 'Burning Tail Slam' will deal 5 additional damage after each time it is used. During this time, Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku can use this skill again to gain 1 random energy.

skills.name: Golden Bloodlust
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku gains 5 points of damage reduction permanently. He will gain 5 points of damage reduction permanently everytime he is targeted by a new harmful physical or energy skill. This skill stacks and cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Taunting Scream
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 5 less physical and energy damage and all new harmful skills used on Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku's allies will be reflected to him. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends when Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku dies.

name: Aburame Shibi
description: Shibi is a jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village, the head of the Aburame clan and the father of Shino. Just like his son, Shibi is a calm and calculated man who prefers to take down his enemies by incapacitating them, using his numerous chakra draining insects. ORIGINAL DESIGN: xXDanteXx

skills.name: Insect Dispersion
skills.description: Aburame Shibi targets all enemies, dealing 5 affliction damage to them, reducing their non-affliction damage by 5 and making them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Secret Technique: Insect Sphere' will be improved.

skills.name: Strategical Insect Placement
skills.description: For 2 turns, any enemy that uses a new skill on Aburame Shibi will lose 1 random energy, take 5 affliction damage instantly and then take 5 affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Secret Technique: Insect Sphere
skills.description: Aburame Shibi deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. If 'Insect Dispersion' was used the previous turn, this skill will also steal 1 random energy from the target each turn.

skills.name: Self-Protective Insect Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shibi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Samehada Bee
description: After his encounter with Kisame, Killer Bee has became the owner of the legendary sword of the mist, Samehada. With it on his side, Bee is able to use his arsenal of swords in a more efficient way, and combo them with Samehada's ability to absorb chakra. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Dizzy

skills.name: Samehada Bite
skills.description: Samehada Bee deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Sealing Technique: Octopus Hold
skills.description: Samehada Bee deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Samehada Kenjutsu
skills.description: For 4 turns, Samehada Bee will have 10 points of damage reduction, 'Samehada Bite' and 'Sealing Technique: Octopus Hold' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Partial Beast Hand Protection' will cost 1 random energy instead. During this time, Samehada Bee will gain 1 random energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him.

skills.name: Partial Beast Hand Protection
skills.description: For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on Samehada Bee will be countered, the countered enemy will take 20 damage and Samehada Bee will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

name: Edo Tensei Asuma
description: Asuma was revived by Kabuto in order to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War. He is sent to fight the First Division and faces his former students as he tries to teach them one final lesson. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning
skills.description: Edo Tensei Asuma targets all enemies making them unable to use skills with stun or counter effects (this is a stun effect) and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The following turn, they will take 15 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning - Ignite
skills.description: Edo Tensei Asuma deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to non-physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Experienced Taijutsu
skills.description: Edo Tensei Asuma deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 3 turns they will take 5 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite' and 'Ash Pile Burning' will last 1 additional turn on them. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Constant Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Asuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Butterfly Chouji (S)
description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Chouji has to overcome his fears in order to make Asuma's last lesson worth it and defend the Allied Shinobi Forces. He now has full control of the Akimichi's special techniques, able to perform giant-form attacks covered by his butterfly chakra. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing
skills.description: Butterfly Chouji (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and then makes them deal 5 less damage with physical skills permanently. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if it's used. This skill ends if Butterfly Chouji (S) dies.

skills.name: Giant Hand Prison
skills.description: Butterfly Chouji (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' will be applied one more time if it's used.

skills.name: Chakra Overcharge
skills.description: For 2 turns, Butterfly Chouji (S) will gain 1 random energy everytime a new harmful skill is used on him. During this time, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' and 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if they are used. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Offensive Cover
skills.description: This skill makes Butterfly Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yamanaka Inoichi
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Yamanaka clan, and the father of Ino, Inoichi is a very calm, analytical man who can solve nearly any dilemma. While fighting, Inoichi much prefers targeting an enemy's mind, tearing it apart while remaining unscratched himself.

skills.name: Psycho Mind Transmission
skills.description: Yamanaka Inoichi targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns this enemy will be unable to use any counter or reflect skills (this is a stun effect). This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sensing Water Sphere
skills.description: Yamanaka Inoichi targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new harmful skill, this skill will gain one stack and Yamanaka Inoichi will be healed for 10 health. During this time, Yamanaka Inoichi can use this skill again for 1 random energy to instead gain 1 random energy for each stack on it and also be healed for 5 health for each stack on it and this skill will end.

skills.name: Mental Invasion
skills.description: For 4 turns, all invulnerability skills one target enemy uses will last 1 less turn. During this time, everytime a new harmful mental or strategic skill is used on this enemy, the user of that skill will become invulnerable to physical, energy and affliction skills for 1 turn; this invulnerability can only be ignored by skills that directly ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Mobile Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Inoichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Yugito
description: Yugito was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. She was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Cat Claw
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yugito deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used, 'Fire Release: Mouse Hairball' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

skills.name: Fire Release: Mouse Hairball
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Yugito deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and 10 affliction damage to all other enemies. The main target will have their physical and energy skills stunned each turn for 2 turns. The other enemies' stun skills will last 1 turn less for 2 turns.

skills.name: Matatabi Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yugito removes all stun skills on herself, grants herself 30 points of destructible defense and grants her allies 15 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, her team will ignore enemy stun effects. This skill becomes 'Flaming Punch' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Cat Agility
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Yugito invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Flaming Punch
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yugito deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and removes all harmful stun skills on herself and her allies. For 1 turn, any direct stun skill used on the target will last 1 additional turn on them.

name: Edo Tensei Yagura
description: Yagura was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. He was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Release: Water Mirror
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yagura targets himself or an ally. The next turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be reflected back to one random enemy. For 1 turn, all destructible defense skills used by the target of this skill will grant 15 additional destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Coral Palm
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yagura targets one enemy. For 1 turn, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. For 2 turns, they will take 20 damage. For 3 turns, all destructible defense skills they use will grant 15 less destructible defense. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Isobu Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yagura destroys all enemies' destructible defense and then grants himself and his allies 25 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, all destructible defense skills Edo Tensei Yagura's team use will grant 5 additional destructible defense. This skill becomes 'Leaping Bullet Shell Tower' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Yagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Leaping Bullet Shell Tower
skills.description: Edo Tensei Yagura deals 30 damage to one enemy and grants himself and his allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

name: Edo Tensei Itachi
description: Following his death, Itachi's motives were revealed to be more complicated than they seemed and that his actions were only ever in the interest of his brother and village, making him remain a loyal shinobi of the Hidden Leaf Village to the very end. He was reincarnated by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Amaterasu
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy each turn and makes them ignore healing effects permanently. This skill ends when either Edo Tensei Itachi dies or uses any new skill.

skills.name: Crow Illusion
skills.description: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Itachi will ignore all harmful effects except energy cost changes. During this time, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on him will have their non-affliction damage lowered by 15 that turn and for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Izanami
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, they will be countered. If successfully countered, all their skills will be replaced by ' Redemption' for 2 turns and during this time, everytime they don't use a new skill, they will take 25 piercing damage. This skill is invisible until triggered.

skills.name: Skeleton Susanoo Activation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense and for 1 turn he will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage. The first time this skill is used, Edo Tensei Itachi's other skills will be replaced. The second time this skill is used, they will be replaced back.

skills.name: Yasaka Magatama
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, ' Skeleton Grip' will also stun its target for 1 turn.

skills.name: Skeleton Grip
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Yasaka Magatama' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Totsuka Sword Sealing
skills.description: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Redemption
skills.description: This skill makes one enemy invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Masked Man
description: No one knows anything about this man in the yellow mask, except that he was responsible for the attack to Konoha by Kurama's claws that resulted on the death of the Yondaime Hokage and his wife. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Hidden Chain Wrap
skills.description: Masked Man deals 20 damage to one enemy. If 'Kamui: Dimensional Placement' isn't active on that enemy, any direct stun skill used on them this turn will stun them for 1 additional turn. If it is active on them, this skill will instead deal 35 damage.

skills.name: Kamui: Dimensional Placement
skills.description: Masked Man targets himself and one enemy, making both invulnerable to harmful skills for 3 turns. During this time, Masked Man's skills will ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Kurama
skills.description: Masked Man deals 25 damage to all enemies. Until Masked Man dies, everytime they use a new physical, energy or mental skill, they will deal 5 less damage with skills with that specific class for 2 turns (this is applied before the skill they used takes effect). This skill becomes 'Kurama's Tailed-Beast Bomb' permanently after used.

skills.name: Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Masked Man invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Kurama's Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Masked Man deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn.

name: True Form Kakuzu
description: Kakuzu's real body is made of rag and when he releases it, his offensive power is increased by a huge amount. In this form, Kakuzu appears to be a monster who will pierce everything in its path. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger & Dizzy

skills.name: Earth Grudge Fear
skills.description: For 1 turn, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy and True Form Kakuzu's and his allies' skills will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Strange Mask Exploding Flame
skills.description: True Form Kakuzu deals 50 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Heart Link
skills.description: True Form Kakuzu targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable and all new harmful skills used on True Form Kakuzu will be reflected to them. For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Piercing Tendrils'.

skills.name: Tendril Defense
skills.description: This skill makes True Form Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn. If this skill is used one turn after 'Earth Grudge Fear', True Form Kakuzu will also gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Piercing Tendrils
skills.description: True Form Kakuzu targets the enemy affected by 'Heart Link', dealing 20 piercing damage to them.

name: Satori
description: Satori is a demonic bird-like creature that has existed since the time of Rikudou Sennin. It's a puppet of the Box of Ultimate Bliss that can shoot its feathers and giant spheres at high speeds which have powerful piercing and explosive power. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Box of Ultimate Bliss
skills.description: Satori targets all characters permanently. They will ignore all friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities on them. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 10 piercing damage to all enemies and heal Satori and its allies by 10 health. This skill ends if Satori dies or if it's removed from any character affected.

skills.name: Feather Launching
skills.description: Satori targets all characters, dealing 10 damage to them permanently. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 15 damage to all enemies and make them ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill ends if Satori dies or if it's removed from any character affected.

skills.name: Giant Sphere
skills.description: Satori deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Giant Sphere' will permanently deal 15 less damage and will cost 1 less random energy. These effects stack but are only applied on the first 2 usages of this skill.

skills.name: Speed Flight
skills.description: Satori removes all harmful skills from itself. For 1 turn, Satori will ignore all harmful effects except energy cost changes.

name: Edo Tensei Madara
description: Madara was brought back to life by Kabuto to be his most impressive and powerful weapon against the Allied Shinobi Forces. He is ready to show his strength against the ninja world and use his mastery in the Uchiha techniques once again. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will have 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. This skill becomes 'Great Fire Annihilation' permanently after used.

skills.name: Rinnegan
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will deal 5 affliction damage to any enemy that uses a new skill on him. This skill becomes 'Tengai Shinsei' permanently after used.

skills.name: Susanoo
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will gain 5 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. This skill becomes 'Yasaka Magatama' permanently after used.

skills.name: Hashirama's Cells
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will be healed for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Nativity of a World of Trees' permanently after used.

skills.name: Great Fire Annihilation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. If 'Rinnegan' is active, for 2 turns any member of Edo Tensei Madara's team that target any of the affected enemies with a new skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same main class as the skill they used; this invulnerability can only be ignored by skills that directly ignore invulnerability. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

skills.name: Tengai Shinsei
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara deals 50 damage to one enemy. After 3 turns, this enemy will take another 50 damage. If 'Susanoo' is active, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Edo Tensei Madara will ignore enemy stun effects for this skill's duration. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

skills.name: Yasaka Magatama
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Hashirama's Cells' is active, then this skill will first make the enemy ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Nativity of a World of Trees
skills.description: Edo Tensei Madara deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time, Edo Tensei Madara's allies will ignore energy drain or removal effects. If 'Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan' is active, Edo Tensei Madara will also gain 1 red energy and then will be healed for 10 health each turn for 4 turns. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

name: Uchiha Obito (S)
description: Following the destruction of his mask during the Fourth Shinobi World War, Tobi was revealed to be Uchiha Obito, the one everyone thought that was dead long ago. He allies himself with the reincarnated version of Madara in order to make the Infinite Tsukuyomi work. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Kamui Dimension
skills.description: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Blast Wave Wild Dance' and 'Wood Release: Roots' will also stun their targets' physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn if used. This skill is considered a stun, energy drain and invulnerability skill.

skills.name: Blast Wave Wild Dance
skills.description: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Kamui Dimension' and 'Wood Release: Roots' will also deal 10 affliction damage to their targets if used. This skill is considered a stun, energy drain and invulnerability skill.

skills.name: Wood Release: Roots
skills.description: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 1 turn, 'Kamui Dimension' and 'Blast Wave Wild Dance' will also remove 1 random energy from their targets if used. This skill is considered a stun, energy drain and invulnerability skill.

skills.name: Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Obito (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Uchiha Obito (S)'s other skills will also make him invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Roshi
description: Roshi was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. He was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Scorching Armored Fist
skills.description: Edo Tensei Roshi deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. For 2 turns, this enemy's affliction skills will be stunned. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Flower-Fruit Mountain
skills.description: Edo Tensei Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn their affliction-only skills will deal 10 less damage and if they use a new skill, they will permanently take 5 additional damage from 'Scorching Armored Fist'. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Son Goku Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Roshi removes all enemy affliction skills from his team and then grants them 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill becomes 'Devour' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Defensive Tail Apparition
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Roshi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Edo Tensei Roshi deals 30 damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage* each following turn permanently. That enemy's affliction skills will be stunned for 2 turns. This skill stacks.

name: Edo Tensei Han
description: Han was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. He was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Erupting Strong Foot
skills.description: Edo Tensei Han deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's counter effects will last 1 turn less. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Chakra Arms
skills.description: Edo Tensei Han deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes them ignore all helpful counters and reflects on them for 1 turn. 'Erupting Strong Foot' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Kokuou Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Han targets his team, granting them 5 points of permanent destructible defense each turn for 4 turns. During this time, everytime any ally uses a new skill 'Horn Breaking' will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn. This effect stacks. This skill becomes 'Horn Breaking' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Defensive Tail Apparition
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Han invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Horn Breaking
skills.description: Edo Tensei Han deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, the counter effects of their skills will last 2 turns less. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Black Zetsu
description: Black Zetsu is the physical manifestation of Ootsutsuki Kaguya's will. To further its plans, it posed as Uchiha Madara's manifested will and then partnered with White Zetsu to become the Akatsuki member known simply as Zetsu. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Body Coating
skills.description: Black Zetsu targets one enemy until Black Zetsu himself dies. Everytime that enemy uses a new skill, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn and the skill they used will replace 'Body Coating' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Wood Release: Emerging Forest
skills.description: Black Zetsu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Event Recording
skills.description: Black Zetsu targets himself and his allies. For 1 turn, they will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Mayfly
skills.description: This skill makes Black Zetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Utakata
description: Utakata was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. He was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Explosive Bubble
skills.description: Edo Tensei Utakata deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy, who will then take 5 piercing damage for the following 3 turns. During this time, everytime this enemy uses a new skill, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Leech Gap
skills.description: Edo Tensei Utakata targets one enemy, stealing 15 health from them each turn for 2 turns. During this time*, 'Speed Dodge' will last 2 turns instead if used. For 1 turn, the target enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Saiken Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Utakata makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 4 turns. Edo Tensei Utakata's team will become invulnerable to non-energy skills for 1 turn and will gain 15 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. This skill becomes 'Wisdom Wolf Decay' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Speed Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Utakata invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Wisdom Wolf Decay
skills.description: Edo Tensei Utakata deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Edo Tensei Fuu
description: Fuu was brought back to life by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War along with the other fallen jinchuuriki. She was made one of the new paths of Pain, working with Tobi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Bug Bite
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuu deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

skills.name: Scale Powder
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and 15 piercing damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns.

skills.name: Choumei Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuu targets herself and her allies granting them 15 points of permanent destructible defense and 10 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, Edo Tensei Fuu's allies will have the cooldown of their strategic skills reduced by 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Majestic Sting' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Shared Rinnegan Awareness
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fuu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Majestic Sting
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuu deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 3 turns. If they don't use a new skill, they will take 15 piercing damage.

name: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto
description: During his fight against Tobi, Naruto got to combine his Sennin & Kurama Chakra Cloak modes in order to strenghten his abilities. Capable of creating a yellow projection of Kurama's body, Naruto becomes one of the fastest shinobi alive while in this mode. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger & Dizzy

skills.name: Kurama Chakra Flow
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto heals himself for 15 health and increases the damage of his skills by 10 for the rest of the game. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will be unable to be killed.

skills.name: Kurama Energy Link
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one ally for the rest of the game. During this time, whenever they use a new harmful skill, they will be healed for 15 health. This skill becomes 'Chakra Transfer' for 2 turns after used. This skill ends if Sennin Kyuubi Naruto dies and cannot be removed. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb Charge
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto deals 25 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all others. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will take 10 damage. This skill becomes 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Blast' for 2 turns after used.

skills.name: Full Body Kurama Awakening
skills.description: For 1 turn, Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will be unable to be killed. For the rest of the game, everytime Sennin Kyuubi Naruto uses a new skill, he will gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill becomes 'Tailed-Beast Chakra Arms' permanently after used.

skills.name: Chakra Transfer
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one ally, granting them 1 blue energy and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be reduced by 1 turn.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb Blast
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 35 damage to them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Chakra Arms
skills.description: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

name: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke
description: To avoid complete blindness, Sasuke decided to take Tobi's advice and steal Itachi's eyes so he could achieve the Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan. With Sharingan's final form, Sasuke can use his powers repeatedly without exhausting himself. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger & Dizzy

skills.name: Armored Susanoo Activation
skills.description: For 6 turns, Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. During this time, he will also gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense each turn and will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes. This skill becomes 'Eternal Mangekyou Insight' for 6 turns after used. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Summoning: Aoda
skills.description: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 2 additional random energies. This skill deals 10 additional damage with each use. During 'Armored Susanoo Activation' this skill becomes 'Blaze Release: Susanoo Kagutsuchi'.

skills.name: Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi
skills.description: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 5 affliction damage to one enemy. After each use, this skill will deal 15 additional affliction damage and cost 1 additional random energy for the rest of the game. This skill can only be used 4 times.

skills.name: Area Control
skills.description: This skill makes Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn. During 'Armored Susanoo Activation', he will also ignore all enemy damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eternal Mangekyou Insight
skills.description: The following turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke will have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and becomes 'Blaze Release: Yasaka Magatama' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Blaze Release: Susanoo Kagutsuchi
skills.description: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, if that enemy does not use a new skill, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage* that cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Blaze Release: Yasaka Magatama
skills.description: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 100 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Temujin
description: Temujin is a young man from an unknown continent. Born as the heir of the main branch of his clan, Temujin has the ability to create and seal away the Stone of Gelel. Temujin is extremely loyal to Haido; wishing to be of use to him, Temujin trained hard to become a powerful fighter. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Raging Thunder
skills.description: Temujin targets one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 affliction damage. For 1 turn, their strategic skills will last 1 turn less. Permanent strategic skills will instead last 9 turns. This skill is invisible. This skill becomes 'Raging Thunder Blast' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Raging Thunder Threat
skills.description: Temujin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new skill, they will take 30 affliction damage. For 1 turn, this enemy's physical or energy skills will last 1 turn less. Permanent physical or energy skills will instead last 9 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Retractable Shield
skills.description: For 1 turn, Temujin will counter all harmful physical and energy skills used on him. The countered enemies' physical and energy skills will permanently deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sword Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Temujin invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Raging Thunder Blast
skills.description: Temujin deals 25 affliction damage to the enemy affected by 'Raging Thunder'. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on Temujin will take 15 affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

name: Monga
description: Monga is a shinobi from the Hidden Rock Village, member of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Third Division. Monga is skilled in the field of Earth Release techniques. He is capable of using earth walls of varying sizes for defense as well as trapping an opponent. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth and Stone Bamboo Shoot
skills.description: Monga deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 4 turns. For 1 turn 'Earth Release: Earth-Style Wall' will have no cooldown. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Earth Release: Earth-Style Wall
skills.description: Monga grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that target them with a new skill will take 10 damage. This skill grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.

skills.name: Earth's Raw Strength
skills.description: Monga deals 30 damage to one enemy and then grants his allies 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.

skills.name: Earth-Style Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Monga invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Shin
description: Shin is an orphan from the Hidden Leaf Village who was recruited into the Root Division of the village's Anbu and then became Sai's adoptive brother. Although carrying a disease, Shin was very capable in battle. He was reincarnated by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Tanto Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Shin deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Implanted Bomb' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks, ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Human Shield
skills.description: Edo Tensei Shin targets one ally. For 3 turns, all harmful skills used on this ally will be reflected to Edo Tensei Shin.

skills.name: Implanted Bomb
skills.description: Edo Tensei Shin targets all enemies permanently. Once Edo Tensei Shin dies, they will take 15 affliction damage. This skill's damage dealt is only increased by Edo Tensei Shin's skills if he dies to an enemy skill. This skill cannot be removed and becomes 'Intended Impure Vanishing' permanently after used.

skills.name: Quickened Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Shin invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Intended Impure Vanishing
skills.description: Edo Tensei Shin takes 20 affliction damage* and gains 1 random energy. 'Implanted Bomb' will deal 15 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.

name: Anbu Captain Squad
description: During the attack to the Hidden Leaf Village by Pain, three Konoha Anbu Captains got together to defend their village. Capable of using a variety of ninjutsu techniques, they are ready to do everything it's needed to stop Akatsuki from rampaging. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Release: Four Pillar Bind
skills.description: Anbu Captain Squad deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies permanently. During this time, they will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. If 'Earth Release: Dropping Lid' and 'Wind Release: Wind Cutter' are both active, this skill will also make the enemies ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Earth Release: Sticky Earth Drop' permanently after used and ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

skills.name: Earth Release: Dropping Lid
skills.description: Anbu Captain Squad stuns all enemies for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, their physical skills will have their cooldowns increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks. If 'Lightning Release: Four Pillar Bind' and 'Wind Release: Wind Cutter' are both active, this skill will also deal 20 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

skills.name: Wind Release: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Anbu Captain Squad deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For the rest of the game, their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy. This skill stacks. If 'Lightning Release: Four Pillar Bind' and 'Earth Release: Dropping Lid' are both active, Anbu Captain Squad's team will be grant 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 2 turns. This skill ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

skills.name: Highground Advantage
skills.description: This skill makes Anbu Captain Squad invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Release: Sticky Earth Drop
skills.description: Anbu Captain Squad gains 2 random energies and then targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new skill, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Fire Release: Fired Pottery' permanently. This skill becomes 'Fire Release: Fired Pottery' permanently after used. This skill ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

skills.name: Fire Release: Fired Pottery
skills.description: Anbu Captain Squad deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Tenzou
description: Tenzou is one of the sixty children that were abducted by Orochimaru to be his test subjects. He was injected with the First Hokage's DNA in the hopes that he could replicate the First's ability to use Wood Release. Tenzou ended up being taken by Danzo, then he was recruited into the Anbu's Root division. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Pillar Creation
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will take 25 damage and then will deal 5 less non-affliction damage for 2 turns. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will gain 25 points of destructible defense and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Wood Release: Locking Dome
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will deal 15 less non-affliction damage and will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills for 2 turns. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will gain 20 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Tower
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned for 2 turns and will permanently deal 10 less non-affliction damage. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will become invulnerable for 2 turns and will permanently deal 10 additional non-affliction damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Anbu Disguise
skills.description: This skill makes Tenzou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Anbu Itachi
description: Itachi joined Konoha's Anbu from a very young age, following orders directly from the Hokage and the village's elders. What he didn't know is that something would be requested to him later, what would change his life and his clan's forever. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Betrayal
skills.description: Anbu Itachi deals 10 affliction damage* to his allies and then increases his non-conditional damage by 5 permanently. For 2 turns, Anbu Itachi will gain 1 random energy each turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Mangekyou Genjutsu' permanently after used.

skills.name: Peeping Attack
skills.description: Anbu Itachi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and for 1 turn their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy.

skills.name: Genjutsu Surveillance
skills.description: Anbu Itachi gains 1 random energy and targets all enemies, making their stun and counter skills last 1 turn less for 1 turn. For 3 turns, Anbu Itachi will have 10 points of damage reduction and this skill will be replaced by 'Illusory Crow Replacement'.

skills.name: Aerial Backflip
skills.description: This skill makes Anbu Itachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mangekyou Genjutsu
skills.description: Anbu Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, they will deal 100% less damage* and their stun and counter skills will last 1 turn less*. The following turn, this enemy will take 25 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible on the first turn.

skills.name: Illusory Crow Replacement
skills.description: Anbu Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, they will be countered and take 10 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

name: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S)
description: Hashirama was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Allied Shinobi Forces against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. He is willing to witness the new generation's full power and finally defeat his archenemy for good. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sage Mode Activation
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) will remove all harmful skills from him each turn. This skill becomes 'Sage Mode: Self-Enhance' for 4 turns after used.

skills.name: Sage Art: Gate of the Great God
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 2 random energies from them. This skill requires 'Sage Mode Activation' to be active.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Human
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 35 damage to one enemy. For 4 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Wood Release: Wood Dragon'.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Clones
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, if the target of this skill is targeted by a new harmful stun skill, they will ignore enemy stun effects for 4 turns and will gain 1 red energy instantly. This skill is invisible on the first turn and cannot be used on a target already affected by it.

skills.name: Sage Mode: Self-Enhance
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) reduces the cooldown of his skills by 1 turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Wood Release: Wood Dragon
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

name: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S)
description: Tobirama was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Allied Shinobi Forces against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. As he watches the development of his own special techniques by the hands of other shinobi, he is eagling to bury Madara once and for all. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Heavenly Weeping
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If their health drops to 70 or below, they will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn. If it drops to 50 or below, they will also be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. If it drops to 30 or below, they will also be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Flying Thunder God: Ally Marking
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets his allies. For 1 turn, the non-conditional stun, invulnerability and counter effects of their skills will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Revolving Flying Thunder God
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Original Shadow Clone Technique
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets himself or an ally. The target gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, every enemy that uses a new skill on them will permanently take 15 additional damage from 'Mutually Multiplying Explosive Tags'. This skill is invisible on the first turn, stacks and becomes 'Mutually Multiplying Explosive Tags' for 2 turns after used.

skills.name: Mutually Multiplying Explosive Tags
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Edo Tensei Hiruzen
description: Hiruzen was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Allied Shinobi Forces against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. Hiruzen will do everything in his power to aid his village in the battle for the world's salvation. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Single Shadow Clone Creation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hiruzen gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, if a new harmful skill is used on Edo Tensei Hiruzen, he will become invulnerable to all other harmful skills for the rest of that turn. After the 4th time this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Five Release Great Combo' permanently.

skills.name: Giant Shuriken Summoning
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, any member of Edo Tensei Hiruzen's team that target them with a new skill will be grant 5 points of permanent destructible defense. 'Giant Shuriken Shadow Clone' will last 1 additional turn the next time it's used. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Giant Shuriken Shadow Clone
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, any member of Edo Tensei Hiruzen's team that target them with a new skill will be grant 10 points of damage reduction that cannot be ignored for 1 turn.* This skill stacks.

skills.name: Chakra Maneuver
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hiruzen invulnerable for 1 turn. Edo Tensei Hiruzen gains 1 green energy.

skills.name: Five Release Great Combo
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies each turn permanently. This skill can only be used once.

name: Edo Tensei Minato
description: Minato was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Allied Shinobi Forces against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. He is willing to meet and help his son on the battle for the whole ninja world's existence. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Yellow Flash's Surveillance
skills.description: Edo Tensei Minato targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new harmful skill, 'Red Chakra Transfer' will heal 5 additional health and 'Hiraishin Rasengan' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Red Chakra Transfer
skills.description: Edo Tensei Minato heals one ally for 0 health and takes 5 affliction damage*. For 1 turn, this ally cannot be killed. During 'Sage Mode Activation', this skill will also grant Edo Tensei Minato 1 blue energy.

skills.name: Hiraishin Rasengan
skills.description: Edo Tensei Minato deals 0 damage to one enemy and takes 5 affliction damage*. For 1 turn, this enemy will ignore healing effects. During 'Sage Mode Activation', this skill will also grant Edo Tensei Minato 1 red energy.

skills.name: Sage Mode Activation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Minato becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 3 turns. During this time, 'Red Chakra Transfer' and 'Hiraishin Rasengan' will have their costs doubled and their values increased by 30.

name: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato
description: To save his village from Kurama's rage, Minato sealed its dark half on himself shortly before his death. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Minato entered Kyuubi Chakra Mode, what strenghtens his abilities and allows him to use jinchuuriki techniques. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra-Cloaked Shadow Clones
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Custom Kunai Addition' and 'Extendable Chakra Arms'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will target all enemies instead and will kill any enemy whose health drops to 5 or below.

skills.name: Custom Kunai Addition
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Chakra-Cloaked Shadow Clones' and 'Extendable Chakra Arms'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time, 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will deal 10 additional damage and stun its target's strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Extendable Chakra Arms
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Chakra-Cloaked Shadow Clones' and 'Custom Kunai Addition'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time, 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will make Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato invulnerable for 1 turn and will ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Dark Kurama Awakening
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, this skill will be replaced by 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' and any enemy who targets Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato with a new skill will deal 5 less non-affliction damage that turn.

skills.name: Flying Thunder God Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Dark Kurama Rasengan
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill removes all stacks from 'Flying Thunder God Slash'.

name: Corrupted Obito
description: After spending some time with Madara, Obito decides to get back to his teammates with the help of Guruguru's regenerative body. However, a dark path for both Kakashi and Rin awaits their old friend, a path that would awake a disrupture on his mind and dreams. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Reactionary Intangibility
skills.description: For 1 turn, Corrupted Obito will ignore all enemy damage dealt. This skill lasts 2 additional turns for each ally that is dead. This skill deals 5 affliction damage* to Corrupted Obito for each ally that is dead. This skill cannot be used while active and ends when 'Wood Release: Cutting Technique' is used.

skills.name: Wood Release: Cutting Technique
skills.description: Corrupted Obito deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. The following turn, they will receive an additional 30 piercing damage. The initial damage of this skill will be increased by 10 for each ally that is dead.

skills.name: Raging Melee Combat
skills.description: Corrupted Obito deals 20 damage to one enemy. This damage is increased by 10 for each ally that is dead. This skill deals 10 affliction damage* to Corrupted Obito for each ally that is dead.

skills.name: Wood Release: Hellish Chaos
skills.description: Corrupted Obito applies 'Reactionary Intangibility' on himself and deals 0 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each ally that is dead. If an enemy's health drops to 20 or below, they will deal 10 less non-affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks.

name: Nara Ensui
description: Ensui is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village's Nara clan. Ensui is very skilled with his clan's secret techniques, able to use the Shadow Imitation Shadow Bind technique to attach their shadow to a target to extend its range and catch its actual target. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Nara Ensui stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on any member of Nara Ensui's team will be stunned for 1 additional turn by 'Shadow Imitation' permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shadow Sewing
skills.description: Nara Ensui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Shadow Imitation' will stun them for 1 additional turn permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shadow Imitation Shadow Bind
skills.description: Nara Ensui gains 1 white energy and targets one ally. For 3 turns, if this ally uses a new non-strategic skill, Nara Ensui will deal 10 additional damage that turn. If they use a new stun skill, Nara Ensui will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. If they use a new invulnerability skill, Nara Ensui will become invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill ends if Nara Ensui dies.

skills.name: Battlefield Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Ensui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yahiko
description: Yahiko was a shinobi from the Hidden Rain Village and the leader of the original Akatsuki organization. Alongside his fellow war orphans, Nagato and Konan, he founded and led Akatsuki in an attempt to bring peace. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Squad Leader
skills.description: Yahiko targets himself and his allies for the rest of the game. If an ally uses a new friendly skill, 'Water Release: Wild Water Wave' will deal 5 additional damage that turn. If Yahiko dies, his allies will permanently deal 5 additional non-affliction damage. This skill will be replaced by 'Diversion' permanently after used.

skills.name: Water Release: Wild Water Wave
skills.description: Yahiko deals 15 damage to all enemies and then 10 piercing damage to one random enemy.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Pillar
skills.description: For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses any new skill on Yahiko will have their damage reduced by 15 that turn and for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sharp Analysis
skills.description: This skill makes Yahiko invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Diversion
skills.description: Yahiko targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful skills used on that ally will be reflected to Yahiko. This skill is invisible.

name: Byakugou Sakura
description: After being trained by Tsunade, Sakura started storing chakra on her forehead to release the Strength of a Hundred Seal during the Fourth Shinobi World War. Now capable of fighting side by side with her teammates, Sakura becomes one of the strongest kunoichi and greatest medical-nin the world has ever seen. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Cherry Blossom Impact
skills.description: Byakugou Sakura deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies. Her team will be healed for 5 health.

skills.name: Ninja Art: Shared Creation Rebirth
skills.description: Byakugou Sakura targets one ally. For 2 turns, they will be healed for 10 health each turn and will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes. This skill ends if Byakugou Sakura dies.

skills.name: Summoning: Katsuyu
skills.description: Byakugou Sakura heals her team for 10 health each turn for the rest of the game. This skill becomes 'Katsuyu: Immense Network Healing' permanently after used and ends if Byakugou Sakura dies.

skills.name: Yin Seal: Release
skills.description: This skill makes Byakugou Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Katsuyu: Immense Network Healing
skills.description: Byakugou Sakura heals her team for 10 health. This skill heals 5 additional health with each use. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Guruguru
description: Guruguru is a version of Zetsu, whose nickname was given by Obito due to the swirl pattern of his face. He is the one who helps Obito against the forces of the Mist Village shinobi who killed Rin. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, he takes over Yamato's body to fight against the Allied Shinobi Forces. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Wood Release: Cutting Technique
skills.description: Guruguru deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Body Reconstruction
skills.description: Guruguru removes all enemy affliction skills from him and then heals himself for 25 health.

skills.name: Kanzeon Lotus King
skills.description: Guruguru grants his team 40 points of permanent destructible defense. For 4 turns, 'Wood Release: Cutting Technique' and 'Body Reconstruction' will be replaced by 'Top Transformed Buddha' and 'All is Suffering' respectively.

skills.name: Body Possession
skills.description: Guruguru targets one ally. For 2 turns, this ally will have 5 points of damage reduction, 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction, 5 points of destructible defense, their skills will cost 1 less random energy, their invulnerability effects will last 1 additional turn and they will be unable to be killed. During this time, Guruguru will be stunned. This skill ends if Guruguru dies.

skills.name: Top Transformed Buddha
skills.description: Guruguru deals 40 damage to one random enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: All is Suffering
skills.description: Guruguru deals 20 damage and 20 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Nara Shikaku
description: The father of Nara Shikamaru, and the head of the Nara clan, Shikaku is a cool-headed Jounin of Konoha who will go to any lengths to protect his friends and family. In battle, Shikaku is merciless, combining his impressive shadow imitation skills with his unparalleled intellect to grab victory for his team.

skills.name: Master Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Nara Shikaku targets one enemy. That enemy will take 20 damage and then will have their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Shadow Dispersion'.

skills.name: Black Spider Lily
skills.description: Nara Shikaku targets all enemies. For 3 turns, Nara Shikaku's skills will deal 10 additional damage to them, and each time they use a new stun skill, then for 3 turns they will be stunned for 1 additional turn by Nara Shikaku's skills.

skills.name: Problem Analysis
skills.description: Nara Shikaku targets himself or one ally for 1 turn, and the first new harmful non-affliction damage skill that is used on them will deal no damage to them and that character will gain permanent destructible defense equal to the original damage of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Human Barricade
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shadow Dispersion
