skills.description: Nara Shikaku targets all enemies not affected by 'Master Shadow Imitation', stunning their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn and dealing 20 damage to them.

name: Hanzo of the Salamander
description: Hanzo, feared as Hanzo of the Salamander, was a legendary shinobi and the leader of the Hidden Rain Village. During the Second Shinobi World War, he gave Jiraiya, Orochimaru and Tsunade the "Hidden Leaf's Sannin" title. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Dance of the Sickle Blade
skills.description: Hanzo of the Salamander deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. This enemy will take 15 additional damage from 'Exploding Flame Formation' permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, 'Exploding Flame Formation' will target all enemies instead and 'Antidote', 'Body Flicker' and 'Embedded Venom Sac' will target Hanzo of the Salamander's entire team instead.

skills.name: Exploding Flame Formation
skills.description: Hanzo of the Salamander targets one enemy for 3 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, this enemy will take 20 affliction damage and all stacks of 'Dance of the Sickle Blade' on them will be removed. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Antidote
skills.description: Hanzo of the Salamander deals 5 affliction damage* to one ally and then makes them ignore energy drain or removal effects permanently. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it. If used during 'Dance of the Sickle Blade', this skill will be permanently replaced by 'Embedded Venom Sac'.

skills.name: Body Flicker
skills.description: This skill makes Hanzo of the Salamander invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Embedded Venom Sac
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Hanzo of the Salamander, that enemy will be dealt 10 affliction damage. This skill stacks and ends if Hanzo of the Salamander dies.

name: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S)
description: After spending the past year training under Orochimaru's watch, Sasuke has gained a tremendous amount of power, being able to use strong cursed techniques to hinder his enemies. His cursed seal has evolved to its peak, allowing Sasuke to control it precisely and maintain it for a long time. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Double Shadow Shuriken
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) makes one enemy ignore healing effects for 1 turn, deals 15 piercing damage to them and then applies 'Aerial Chidori' (except its apply effect) on them.

skills.name: Aerial Chidori
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them and then applies 'Long-Range Distortion' (except its apply effect) on them.

skills.name: Long-Range Distortion
skills.description: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) reduces one enemy's non-affliction damage by 15 for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to them and then applies 'Double Shadow Shuriken' (except its apply effect) on them.

skills.name: Shadow Snake Hands Rescue
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Regenerated Madara
description: After Black Zetsu takes over Obito's body and uses Samsara of Heavenly Life, Madara is brought back to life. Without the limits from the Impure World Reincarnation technique, he gains new abilities that allow him to disrupt his enemies and nullify their abilities. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Implanted Rinnegan
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Limbo: Limited Border Jail'.

skills.name: Restrain, Absorb and Synchronise
skills.description: Regenerated Madara stuns one enemy's harmful skills for 1 turn and steals 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, if they use a new strategic skill, this skill will be replaced by it for 1 turn.

skills.name: Emergency Susanoo Ribcage
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new non-strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and will gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Demonic Statue Chains'.

skills.name: High Endurance
skills.description: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and ignores all harmful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn.

skills.name: Limbo: Limited Border Jail
skills.description: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and deals 10 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, their harmful skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Demonic Statue Chains
skills.description: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently, deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and increases the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn.

name: Juubi
description: Juubi, also known as the Ten-Tails, is the combined form of Ootsutsuki Kaguya and the God Tree, created to reclaim the chakra inherited by her children, Hagoromo and Hamura. Centuries after its creation, its revival became the objective of Uchiha Madara and Obito, who both sought to become the beast's jinchuuriki in order to further their plans. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Wood Release: Major Cutting
skills.description: Juubi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies for 1 turn and gains 30 points of destructible defense also for 1 turn. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

skills.name: Ten-Tails Fission
skills.description: Juubi heals its team for 10 health for 1 turn and grants them 10 points of damage reduction also for 1 turn. During this time Juubi's team will ignore energy drain or removal effects. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

skills.name: God Tree's Tailed-Beast Bomb
skills.description: Juubi targets one enemy for 1 turn. Once this skill's duration is over, this enemy will take 50 affliction damage. This skill cannot be used while active, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

skills.name: Constant Evolution
skills.description: Juubi removes all harmful skills from itself and then targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new skill, Juubi's skills will last 1 additional turn for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Tenpenchii' permanently after used, cannot be countered or reflected and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Tenpenchii
skills.description: Juubi deals 40 affliction damage to all characters. This skill's duration isn't increased by 'Constant Evolution'.

name: Mitarashi Anko (S)
description: Anko has grown over the years as a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, she is put in command of the Reconnaissance Party, set to track Kabuto and find out what he is planning on doing. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Cursed Seal of Heaven: Enhance
skills.description: For the rest of the game, 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' will grant Mitarashi Anko (S) 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko (S) deals 5 damage and 15 affliction damage* to one enemy. This affliction damage cannot be ignored. For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

skills.name: Physical Pull In
skills.description: For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will counter the first new harmful skill used on her and the countered enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, if used, 'Cursed Seal of Heaven: Enhance' will also make Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn and increase the damage of 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' by 5 permanently. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Tactical Low-Ground Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Naori
description: Naori was a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village's famed Uchiha clan. She is as calm as she is powerful, able to use one of her clan's kinjutsu: Izanami, which traps the target in an endlessly-looped genjutsu with no hope of escaping unless they accept themselves. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Izanami
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Uchiha Naori can use 'Mind Disrupture'. During this time, whenever an enemy uses a new non-physical skill on her, 'Mind Disrupture' will be applied on them. This skill will be replaced by 'Redemption' permanently.

skills.name: Mind Disrupture
skills.description: Uchiha Naori deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional white energy. This skill requires 'Izanami' to be active.

skills.name: Quick Sword Slash
skills.description: Uchiha Naori deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Naori invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Redemption
skills.description: Uchiha Naori targets one enemy, permanently changing the cost of their non-strategic skills to 2 white energies. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and ends if Uchiha Naori dies.

name: Ruka
description: Ruka is a kunoichi from the Hidden Mist Village and part of the Third Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces. As a medical-nin, she has great control over her chakra and is capable of using Water Release techniques.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Stream
skills.description: Ruka deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 piercing damage.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Wall
skills.description: Ruka will counter the next enemy that uses a new non-mental skill on her and will then make this skill unusable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active. This skill will end if 'Water Release: Burning Bath' is used.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Field
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy. During this time, they will take 10 additional damage from 'Water Release: Water Stream' and this skill will be replaced by 'Water Release: Burning Bath'.

skills.name: Clever Hideout
skills.description: This skill makes Ruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Release: Burning Bath
skills.description: Permanently, one enemy takes 20 piercing damage each turn and is stunned. Ruka takes 10 affliction damage* each turn during this time. This skill ignores invulnerability and will end if either character dies or if Ruka uses a new skill.

name: Rikudou Obito
description: After sealing the Ten-Tails into his body, Obito becomes its jinchuuriki and one of the biggest threats the world has ever seen. He will do everything in his power to make the Infinite Tsukuyomi work, now that he has an almost unstoppable offense and an indestructible defense. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Truth-Seeking Umbrella
skills.description: Rikudou Obito deals 0 damage to one enemy plus 15 damage for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Orbs' permanently after used.

skills.name: Sword of Nunoboko
skills.description: Rikudou Obito deals 25 damage to one enemy and then stuns their energy, affliction and strategic skills for 0 turns plus 1 turn for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has. Any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards.

skills.name: Minor Six Red Yang Formation
skills.description: For 1 turn, all enemies' damage will be reduced by 5. For 1 turn, any skill Rikudou Obito uses will not remove any 'Black Chakra Stack'. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Truth-Seeking Shield
skills.description: Rikudou Obito gains 0 points of permanent destructible defense plus 20 points of permanent destructible defense for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Black Receiver' permanently after used.

skills.name: Truth-Seeking Orbs
skills.description: Rikudou Obito deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 0 plus 10 for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has and then any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Umbrella' permanently after used.

skills.name: Truth-Seeking Black Receiver
skills.description: Rikudou Obito gains 0 random energies plus 1 random energy for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Shield' permanently after used and removes all of its destructible defense.

skills.name: Black Chakra Stack
skills.description: This is a 'Black Chakra Stack'. All of Rikudou Obito's skills grant him 1 'Black Chakra Stack' normally, 2 if his health is at 50 or below and 3 if his health is at 25 or below (after their other effects are applied).

name: Rikudou Madara
description: With nobody left to oppose him, Madara seals the Ten-Tails into himself once its resurrection is complete. By becoming its jinchuuriki, Madara gains a tremendous amount of power and becomes one of the deadliest threats the world has ever witnessed. In power of two Rinnegan, Madara is almost untouchable through the access of the world known as Limbo. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Limbo: Border Jail
skills.description: Rikudou Madara targets himself or an ally, making them ignore all harmful non-affliction damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and can only be used 4 times.

skills.name: Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch
skills.description: Rikudou Madara deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any enemy who targets any of Rikudou Madara's allies with a new skill will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This skill stacks and ends when Rikudou Madara dies.

skills.name: Six Paths Ten-Tails Coffin Seal
skills.description: For 1 turn, the first new non-affliction damage skill used on Rikudou Madara will deal no damage to him and the damage of 'Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch' will be increased by the amount of original damage of that skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Infinite Tsukuyomi
skills.description: Rikudou Madara targets all enemies until they use a new skill. Their skills will cost 1 additional random energy, will deal 15 less damage and once they use a new skill, they will take 15 piercing damage. This skill cannot be used on enemies already affected by it and cannot be reflected.

name: Maito Dai
description: Maito Dai is a shinobi of the Hidden Leaf Village and the father of Gai. Dai spent his entire career as a genin, causing many to look down upon him and earned him the epithet of the "Eternal Genin". Despite this, after twenty years of tireless training, Dai perfected how to use all Eight Gates. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Bone-Breaking Punch
skills.description: Maito Dai deals 10 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Air-Throwing Punch
skills.description: Maito Dai deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 less damage with each use and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Eight Inner Gates
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Maito Dai's skills will deal 10 additional damage and everytime he uses a new skill, he will take 10 affliction damage*. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Defensive Surveillance
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Dai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Karui
description: Karui is a kunoichi of the Hidden Cloud Village and a member of Team Samui. Karui is a capable kunoichi with great teamwork skills, able to coordinate attacks with her partner Omoi without either needing to communicate. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ally-to-Ally Combat
skills.description: Karui makes her team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Cloud-Style Front Beheading' will deal 15 additional damage and 'Call to Action' will target Karui's entire team instead and its values will be reduced by 10.

skills.name: Cloud-Style Front Beheading
skills.description: Karui deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy's skills that directly grant destructible defense will grant 10 less points of destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Call to Action
skills.description: Karui targets herself or an ally for 3 turns. During this time, any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will take 20 piercing damage and 20 additional damage from 'Cloud-Style Front Beheading' for 1 turn. This skill ends if Karui dies.

skills.name: Clashing Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Karui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mabui
description: Mabui is a kunoichi of the Hidden Cloud Village and the Fourth Raikage's assistant. While very calm and analytical, Mabui possesses an unique technique that allows her to transfer objects from a place to another, in a matter of seconds. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.description: Mabui targets one ally. For 3 turns, that ally's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it.

skills.name: Heavenly Transfer Technique
skills.description: Mabui targets both teams for 4 turns. During this time, her team will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1 turn, while the enemy team will have the cooldown of their skills increased by 1 turn.

skills.name: Ethereal Transmission Technique
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on ally. If used on an enemy, they will take 25 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns. If used on an ally, they will take 15 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be decreased by 2 turns.

skills.name: Intense Focus
skills.description: This skill makes Mabui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Eighth Gate Gai
description: Taught by his father at a young age, Gai is able to utilise any and all of the Eight Inner Gates. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Gai decides to open the Eighth Gate to stop Madara in his jinchuuriki form, knowing that it would eventually cause his death. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Eight Gates Released Formation
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Eighth Gate Gai can use his other skills. During this time, he will have 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction, will take 10 affliction damage* each turn and will ignore enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects. This skill cannot be removed and will be permanently replaced by 'Steam of Blood' after used.

skills.name: Space-Shattering Punch
skills.description: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 30 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

skills.name: Evening Elephant
skills.description: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 60 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

skills.name: Eighth Gate Speed
skills.description: This skill makes Eighth Gate Gai invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

skills.name: Steam of Blood
skills.description: Eighth Gate Gai heals himself for 30 health. After 3 uses, this skill will be permanently replaced by 'Night Gai'. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Night Gai
skills.description: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 500 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi
description: As Obito sacrifices himself for the sake of Team 7 in the battle against Kaguya, Kakashi gets a last gift from him: his second Mangekyou Sharingan. In the possession of both eyes, Kakashi is able to connect his abilities with Obito's as well as release the perfect form of Susanoo. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Perfect Susanoo Armor
skills.description: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense. While Dual Mangekyou Kakashi still has destructible defense from this skill, 'Susanoo's Shared Shield' may be used and 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' will be replaced by 'Kamui Shuriken'.

skills.name: Susanoo's Shared Shield
skills.description: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi grants his allies 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead make them invulnerable for 1 turn but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi. This skill requires 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' to be active.

skills.name: Kamui Lightning Cutter
skills.description: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them and makes them invulnerable to harmful and helpful skills for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead deal 45 piercing damage but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

skills.name: Intangibility
skills.description: This skill makes Dual Mangekyou Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Kamui Shuriken
skills.description: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead reduce the enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 permanently but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

name: Aburame Muta
description: Muta is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and a member of the Aburame clan. As a skilled member of his clan, Muta is part of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Infiltration and Reconnaissance Party. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Neutralising Destruction Insect
skills.description: Aburame Muta deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any new skill used by that enemy will have 1 turn of additional cooldown. This effect stacks. This skill deals 5 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.

skills.name: Insect Barricade
skills.description: Aburame Muta deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, Aburame Muta's skills will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn. This skill deals 10 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.

skills.name: Insect Jamming Technique
skills.description: Aburame Muta makes the non-conditional stun effects of all allies' skills they use this turn last 1 additional turn. For 1 turn, Aburame Muta and all allies will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Quick Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Muta invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Chiriku
description: Chiriku is a ninja monk from the Fire Temple. He was once part of the Twelve Guardian Ninja, when he developed a strong friendship with Sarutobi Asuma. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Assault
skills.description: Chiriku deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Protection
skills.description: Chiriku gains 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy who uses a new non-mental skill on him will be dealt 15 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Counter
skills.description: Chiriku targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. All harmful skills used on them will be countered and the countered enemies will take 40 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Kannon Spirit
skills.description: Chiriku heals himself for 20 health and then gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time 'Thousand-Armed Murder Assault' will deal 10 additional damage and Chiriku's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown.

name: Biwa Juuzou
description: Juuzou was a jounin of the Hidden Mist Village and one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist. Previous partner of Itachi in Akatsuki, Juuzou wields the Executioner's Blade, that can regenerate from the iron harvested from its victim's blood. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Hidden Mist Technique
skills.description: Biwa Juuzou targets all enemies, removing all active control skills on them. For 1 turn, their invulnerability skills will last 1 turn less. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 white energy instead.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade: Blood Absorption
skills.description: Biwa Juuzou steals 15 health from one enemy and makes his team ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 red energy instead.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade Charge
skills.description: Biwa Juuzou deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 green energy instead.

skills.name: Water Clone Replacement
skills.description: Biwa Juuzou gains 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, all his other skills will be replaced by 'Executioner's Blade Execution'. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade Execution
skills.description: Biwa Juuzou targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is at 85 or less, they will be instantly killed.

name: Rehabilitated Obito
description: After redeeming himself, Obito decides to help Team 7 in the final battle against Kaguya using all the power from his doujutsu. Obito is ready to do whatever is needed to save the world he once wanted to destroy - even sacrifice himself for the sake of others. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Mangekyou Sharingan Enhance
skills.description: Rehabilitated Obito takes 10 affliction damage*. For the rest of the game, his skills will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Dimensional Assault
skills.description: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage and 10 piercing damage to one enemy and makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will also stun its target for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dimensional Rush
skills.description: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, their stun skills will last 1 turn less* and their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy*. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Space-Time Portal
skills.description: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if Rehabilitated Obito is targeted by a new harmful non-affliction skill, he will become invulnerable for the rest of that turn*.

name: Ootsutsuki Kaguya
description: Kaguya was a member of the Ootsutsuki clan and the matriarch of a branch family. Long before the founding of the hidden villages, during an era of endless war, Kaguya consumed the fruit of the God Tree and became the first wielder of chakra on Earth, before later merging with the tree to become the Ten-Tails. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Amenominaka: Lava
skills.description: For the rest of the game, all enemies will take 5 affliction damage whenever they use a new skill. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also stun their targets' affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

skills.name: Amenominaka: Ice
skills.description: For the rest of the game, all enemies' stun effects will last 1 turn less. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also ignore invulnerability. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

skills.name: Amenominaka: Mountains
skills.description: For the rest of the game, all enemies will deal 5 less energy damage. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also decrease their targets' physical damage by 10 for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

skills.name: Amenominaka: Sand
skills.description: For the rest of the game, all enemies will ignore friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also first destroy their targets' destructible defense. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

skills.name: All-Killing Ash Bones
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy, kills them if their health drops to 10 or below and marks them permanently. If this skill is used on a marked enemy, they will be killed if their health drops to 20 or below instead.

skills.name: Rabbit Hair Needle
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants her team 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eighty Gods Vacuum Attack
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Expansive Truth-Seeking Ball' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Yomotsu Hirasaka
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kaguya removes all skills from herself and then targets all enemies, removing any Ootsutsuki Kaguya's dimension from them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Expansive Truth-Seeking Ball
skills.description: After 3 turns of this skill being used, Ootsutsuki Kaguya's health will be set to 100 (this is a healing effect). During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya will deal 60 damage to the first enemy who uses a new skill on her. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Ootsutsuki Kaguya. This skill will be replaced by 'Major Summoning: Juubi' for 3 turns after used.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Juubi
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kaguya targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health and replacing all their skills with Juubi's skills permanently.

name: Ootsutsuki Hamura
description: Hamura was the son of Princess Kaguya, the fraternal twin brother of Hagoromo; both of whom were the first people born with the ability to wield chakra. Hamura was the ancestor of the Hyuuga clan and the founder of the shinobi of the Moon. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Six Paths Taijutsu
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hamura deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Six Paths Projection Spectrum
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hamura gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Six Paths Yin Power
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hamura targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's 'Six Paths Yang Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

skills.name: Six Paths Byakugan Sight
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hamura targets all enemies, who will deal 15 less damage for 1 turn and if they use a new strategic skill, they will deal 5 less damage permanently. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Hamura dies.

skills.name: Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei
skills.description: The character affected by this skill is stunned for 3 turns, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

name: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo
description: Hagoromo, known to Earth's population at large as the Sage of Six Paths, was a legendary godlike figure who is regarded as the ancestor of shinobi, for his act of founding ninshuu which led to the creation of the ninja world. He was the son of Princess Kaguya and alongside his fraternal twin brother, Hamura, were the first to be born with the same powerful chakra as their mother. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Drilling Hand of Sage Lightning
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo removes all helpful non-strategic skills from one enemy and deals 10 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Six Paths Susanoo Assault
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo deals 20 damage to one enemy and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Six Paths Yang Power
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hamura's 'Six Paths Yin Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

skills.name: Secret Treasure of the Toads
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo heals one ally for 20 health each turn for 2 turns and during this time, this ally will ignore enemy stun effects and will be unable to be killed. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei
skills.description: The character affected by this skill is stunned for 3 turns, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

name: Shiranui Genma
description: Genma is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and an elite bodyguard to the Hokage. After Hayate's death, he became the Chuunin Exams proctor. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Senbon Spit
skills.description: Shiranui Genma deals 5 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used, 'Double Kunai Cut' will deal 20 damage instantly instead and grant 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn instead.

skills.name: Double Kunai Cut
skills.description: Shiranui Genma deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. Namiashi Raidou's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. For 2 turns, Shiranui Genma will have 10 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation
skills.description: Shiranui Genma targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Namiashi Raidou's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Elite Speed
skills.description: This skill makes Shiranui Genma invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Namiashi Raidou
description: Raidou is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and an elite bodyguard to the Hokage. He is skilled in kenjutsu, using a special sword of his own called ''Kokutou''. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Silent Approach
skills.description: Namiashi Raidou targets one enemy, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. During this time, 'Kokutou Stab' will deal 15 additional damage to them and will reduce their non-affliction damage by 10 additional points. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Kokutou Stab
skills.description: Namiashi Raidou deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. Shiranui Genma's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation
skills.description: Namiashi Raidou targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Shiranui Genma's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Namiashi Raidou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Ootsutsuki Toneri
description: Toneri is a descendant of Ootsutsuki Hamura and the sole survivor of Ootsutsuki clan's branch family on the moon. He intends to destroy Rikudou Sennin's world by launching the moon itself on Earth. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Silver Wheel Explosion
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will deal 20 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Golden Wheel Explosion
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will ignore healing effects and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Localised Explosion
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, 'Truth-Seeking Dome' will cost 1 less random energy permanently. This effect stacks. The following turn, this enemy will take 10 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Truth-Seeking Dome
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Toneri makes his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Zori and Waraji
description: Zori and Waraji are two samurai from the Land of Waves, both mercenaries hired by Gatou to be his personal bodyguards. They are capable hand-to-hand combatants, able to use their swords to perform Iaidou. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Zori's Iaidou
skills.description: Zori and Waraji deal 10 piercing damage to one enemy and gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Waraji's Iaidou
skills.description: Zori and Waraji deal 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun effects of any new skill this enemy uses will take no effect.

skills.name: Hostage
skills.description: Zori and Waraji target one enemy, reducing their physical and energy damage by 15 for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, the damage 'Zori's Iaidou' and 'Waraji's Iaidou' deal to this enemy will be increased by 10. This skill stacks and ends if Zori and Waraji die.

skills.name: Swordsman Reflexes
skills.description: This skill makes Zori and Waraji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rikudou Naruto
description: With the power given to him by Hagoromo, Naruto gained access to the Six Paths Sage Mode. Naruto's physical attributes and techniques are further augmented, to the point where he could dodge attacks that moved at the speed of light. He also retained use of his Tailed Beast Mode avatar of Kurama, what gave him access to one of the strongest ninja techniques to ever exist. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann & Alexandre

skills.name: Naruto Region Combo
skills.description: Rikudou Naruto gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and targets one enemy, reducing that enemy's non-affliction damage by 20 for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead make Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn, stun one target enemy for 1 turn and reduce that enemy's damage by 10 permanently (if used). This skill stacks.

skills.name: Regeneration Ability
skills.description: Rikudou Naruto targets one ally, removing all harmful non-strategic skills from them and then healing them for 20 health. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and will instead remove all harmful non-strategic skills from one ally and heal them for 40 health (if used).

skills.name: Sage Art: Super Tailed-Beast Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Rikudou Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and increases the cost of their non-strategic skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will target all enemies instead (if used).

skills.name: Six Paths: Kurama Awakening
skills.description: All of Rikudou Naruto's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used in the game.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage
skills.description: Rikudou Naruto deals 30 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, 'Yang Chakra Gathering' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Yang Chakra Gathering
skills.description: After 2 turns of this skill being used, Rikudou Naruto will heal himself for 35 health and will gain 2 random energies. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Six Paths: Ultra-Big Ball Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Rikudou Naruto removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rikudou Naruto will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Chakra Tail Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Yang Chakra Gathering' will cost 1 less random energy.

name: Rinnegan Sasuke
description: With the power given to him by Hagoromo, Sasuke gained access to the Rinnegan. The doujutsu gives Sasuke the ability of pattern recognition and also grants him access to the various abilities of the Six Paths techniques. With that, Sasuke has access to one of the strongest ninja techniques to ever exist. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann & Alexandre

skills.name: Rinnegan Illusion
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke stuns one enemy's non-mental skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead last 2 turns (if used).

skills.name: Blaze Release: Honoikazuchi
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, they will take another 10 affliction damage. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and it will instead instantly deal 25 affliction damage to all enemies (if used).

skills.name: Onyx Chidori
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will deal 30 additional damage (if used).

skills.name: Six Paths: Yin Power Susanoo
skills.description: All of Rinnegan Sasuke's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used in the game.

skills.name: Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and 15 affliction damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, any enemy that target Rinnegan Sasuke with a new skill will take 5 additional damage from 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' permanently. For 1 turn, 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 15 affliction damage* to his allies and then increases his damage by 15 permanently. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Indra's Arrow
skills.description: Rinnegan Sasuke removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rinnegan Sasuke will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Susanoo: Body Cocoon
skills.description: This skill makes Rinnegan Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' will cost 1 less random energy.

name: Ootsutsuki Ashura
description: Ashura was the younger son of Ootsutsuki Hagoromo. Though not the obvious choice to most, he would go on to inherit his father's teachings, and as a result, would have to clash bitterly against his elder brother Indra. Ashura is also credited with being the progenitor of both the Senju and Uzumaki clans. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Amenomihashira
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Ashura destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 10 piercing damage twice to them. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 5 additional damage. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional blue energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: True Several Thousand Hands
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Ashura grants his team 30 points of destructible defense for 3 turns and during this time, every original non-affliction damage dealt to his allies will be capped at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional red energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself. For 3 turns this skill will be replaced by 'Top Transformed Buddha'.

skills.name: Six Paths: Kunitsukami
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Ashura gains 25 points of permanent destructible defense and an additional 25 for every other skill of his he has active on him. During 'Amenomihashira', this skill will grant him 2 random energies. During 'True Several Thousand Hands', this skill will make him ignore enemy stun effects permanently. During 'Top Transformed Buddha', this skill will permanently cap every original non-affliction damage dealt to him at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Swift Wind Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Ashura invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Top Transformed Buddha
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Ashura deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional green energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself.

name: Ootsutsuki Indra
description: Indra was the first born son of Ootsutsuki Hagoromo. He was initially thought to be the most suitable successor of his father's teachings, however, it was his younger brother Ashura that ended up inheriting this mantle  a decision that would lead the two brothers to fight against each other. Indra is also credited with being the creator of ninjutsu, and the progenitor of the Uchiha clan. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Release: Lightning Spear
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 3 turns. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Blade'.

skills.name: Lightning Release: Lightning Ball
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Lightning Release: Lightning Spear' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Dual Blades'.

skills.name: Origin: Susanoo
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra takes 15 affliction damage* and then becomes invulnerable to physical skills permanently. During this time, he will ignore healing effects, take 5 affliction damage each turn* and everytime he uses a new skill, he will take another 10 affliction damage*. This skill can be used while active for no cost to cancel itself.

skills.name: Hinokagutsuchi
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra targets himself or an ally for 1 turn, countering the first non-mental harmful skill used on them and dealing 10 affliction damage to the countered enemy. If 'Origin: Susanoo' is active, this skill will deal 30 affliction damage instead. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Origin Blade
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 30 piercing damage to them. If that enemy's health drops to 5 or below, they will be instantly killed.

skills.name: Origin Dual Blades
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Origin Blade' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Mahiru
description: Mahiru is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War Mahiru was partnered with Kakkou and Taiseki. He went out to surveillance the area in which Team Minato was travelling. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Darkness

skills.name: Sword Slash
skills.description: Mahiru deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces their physical damage by 5 permanently. This skill deals 5 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Shadow Clone Assault', does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Shadow Clone Assault
skills.description: Mahiru deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces their energy damage by 5 permanently. This skill deals 5 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sword Slash', does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Earth Release: Underground Projection Fish
skills.description: Mahiru deals 0 piercing damage to one enemy and then becomes invulnerable for 2 turns. If the enemy is affected by either 'Sword Slash' or 'Shadow Clone Assault', this skill will deal 25 piercing damage instead. If they are affected by both, this skill will deal 50 piercing damage instead.

skills.name: Swift Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Mahiru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Taiseki
description: Taiseki is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War, he led a team with Kakkou and Mahiru, using their superb diversionary tactics to attack the enemy. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Nix

skills.name: Precise Kunai Strike
skills.description: Taiseki deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage.

skills.name: Hostage Capture
skills.description: Taiseki targets one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will ignore all friendly destructible defense and healing effects. If they use a new skill during this time, they will be countered. If successfully countered, their non-strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn, Taiseki will gain 1 random energy and this skill will end.

skills.name: Hiding with Camouflage Technique
skills.description: For 2 turns, Taiseki will ignore enemy stun effects and 'Precise Kunai Strike' and 'Hostage Capture' will be invisible if used. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Smokescreen Escape
skills.description: This skill makes Taiseki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kakkou
description: Kakkou is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War he was partnered with Taiseki and Mahiru. He most notably engaged Team Minato of the Hidden Leaf Village, led by Hatake Kakashi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Neji1113

skills.name: Retractable Blade Assault
skills.description: Kakkou targets all enemies. The main target will take 30 piercing damage and any enemy affected by 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will take 10 piercing damage.

skills.name: Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction
skills.description: Kakkou deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks. If any enemy has 'Interrogation Genjutsu' active on them, 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will be applied again on them.

skills.name: Interrogation Genjutsu
skills.description: Kakkou targets one enemy, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill will be unable to be used on that enemy.

skills.name: Retractable Blade Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Kakkou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Fugaku
description: Fugaku is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village, father of Itachi and Sasuke. He was the head of the Uchiha clan as well as the leader of the Hidden Leaf Military Police Force. He was said to be one of the strongest Uchiha clan members, known worldwide as Wicked Eye Fugaku. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Mangekyou Sharingan: Mental Breakdown
skills.description: Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 damage to all enemies and then reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

skills.name: Fire Release: Great Fireball
skills.description: Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and then reduces the duration of their stun and counter effects by 1 turn for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

skills.name: Military Coordination
skills.description: Uchiha Fugaku targets his team for 3 turns. During this time, all effects of 'Mangekyou Sharingan: Mental Breakdown' and 'Fire Release: Great Fireball' will be concentrated on one enemy instead and everytime a member of Uchiha Fugaku's team is targeted by a new harmful skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same class as the skill that was used on them (only main classes considered).

skills.name: Thoughtful Analysis
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Fugaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Commander Kakashi
description: As the Fourth Shinobi World War begins, Kakashi is appointed as commander of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Third Division. The Third Division is mobilised ahead of the other divisions in order to be on hand for any eventuality. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Transmission
skills.description: Commander Kakashi targets all enemies and all allies for 2 turns. During this time, his allies will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills and enemies who use a new harmful skill will take 5 piercing damage.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade Assault
skills.description: Commander Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will steal 20 health from one enemy instead.

skills.name: Lightning-Infused Kunai
skills.description: Commander Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, that enemy will take 5 piercing damage each turn, will deal 5 less damage with physical and energy skills, the stun effects of their skills will last 1 turn less and their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 random energy less. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Executioner's Blade: Defensive Maneuver
skills.description: This skill makes Commander Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shin Clone
description: Shin is the name given to the various individual genetic clones of the original Uchiha Shin, who treats them both as sons and organ donors. The clones are shown to be very capable in battle, having enough scientific knowledge to create more clones. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chained Shuriken Assault
skills.description: Shin Clone deals 15 damage to one enemy, who will take 10 damage the following turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 additional damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: One-Hand Shuriken Stab
skills.description: Shin Clone deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 10 or below. For 1 turn, Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Clone Sacrifice
skills.description: Shin Clone makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 less damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Chain Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Shin Clone invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan
skills.description: If Shin Clone uses the same skill 5 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': All skills are removed from Shin Clone. For the rest of the game, any enemy who targets Shin Clone with a new skill will take 25 piercing damage.

name: Uchiha Shin
description: Shin was a former test subject of Orochimaru. After developing a fixation on the Uchiha clan, more specifically Itachi, he took the Uchiha name for himself and severed ties with Orochimaru, taking his "sons" with him. Believing that peace was detrimental to human evolution, Shin began a plot to revive the Akatsuki so that the ensuing conflict would be a catalyst to further his beliefs. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage
skills.description: Uchiha Shin deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and mental skills for 1 turn. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Object Manipulation: Bladed Shuriken
skills.description: Uchiha Shin deals 45 damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical and mental skills for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. For 1 turn 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will have no cooldown.

skills.name: Object Manipulation Mark
skills.description: Uchiha Shin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if that enemy uses a new skill, they will permanently take 5 additional damage from Uchiha Shin's skills and be stunned for 1 additional turn by them. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Space-Time Doujutsu
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Shin invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan
skills.description: If Uchiha Shin uses 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' twice in a row, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': For the rest of the game, 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 15 health and 'Object Manipulation: Bladed Shuriken' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 45 health.

name: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki
description: Kinshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, who serves as a guardian for his foster son Momoshiki. Kinshiki possesses the ability to absorb any kind of ninjutsu and transform the chakra into various red glowing ninja tools at will, which he is proficient with handling. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Tool Cover
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful physical or energy skills used on them for 1 turn. The target will gain 1 random energy for each skill countered this way. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Oodachi Mow Down
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then targets one random member of his team. For 1 turn, this character will gain 1 random energy for every new harmful physical or energy skill used on them. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Ground Smash
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 15 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will instead deal 30 damage to one enemy and grant Ootsutsuki Kinshiki 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ootsutsuki Flight
skills.description: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Kinshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Tool Barrage
skills.description: If Ootsutsuki Kinshiki uses 'Tool Cover' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Tool Barrage': 'Tool Cover' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, 'Oodachi Mow Down' will target all enemies and all members of Ootsutsuki Kinshiki's team instead.

name: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki
description: Momoshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, sent to investigate the whereabouts of Kaguya and her God Tree and then attempting to cultivate a new one out of the chakra of the Seventh Hokage. As an Ootsutsuki, Momoshiki has the ability to fly and his chakra is extremely powerful. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra Extraction
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki deals 25 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional random energy and will deal 20 additional damage.

skills.name: Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful energy skills used on them for 1 turn. After 3 uses of this skill, it can no longer be used and 'Reign of the High Emperor: Release' will be able to be used. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Reign of the High Emperor: Release
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 75 damage to them. 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' can now be used again. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 3 uses of 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' so it can be used.

skills.name: Karma: Momoshiki
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one ally permanently. If their health drops to 10 or below while Ootsutsuki Momoshiki is dead, that ally will be healed for 90 health, will have all helpful and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced by Ootsutsuki Momoshiki's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Achievement: Chakra Fruit
skills.description: If Ootsutsuki Momoshiki uses 'Chakra Extraction' 5 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra Fruit': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 100 health. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Chakra Fruit Momoshiki's skills.

name: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki
description: Wanting to finish everyone off once and for all, Momoshiki turned Kinshiki into a chakra fruit and devoured him, which increased his strength and his body underwent a drastic change. In this form, Momoshiki has access to even stronger abilities. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Hair Binding Technique
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns this enemy's physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dog Raising Robust Lord
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki targets all enemies for 3 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, they will take 20 damage. If they use a new harmful skill during this time, they will take 25 damage and this skill will end on them.

skills.name: Monkey Rock
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki removes all harmful skills from his team. He will gain 45 points of permanent destructible defense and his allies will gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense.

skills.name: Flawless Interception
skills.description: This skill makes Chakra Fruit Momoshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Triggered Rage
skills.description: If Chakra Fruit Momoshiki uses 'Hair Binding Technique', 'Dog Raising Robust Lord' and 'Monkey Rock' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Triggered Rage': For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on him, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from damaging skills for 1 turn.

name: Kawaki
description: Kawaki is a genin raised by Kara to be the future vessel for Ootsutsuki Isshiki and the key to the fulfilment of their greatest wish. After being brought to the Hidden Leaf Village by Team 7, he is taken in by Uzumaki Naruto who raises him as his own, during which he develops a brotherly bond with Boruto to solve the mystery of the Karma. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Slicer
skills.description: Kawaki deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, this enemy will take 5 piercing damage if they use a new skill that directly grants damage reduction or destructible defense. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill or if it's removed from Kawaki or the affected enemy.

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Bullets
skills.description: Kawaki deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 piercing damage each following turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill* or if it's removed from Kawaki or any of the affected enemies.

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Monster Hand
skills.description: Kawaki will gain 25 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill.

skills.name: Enhanced Agility
skills.description: This skill makes Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Karma
skills.description: If Kawaki uses any skill while having 10 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Karma': All of Kawaki's skills are removed from him. He will be unable to be killed for 3 turns. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Karma Kawaki's skills.

name: Karma Kawaki
description: Kawaki possesses the Karma mark of Ootsutsuki Isshiki, which he acquired when the Ootsutsuki branded him in hopes of making him his vessel. With it, he is able to absorb ninjutsu, and with Boruto's cooperation, can open portals to other dimensions. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Karma-Enhanced Shinobi-Ware
skills.description: Karma Kawaki deals 25 damage and 25 piercing damage to one enemy. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also deal an additional 25 affliction damage* to the enemy.

skills.name: Karma Palm Thrust
skills.description: Karma Kawaki destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them, stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove 2 random energies from the enemy.

skills.name: Karma: Energy Relocation
skills.description: Karma Kawaki becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction-only skills for 3 turns. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also grant him 2 random energies instantly.

skills.name: Karma Absorption
skills.description: This skill makes Karma Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove all harmful skills from him.

skills.name: Achievement: Recharge
skills.description: If Karma Kawaki uses 'Karma-Enhanced Shinobi-Ware' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Recharge': His health is set to 15 and he gains 60 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will have no cooldown.

name: Yashamaru
description: Yashamaru is an ANBU member from the Hidden Sand Village and also Gaara's uncle. After his sister's death, Yashamaru was appointed as Gaara's caretaker by the Fourth Kazekage, but later received the mission to kill the jinchuuriki instead. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Manipulating Attack Blades
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Yashamaru will gain 5 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. Every turn, the damage of 'Silent Murder' will be permanently increased by 5. This effect stacks. This skill cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Silent Murder
skills.description: Yashamaru deals 5 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Heavenly Punishment
skills.description: For 1 turn, if Yashamaru dies, all enemies will be dealt 25 affliction damage instantly. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Killer Disguise
skills.description: This skill makes Yashamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Samui
description: Samui is a kunoichi from the Hidden Cloud Village, and the leader of Team Samui. She is a quite skilled jounin who uses kenjutsu, wielding a tanto in battle. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Frontline Position
skills.description: Samui makes one ally invulnerable for 3 turns. During this time, she will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and 'Battle Cry' will last 1 additional turn. This skill ends if Samui dies.

skills.name: Tanto Combat
skills.description: Samui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If Samui's health is at 60 or below, this skill will deal another 25 piercing damage to its target.

skills.name: Battle Cry
skills.description: Samui targets her team, granting them lifelink for 1 turn.

skills.name: Tanto Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Samui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Samurai Troops
description: Samurai are a military power similar to shinobi, though not nearly as widespread. Only the Land of Iron continues to use samurai, with all other countries having since opted to use shinobi. All samurai are practised sword users, into which they channel their chakra. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Samurai Assemble
skills.description: For 1 turn, 'Flash Iaidou' will target all enemies if used and 'Ally Saving' will target all allies if used. Also for 1 turn, every enemy who uses a new skill on Samurai Troops will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns.

skills.name: Flash Iaidou
skills.description: Samurai Troops deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy. On this skill's 1st and 2nd uses, the enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. On its 3rd and 4th uses, the enemy will ignore healing effects and be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. On its 5th and 6th uses, the enemy's strategic skills will be stunned for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ally Saving
skills.description: Samurai Troops target one ally, making them unable to be killed for 2 turns. This skill ends if Samurai Troops die.

skills.name: Blade Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Samurai Troops invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hokage Naruto
description: Naruto finally achieved his goal and became the Seventh Hokage. He married Hinata and had two kids, Boruto and Himawari. As the village's Hokage, Naruto is a shield for it and is always ready to use all he has to protect his people. Damn, Boruto's dad should definitely get an anime of his own... ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lava Release: Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Hokage Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 15 affliction damage*.

skills.name: Nine-Tails Fire Fists
skills.description: Hokage Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns, increasing the cost of that enemy's non-strategic skills by 1 random energy during this time.

skills.name: Kurama Laser Beam
skills.description: Hokage Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Hokage Naruto will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Chakra Arms Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Hokage Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Kurama Chakra Spirit
skills.description: If Hokage Naruto uses 'Kurama Laser Beam' while having 40 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Kurama Chakra Spirit': He is healed for 20 health. For 4 turns, the specific costs on his skills will be random costs instead.

name: Uchiha Sasuke (B)
description: Travelling the whole ninja world was a way of Sasuke redeeming himself by helping his village the most he can. However, he settled in his personal life by marrying Sakura and having a daughter named Sarada. As an adult, Sasuke is not the most present family member and friend but keeps his position as one of the strongest shinobi alive. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Amenotejikara
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, all new harmful physical, energy or affliction skills that target Uchiha Sasuke (B) will be reflected to that enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Space-Time Amaterasu
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (B) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 10 affliction damage each following turn permanently. For 2 turns, every enemy who uses a new non-mental skill on Uchiha Sasuke (B) will be dealt 10 affliction damage. This skill stacks and ends if Uchiha Sasuke (B) dies.

skills.name: Susanoo Mountain Destroyer
skills.description: Uchiha Sasuke (B) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and then grants his allies 35 points of destructible defense for 2 turns. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Space-Time Portal Escape
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Rinnegan
skills.description: If Uchiha Sasuke (B) uses 'Susanoo Mountain Destroyer' while having 40 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Rinnegan': He is healed for 20 health. For 4 turns, the specific costs on his skills will be random costs instead.

name: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B)
description: As the years went through, Konohamaru became a teacher on the Hidden Leaf Village's academy and also a jounin. He is now a very skilled shinobi capable of using a variety of ninja techniques. Konohamaru was set to be the captain of the new Team 7. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Fire Release: Blazing Meteors
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Adamantine Seal: Monkey Yang Suppression
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) stuns one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Mature Rasengan
skills.description: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Summoning: Gamagorou
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Sealing Release
skills.description: If Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) uses 'Fire Release: Blazing Meteors', 'Adamantine Seal: Monkey Yang Suppression' and 'Mature Rasengan' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sealing Release': All harmful skills are removed from him. For the rest of the game, he will ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

name: Motoi
description: Motoi is a shinobi from the Hidden Cloud Village who is stationed on the Island Turtle. Motoi is a childhood friend of Killer Bee, proficient in ninjutsu while also being an expert tracker-nin. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Release: Spider Web
skills.description: Motoi deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 10 piercing damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, 'Minor Discharge' can be used on them.

skills.name: Minor Discharge
skills.description: Motoi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies affected by 'Lightning Release: Spider Web'. For the rest of the game, their physical and energy damage will be reduced by 5 and everytime they use a new skill, that skill's cooldown will be increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Summoning: Fukuemon
skills.description: For 2 turns, the counter effects of all enemies' new skills will last 1 turn less. For 2 turns, Motoi's team will have 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Clever Hideout
skills.description: This skill makes Motoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Torune
description: Torune was killed by Tobi and Kabuto as they decided to use him as a guinea pig for the Impure World Reincarnation technique. Later on the war, Kabuto decided to use another body to bring Torune back, aiming to use his special techniques against the forces of the Allied Shinobi Forces.

skills.name: Armor of Venom
skills.description: Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 1 random energy to apply 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.

skills.name: Jar of Poison
skills.description: Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies and gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 2 random energies to apply 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: Edo Tensei Torune targets all enemies, removing 1 random energy from them for each Venom Beetle on them.

skills.name: Super Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Venom Beetle
skills.description: This skill deals 5 affliction damage to the target for 4 turns.

name: Kazekage Gaara (B)
description: Gaara is the only Kage of the past generation that kept his position after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War. Now being even wiser, Gaara is not only the shield and brain of his village but also the father of an adopted son named Shinki. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sand Whirlwind
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Desert: Hand' will also remove all helpful strategic skills from its target. This skill ends if Kazekage Gaara (B) dies.

skills.name: Desert: Hand
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun effect of 'Sand Whirlwind' will last 2 turns instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Air Sand Protective Wall
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara (B) grants his team 10 points of damage reduction, 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sand Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Kazekage Gaara (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Sand Mesh
skills.description: If Kazekage Gaara (B) uses 'Air Sand Protective Wall' while having 60 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sand Mesh': For the rest of the game, 'Air Sand Protective Wall' will grant his team 30 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn instead of doing its other effects (it will still be invisible).

name: Mizukage Chojuro
description: After the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Chojuro succeeded Mei and became the Sixth Mizukage. The swordsman of the mist is a very capable shinobi, wielding his blade Hiramekarei with ease and mastery. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Tiger

skills.name: Chakra-Covered Hiramekarei Assault
skills.description: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, they will take 10 additional damage from non-physical skills. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

skills.name: Water Release: Great Waterfall
skills.description: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, they will be invulnerable to friendly skills. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

skills.name: Bloody Mist Sword Art: Bone Mutilation
skills.description: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Mizukage Chojuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Water Drill
