skills.description: If Mizukage Chojuro uses any of his harmful skills and then uses 'Hiramekarei Shelter' the turn right after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Water Drill': For 3 turns, he will have 10 points of damage reduction.

name: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi
description: After the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Kurotsuchi succeeded her grandfather Ohnoki and became the Fourth Tsuchikage. She is now even better at using Lava Release techniques to damage and hinder any enemies that may bring danger to her village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lava Release: Lava Fist
skills.description: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi destroys one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 15 damage to them. If used on an enemy affected by 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal', that enemy will take 10 additional damage from this skill and will also be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Lava Release: Lava Wave
skills.description: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi deals 30 damage to one enemy and then targets them for 3 turns, making them invulnerable to friendly skills each turn. If used on an enemy affected by 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal', that enemy will take 10 additional damage from this skill and will also ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 2 turns*.

skills.name: Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal
skills.description: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy, will have 2 additional turns of cooldown and will deal 20 less non-affliction damage.

skills.name: Earth Release: Boulder Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Surrounding Lava
skills.description: If Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi uses 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal' while having 30 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Surrounding Lava': For 3 turns, she will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage and will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction.

name: Raikage Darui
description: After the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Darui succeeded Ay and became the Fifth Raikage. The dull shinobi has now a wider arsenal of sword abilities and also a bigger control of his Lightning Release nature.

skills.name: Cleaver Sword: Frontal Cut
skills.description: Raikage Darui deals 15 damage to one enemy and gains 1 lightning charge. This skill deals 5 additional damage for each lightning charge on Raikage Darui.

skills.name: Cleaver Sword: Aerial Cut
skills.description: Raikage Darui deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 0 turns. This skill's stun effect lasts 1 additional turn for each lightning charge on Raikage Darui and then removes all lightning charges from him afterwards.

skills.name: Lightning Body Flicker
skills.description: Raikage Darui gains 2 lightning charges. He will have 20 points of damage reduction for 2 turns. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sparkling Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Raikage Darui invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Non Stop Chasing
skills.description: If Raikage Darui uses 'Cleaver Sword: Aerial Cut' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Non Stop Chasing': For the rest of the game, his skills will ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Lightning Charge
skills.description: This is a lightning charge.

name: Akatsuki Orochimaru
description: After he escaped the Hidden Leaf, Orochimaru became affiliated with and joined the elite criminal organisation Akatsuki. Orochimaru was then partnered with Sasori, with whom he did much good for the organisation. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Denni

skills.name: Wind Release: Great Breakthrough
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Hidden Snake
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks. This skill becomes 'Binding Snake Glare Spell' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Murderous Taunt
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru gains 5 points of damage reduction and targets all enemies permanently. Everytime an enemy uses: a new non-mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will gain 5 points of damage reduction for 1 turn; a new mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Damnation Seal' permanently after used, stacks and ends if Akatsuki Orochimaru dies.

skills.name: Snake Instinct
skills.description: This skill makes Akatsuki Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Binding Snake Glare Spell
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru targets one enemy affected by 'Hidden Snake', dealing 10 affliction damage to them. This enemy will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Damnation Seal
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru stuns one enemy's physical, affliction and strategic skills for 3 turns.

name: Inuzuka Hana
description: Hana is a chuunin from the Hidden Leaf Village's Inuzuka clan, as well as an excellent and respected veterinary medical-nin. Her canine companions are ninken triplets: the Three Haimaru Brothers. Hana is Kiba's older sister. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Single Haimaru Brother Tracking
skills.description: 'Fang Rotating Fang' will last 1 additional turn permanently. During this time, one target enemy cannot use skills with a counter effect (this is a stun effect). This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it, can only be used 3 times and ends if Inuzuka Hana dies.

skills.name: Fang Rotating Fang
skills.description: For 1 turn, Inuzuka Hana deals 15 damage to all enemies. During this time, any new skill they use that deal 30 or more direct original damage in any of its versions will be countered*. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Blood Injection
skills.description: Inuzuka Hana targets herself or an ally. Starting the following turn, the target will be healed for 5 health each turn permanently. This skill cannot be used on a target already affected by it.

skills.name: Three Haimaru Brothers Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Hana invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Emotional Energy Sai
description: When the Fourth Shinobi World War began, Sai was placed in the Surprise Attack Division. Fighting against the forces of the Impure World Reincarnation Technique, Sai decided to use the "emotional energy" to strengthen his abilities, what made his negative emotions surface. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Tiger Vision Staring Bullet
skills.description: Emotional Energy Sai targets one enemy permanently. When this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 25 damage and this skill will end. If this skill is used on an enemy already affected by it, it will also remove all helpful skills from them. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Super God Imitating Drawing
skills.description: Emotional Energy Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, any new invulnerability skill this enemy uses will last 1 less turn.*

skills.name: Leadership: Aerial Assist
skills.description: Emotional Energy Sai gains 1 white energy and targets his team. After 1 turn, they will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 1 turn. The turn after that, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: High Speed Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Emotional Energy Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Tatewaki
description: Tatewaki was a former Samurai from the Land of Iron who later served as a retainer to the daimyou of the Land of This. He was reincarnated by Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Melee Interception
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tatewaki targets one enemy for 1 turn, making the non-conditional stun effects of any new skill this enemy uses last 1 less turn. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Rupture' will stun them for 1 turn if used on them. This skill becomes 'Chakra Shockwave Slash' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Rupture
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tatewaki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Battle Nemesis
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tatewaki targets himself and one enemy. After 3 turns, Edo Tensei Tatewaki will die. During this time, if either Edo Tensei Tatewaki or this enemy die, the other will die as well. The target enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns.

skills.name: Blade Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Tatewaki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra Shockwave Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Tatewaki deals 35 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn makes the non-conditional stun effects of any new skill they use last 1 less turn. This skill cannot be countered.

name: Ao (B)
description: Ao managed to be the sole survivor the Ten-Tails' devastating attack on the Allied Shinobi Forces HQ though it left him severely wounded. Due to his injuries, Ao became a patient of Katasuke, who used Scientific Ninja Tools to rehabilitate him. Ao was approached by Victor who recruited him to Kara as an Outer, who would outfit his body with Scientific Ninja Tools and give the retired shinobi a new purpose. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Machine Gun Havoc
skills.description: Ao (B) deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time*, 'Chakra Blade' will remove 1 additional random energy from them. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Mirror Drone
skills.description: Ao (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new energy or affliction-only skill, 'Mirror Drone' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Chakra Blade
skills.description: Ao (B) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 0 random energies from them. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Machine Gun Block
skills.description: This skill makes Ao (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Jutsu Absorption Arm
skills.description: If Ao (B) uses 'Machine Gun Block' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Jutsu Absorption Arm': For the rest of the game, 'Machine Gun Block' will have 2 less turns of cooldown, will be invisible, will no longer make Ao (B) invulnerable and will be able to be used on him or on an ally to reflect all harmful energy skills used on them for 1 turn to the users of those skills.

name: Garou
description: Garou is a man who works for Kara as an Outer. Using his Shinobi-Ware, Garou can generate and fire blasts from his make-shift arms, while also being a fierce hand-to-hand combatant. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Counter Flying Kick
skills.description: Garou targets himself or an ally, countering the first harmful physical and the first harmful energy skills used on the target for 1 turn. The enemy whose physical skill was countered will have 'High Speed Headbutt' applied on them. The enemy whose energy skill was countered will have 'High Speed Falling Fist' applied on them. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot
skills.description: Garou deals 25 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. For 1 turn, this skill will be unable to be used on the same enemy. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Shinobi Gauntlet: Shot Barrage
skills.description: Garou targets all enemies, applying 'Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot' on all of them. If 'High Speed Headbutt' or 'High Speed Falling Fist' is active on a target of this skill, that skill will be applied again on them.

skills.name: Shinobi Gauntlet Block
skills.description: This skill makes Garou invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: High Speed Headbutt
skills.description: The target takes 15 damage and then has their mental and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns.

skills.name: High Speed Falling Fist
skills.description: The target takes 15 damage and then becomes unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Achievement: Enrage
skills.description: If Garou uses 'Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot' while having 35 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Enrage': For the rest of the game, 'Counter Flying Kick' will have no cooldown.

name: Delta
description: Delta is an Inner from the organisation Kara. Being an Inner of Kara, Delta is regarded as holding completely monstrous abilities - her body has been extensively enhanced by Amado with highly-advanced Shinobi-ware to the point where she had become a full cyborg, capable of body transformations. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Modified Leg
skills.description: Delta deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. She will become invulnerable to physical skills for 2 turns. This effect ends if Delta is affected by a new harmful energy or affliction-only skill.

skills.name: Absorbing Eye
skills.description: The next harmful energy or affliction-only skill used on Delta will be countered and then replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and is invisible until triggered.

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Destruction Beam
skills.description: Delta deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. This enemy will ignore healing effects permanently. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on any of Delta's allies will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Rocket Legs
skills.description: This skill makes Delta invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Spy Drone
skills.description: If Delta uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Destruction Beam' and then uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Rocket Legs' the turn right after, she will achieve 'Achievement: Spy Drone': For 2 turns, her skills will ignore invulnerability.

name: Iou
description: Iou is a medical-nin from the Hidden Leaf Village, assigned to the Logistic Support and Medical Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces during the Fourth Shinobi World War. Iou has excellent chakra control and is capable of using Earth Release. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones
skills.description: Iou deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new strategic skill, they will take 5 damage. They will be permanently marked by this skill. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Sealing-Tagged Stone
skills.description: Iou targets all enemies marked by 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones', dealing 15 damage to them, stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn and removing 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones' from them.

skills.name: Rushed Kunai Slash
skills.description: Iou deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy is marked by 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones', they will also deal 10 less damage with physical and energy skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Kunai Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Iou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage
description: The Third Kazekage was the leader of the Hidden Sand Village, and is hailed as the village's strongest Kazekage ever, able to create Iron Sand. He was killed by Sasori. Orochimaru, in his quest to obtain absolute mastery of all ninjutsu, managed to acquire some of the Kazekage's DNA, which he used as a source for the Impure World Reincarnation technique. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will deal 5 less physical and energy damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Iron Sand Gathering Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will deal 10 less physical and energy damage, 'Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target' will deal 10 additional damage and this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Iron Sand Manipulation
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage reduces all enemies' physical and energy damage by 5 for 2 turns. For 2 turns, 'Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target' and 'Iron Sand Gathering Assault' will cost 1 less random energy and Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage will have 20 points of destructible defense.

skills.name: Impure Endurance
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kashin Koji
description: Kashin Koji is a clone of Jiraiya that was created by Sanzu Amado for the purpose of killing Ootsutsuki Isshiki. An Inner of Kara, he is in charge of the sector on the outskirts of the Land of Fire. Koji has the same abilities as the Toad Sannin, such as frog-related summonings and fire-related ninjutsu. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sealing Technique: Frog Suppression
skills.description: Kashin Koji targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, everytime they use a new physical, energy or mental skill, they will take 10 additional damage from skills with the other 2 mentioned classes for 1 turn.

skills.name: Surprise Rasengan
skills.description: Kashin Koji deals 25 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: True Fire of Samadhi
skills.description: Kashin Koji deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 4 turns and 15 affliction damage to all allies instantly. All characters will ignore healing effects for 4 turns. This skill cannot be ignored or removed.

skills.name: Shurikenjutsu Interception
skills.description: This skill makes Kashin Koji invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Boiler Toad
skills.description: If Kashin Koji uses 'Surprise Rasengan' while 'Sealing Technique: Frog Suppression' and 'True Fire of Samadhi' are both active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Boiler Toad': He will gain 1 additional random energy each turn for 3 turns.

name: Sennin Koji
description: Unlike his template, Koji can instantly access Sage Mode with a perfect balance of chakra and natural energy. Through his senjutsu skills, Koji enhances his physical abilities and ninjutsu, able to use some of the strongest fire techniques ever seen. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet
skills.description: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns, deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and makes them take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills for 1 turn. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Flame Attack' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Fire Release: Flame Attack
skills.description: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns, deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Sage Art: Five Fire Gods' Fan of Flames
skills.description: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns and deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet' and 'Fire Release: Flame Attack' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Ninja Art: Needle Jizou
skills.description: After 1 turn, this skill makes Sennin Koji invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Achievement: Wild Lion's Mane
skills.description: If Sennin Koji is targeted by a new harmful physical skill after using 'Ninja Art: Needle Jizou' and before becoming invulnerable from it, he will achieve 'Achievement: Wild Lion's Mane': For the rest of the game, he will have 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction. This damage reduction effect cannot be ignored.

name: Karma Boruto
description: After Momoshiki makes contact with his arm, Boruto gains the Karma, what greatly boosts his physical parameters and also lets Boruto absorb virtually any ninjutsu or energy-based target. Also, Boruto can produce a dimensional portal to other realms. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Karma Cleanse
skills.description: Karma Boruto targets his team for 3 turns. During this time, all harmful energy and affliction skills will be removed from them each turn. 'Karma Rasengan' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Karma Rift
skills.description: Karma Boruto targets any character. For 1 turn, the target will be invulnerable to harmful skills and will have their harmful skills stunned. Karma Boruto takes 5 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Karma Rasengan
skills.description: Karma Boruto deals 35 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Karma Absorption
skills.description: This skill makes Karma Boruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Ootsutsukification
skills.description: If Karma Boruto uses 'Karma Rasengan' 3 times in the game with at least 1 stack of 'Karma Cleanse', he will achieve 'Achievement: Ootsutsukification': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 50 health. For the rest of the game, he will gain 20 points of damage reduction and his skills will be replaced by Ootsutsuki Boruto's skills.

name: Ootsutsuki Boruto
description: When drained of enough chakra or injured to the point of fainting, Boruto's Karma fully manifests Momoshiki's conscience and personality, allowing him to take control of Boruto's body and fight on his behalf, gaining access to Boruto's knowledge and skills in addition to his own. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ootsutsuki Havoc
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Boruto deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Boruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Ootsutsuki Recovery
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Boruto heals one ally or himself for 15 health. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Boruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Ootsutsuki Chou Oodama Rasengan
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Boruto makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 45 damage to them.

skills.name: Ootsutsuki Rampage
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Boruto gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, 'Ootsutsuki Havoc' will permanently increase its own damage by 5 and 'Ootsutsuki Recovery' will permanently increase its own healing by 5 whenever used. During this time, Ootsutsuki Boruto will take 5 affliction damage* each turn, will ignore healing effects and every enemy who uses a new skill on him will deal 5 less non-affliction damage that turn. This skill cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Achievement: Ootsutsuki Byakugan
skills.description: If Ootsutsuki Boruto uses 'Ootsutsuki Chou Oodama Rasengan' while 'Ootsutsuki Rampage' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Ootsutsuki Byakugan': For the rest of the game, 'Ootsutsuki Havoc' will, for 1 turn, make any new invisible skill its target uses become visible.

name: Ootsutsuki Urashiki
description: Urashiki is a low-ranking member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, sent to assist Momoshiki and Kinshiki on their mission to investigate Kaguya's whereabouts and gather the chakra of the God Tree on Earth. Urashiki's signature skill is to create a flexible fishing rod of chakra that he could use to manifest an extendable thread and fishing hook, which he can launch a barrage of. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra Fishing Rod
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Urashiki deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy, Ootsutsuki Urashiki will gain 1 random energy and the skill they used will replace 'Chakra Bowl' (or the skill in its spot) permanently.

skills.name: Chakra Bowl
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Urashiki gains 1 red energy.

skills.name: Heavenly Essential Wave Current Star Lord
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Urashiki deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if any of them uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy and Ootsutsuki Urashiki will gain 1 random energy.

skills.name: Fishing Rod Block
skills.description: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Urashiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Doujutsu Mastery
skills.description: If Ootsutsuki Urashiki uses 'Fishing Rod Block' and then uses 'Heavenly Essential Wave Current Star Lord' the turn right after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Doujutsu Mastery': All harmful skills are removed from him, he is healed for 20 health and his skills will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn.

name: Chakra Fruit Urashiki
description: Battered and too weak to continue fighting, Urashiki decided to consume all his accumulated chakra. He ripped out both his eyes and ate them as well. The final result transformed him into a monster, able to use techniques like Jeweled Box and Dragon Palace. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Monster Wing: Gale
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. For 1 turn, his team will be invulnerable to physical skills. For 2 turns, 'Dragon Palace' will cost 1 less white energy, will deal 15 less damage and will not stun its target.*

skills.name: Jeweled Box
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, 'Dragon Palace' will cost 1 less red energy, will deal 15 less damage and will not remove energy from its target.* This skill does not stack on Chakra Fruit Urashiki and will re-apply itself on him.

skills.name: Dragon Palace
skills.description: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 55 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them for 1 turn and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Monster Flight
skills.description: This skill makes Chakra Fruit Urashiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Chakra Eating
skills.description: If Chakra Fruit Urashiki uses 'Dragon Palace' twice in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra Eating': For 5 turns, he will be invulnerable to energy and affliction-only skills.

name: Sabu
description: Sabu is an enka ninja music master. Killer Bee calls him Sabu-chan, and later, the oddly constructed Master Sabu-chan. His companion is Ponta, a giant raccoon. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Ogaiht

skills.name: Enka Master Inspiration
skills.description: Sabu targets one ally or himself, making the target invulnerable to non-strategic skills and granting them lifelink for 1 turn.

skills.name: Yosaku Cut
skills.description: Sabu deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. One random member of Sabu's team will have lifelink for 1 turn.

skills.name: Enka Calling: Ponta
skills.description: Sabu targets his team for 3 turns, granting them 10 points of damage reduction and healing them for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Ponta Saving' for 2 turns after used and ends if Sabu dies.

skills.name: Yosaku Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Sabu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ponta Saving
skills.description: Sabu targets one ally. For 2 turns, the first time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 30, will gain 1 random energy and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

name: Boro
description: Boro is an Inner from the organisation Kara and the leader of an Ootsutsuki-worshipping cult. Being an Inner of Kara, Boro is regarded as completely monstrous in terms of power and made even stronger with his body modified by Amado. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Dark Cloud
skills.description: Boro targets all enemies for 8 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, they will die instantly. For the rest of the game, Boro will be healed for 5 health each turn and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill cannot be used while active and ends if Boro dies.

skills.name: Lava Release: Planet-Branding Blast
skills.description: Boro deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their strategic skills for 1 turn. If 'Dark Cloud' is active on this enemy, it will be removed from them and then applied again on them lasting 4 turns only.

skills.name: Self-Healing Technique
skills.description: Boro heals himself for 20 health. For the rest of the game, this skill will heal 5 additional health and 'Lava Release: Planet-Branding Blast' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Formation Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Boro invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Dark Cloud' is active, this skill will grant him 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn instead.

skills.name: Achievement: Body Mutation
skills.description: If Boro uses 'Self-Healing Technique' while having 15 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Body Mutation': He is healed for 100 health and gains 50 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Rampage Boro's skills.

name: Sanzu Amado
description: Amado is a former Inner from the organisation Kara and the head of its research and development division. He has since defected to the Hidden Leaf Village, where he used a mix of bluffs and gifts to gain official citizenship for the Hokage's protection. Amado is an exceptionally intelligent man with exceedingly advanced knowledge in science. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Explosive Collar
skills.description: Sanzu Amado targets one enemy permanently. When that enemy uses a new skill, they will be dealt 35 piercing damage and this skill will end. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sonic Tuning Fork
skills.description: Sanzu Amado targets one enemy and another random enemy permanently. When they use a new skill, it will be countered and this skill will end on that enemy.

skills.name: Anesthetic Injection
skills.description: Sanzu Amado deals 15 damage to one enemy. This enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage until the next time they use a new harmful skill. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Prepared Hideout
skills.description: This skill makes Sanzu Amado invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Calling a Cyborg
skills.description: If Sanzu Amado uses either 'Explosive Collar' 3 times or 'Anesthetic Injection' 4 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Calling a Cyborg': He becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by: Delta's if the skill used was 'Explosive Collar'; Kashin Koji's if the skill used was 'Anesthetic Injection'.

name: Jigen
description: Jigen was a novice monk that became the vessel of Ootsutsuki Isshiki and eventually had his body completely taken over by Isshiki invading it. As the leader of Kara, Jigen's body is modified with Scientific Ninja Tools, and is a complete monster in terms of power and ability. The strongest of his organisation, his might far surpasses even the other Inners. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra-Paralyzing Rod
skills.description: Jigen deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's energy skills will cost 1 additional random energy and if they use a new non-energy skill, 'Hell From Below' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Hell From Below
skills.description: Jigen deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: All-Sealing Jar
skills.description: Jigen targets one enemy permanently, each turn removing 1 random energy from them. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Jigen*. The first enemy to use a new harmful skill on Jigen will take 15 damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn.* During this time, Jigen will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.*

skills.name: Karma Rift: Dimensional Travel
skills.description: This skill makes Jigen or one target ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: True Chakra Reveal
skills.description: If Jigen is targeted by a new harmful physical skill right after using 'Chakra-Paralyzing Rod' and then uses 'Hell From Below' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: True Chakra Reveal': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 50 health. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Ootsutsuki Isshiki's skills.

name: Ootsutsuki Isshiki
description: Isshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family and the leader of Kara. With his unique right eye, Isshiki is able to view the lifeforce of living things in the form of fire-like shadows and perform Sukunahikona, a technique that allows him to instantly shrink himself or anything non-living target he saw and just as quickly restore its original size. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sukunahikona
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets himself or one ally. For 1 turn, the target's skills will cost 1 random energy less and any enemy that targets them with a new skill will deal 15 less non-affliction damage that turn. During this time, the first time the target is targeted by a new harmful skill, they will gain 1 red and 1 white energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Disruption Cube
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Isshiki deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, all enemies' mental and strategic skills will be stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Hellish Heaven
skills.description: For 1 turn, every original non-affliction damage dealt to Ootsutsuki Isshiki's team will be capped at 15; this effect cannot be ignored. This skill will be replaced by 'Heavenly Hell' for 1 turn after used. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Karma: Isshiki
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets one ally permanently. If their health drops to 30 or below while Ootsutsuki Isshiki is dead, that ally will be healed for 70 health, will have all helpful and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced by Ootsutsuki Isshiki's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Heavenly Hell
skills.description: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets all enemies, dealing 20 damage to them and then stunning their non-mental skills for 2 turns.

skills.name: Achievement: Raging Will
skills.description: If Ootsutsuki Isshiki uses 'Disruption Cube' while 'Heavenly Hell' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Raging Will': For the rest of the game, his skills will have no cost, he will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and he will ignore healing effects.

name: Baryon Naruto
description: In the most dire of situations, Naruto is able to access a deep level of Kurama's power, Baryon Mode. In a process similar to nuclear fusion, Naruto's and Kurama's chakra are consumed as raw materials to produce a new type of energy. As powerful as Baryon Mode is, it is extremely dangerous if used for too long or recklessly, making this form a "double-edged sword". ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Tail Cocoon
skills.description: Baryon Naruto heals one ally for 20 health for 2 turns. During this time, any enemy that targets this ally with a new skill will lose 1 random energy. This skill ends if Baryon Naruto dies.

skills.name: Tail Prison
skills.description: Baryon Naruto stuns one enemy's physical skills for 3 turns.

skills.name: Baryon Rasengan
skills.description: Baryon Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 25 health Baryon Naruto has lost. For 1 turn, if 'Tail Prison' is used, it will stun physical and strategic skills, instead of physical skills only.

skills.name: Kamikaze Taijutsu
skills.description: Baryon Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy and takes 15 affliction damage.* For 1 turn, Baryon Naruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill deals 10 additional damage with each use (the self-damage is not increased).

skills.name: Achievement: Payback
skills.description: If Baryon Naruto uses 'Baryon Rasengan' while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Payback': He takes 15 affliction damage and gains 3 random energies.

name: Hatake Kakashi (B)
description: Kakashi became the Sixth Hokage after Tsunade's retirement, but after some years, he passed down the mantle to Naruto. Now retired of the job and without the Sharingan he once had, Kakashi has to rely in a purple lightning technique he developed to fight against his enemies. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Purple Raikiri
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi (B) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Earth Release: Multitude of Walls
skills.description: For 2 turns, the physical and energy skills of Hatake Kakashi (B)'s team will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage. During this time, all enemies are targeted and if any of them uses a new harmful skill, then for 1 turn that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy and they will take 25 additional damage from Hatake Kakashi (B)'s skills.

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Hell Viewing
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi (B) will ignore enemy damage for 1 turn. This skill costs 1 additional random energy with each use. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Substitution Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow
skills.description: Hatake Kakashi (B) makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 25 damage and 25 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Achievement: No Need of a Sharingan
skills.description: If Hatake Kakashi (B) uses 'Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow' while 'Earth Release: Multitude of Walls' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: No Need of a Sharingan': For the rest of the game, his skills will cost 1 less blue energy.

name: Sarutobi Mirai
description: Mirai is a chuunin-level kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village, member of the Sarutobi clan. She is the daughter of Kurenai and Asuma and inherited the abilities of both. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death
skills.description: Sarutobi Mirai targets one enemy, who will take 35 piercing damage after 1 turn. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, all already active helpful skills will be removed from them and this skill will then end on them.

skills.name: Wind Release: Whirlwind Fist
skills.description: Sarutobi Mirai deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their energy skills for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 green energy instead and if used again, it will stun physical skills instead. This skill ends if Sarutobi Mirai dies.

skills.name: Fire Release: Flint Yagura
skills.description: Sarutobi Mirai deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 3 turns. This damage cannot be increased or decreased. During this time, any new skill they use that deal 35 or more direct original damage in any of its versions will be countered. This skill ends if Sarutobi Mirai dies.

skills.name: Blade Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Mirai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Field Control
skills.description: If Sarutobi Mirai uses 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death' while having 40 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Field Control': For 3 turns, if a new harmful skill is used on her, she will become invulnerable to all other harmful skills for the rest of that turn.

name: Ise Udon
description: Udon is a jounin rank shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village and a former teammate of Konohamaru. He is the captain of Team 5 and a very skilled ninja specialised in producing powerful water tendrils from his mucus. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Nasal Fluid Interference
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Ise Udon's team. If used on an enemy, they will deal 100% less damage for 1 turn and will take 10 additional damage from 'Nose Water Tree' permanently. If used on a member of Ise Udon's team, they will ignore enemy damage for 1 turn and 'Nose Water Tree' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible on the first turn.

skills.name: Nose Water Tree
skills.description: Ise Udon deals 20 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Situation Analysis
skills.description: Ise Udon targets all characters. One random enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Nose Water Tree' permanently. 'Nose Water Tree' will last 1 additional turn on one random member of Ise Udon's team permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Jounin Speed
skills.description: This skill makes Ise Udon invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal
skills.description: If Ise Udon uses 'Nose Water Tree' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal': 'Nose Water Tree' is removed from him. His skills will cost 1 less red energy for 2 turns.

name: Kazamatsuri Moegi
description: Moegi is a jounin rank kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village and a former teammate of Konohamaru. She is a skilled kunoichi who is proficient in the field of Earth and Water Release techniques. Moegi is the captain of the new era's Ino-Shika-Chou formation, the new Team 10. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Release: Water Hail
skills.description: Kazamatsuri Moegi deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will target all enemies instead if used again.

skills.name: Earth Release: Gravel
skills.description: Kazamatsuri Moegi stuns one enemy for 1 turn. Also for 1 turn, one random member of her team will be unable to be killed.

skills.name: Earth Release: Earth-Style Wall
skills.description: Kazamatsuri Moegi targets her team. For 1 turn, the first new harmful non-affliction damage skill that is used on each member of her team will deal no damage to them and that character will gain permanent destructible defense equal to the original damage of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Kunai Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Kazamatsuri Moegi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal
skills.description: If Kazamatsuri Moegi uses 'Earth Release: Gravel' and then uses 'Water Release: Water Hail' the turn right after, she will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal': 'Water Release: Water Hail' will cost 1 less blue energy for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hanabi (B)
description: Hanabi, the younger sister of Hinata, has grown up and became a powerful jounin. Now the captain of Team 15, the Hyuuga clan kunoichi can use her family's special techniques with mastery. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm
skills.description: Hyuuga Hanabi (B) destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and deals 30 damage to them. If the enemy is affected by 'Mastered Byakugan Sight', they will also lose 1 random energy instantly. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses an energy drain, removal or gain skill, they will take 20 damage.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hyuuga Hanabi (B) targets herself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first harmful skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will take 35 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Mastered Byakugan Sight
skills.description: For 4 turns, Hyuuga Hanabi (B)'s team will gain 5 points of damage reduction and all new invisible skills all enemies use will become visible. During this time, 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' will remove 1 random energy from the affected enemies if used on them and will have 1 additional turn of cooldown.

skills.name: Insightful Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hanabi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Gentle Fist Follow-Up
skills.description: If Hyuuga Hanabi (B) uses 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' 3 times in the game, she will achieve 'Achievement: Gentle Fist Follow-Up': For the rest of the game, 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' will also grant Hyuuga Hanabi (B) 1 green energy when used.

name: Uchiha Sakura
description: Years after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Sakura became the director of the Medical Clinic and its top healer, married Sasuke and had her daughter Sarada. She is now not only a remarkable force of her village but also one to take notes when the subject is the medical-nin. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Quick Punch / Quick Heal
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team. If used on an enemy, they will be dealt 20 damage. If used on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team, they will be healed for 20 health.

skills.name: Major Punch / Major Heal
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team. If used on an enemy, they will be dealt 30 damage and then ignore healing effects for 2 turns. If used on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team, they will be healed for 30 health and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Frontline Warrior
skills.description: For 2 turns, Uchiha Sakura will be healed for 10 health each turn, will be unable to be killed and 'Quick Punch / Quick Heal' and 'Major Punch / Major Heal' will target all enemies and all members of Uchiha Sakura's team whenever used. During this time, said skills will have 1 additional turn of cooldown.

skills.name: Blocking Punch
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Environment Interaction
skills.description: If Uchiha Sakura is targeted by a new harmful direct stun skill while 'Frontline Warrior' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Environment Interaction': She will be invulnerable to non-mental skills for 2 turns.

name: Aburame Shino (B)
description: Ten years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, Shino becomes the homeroom teacher for the new year's Academy students. Following his duties as a teacher, Shino is a strong jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village that now knows basically everything about his clan's secret techniques. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Secret Technique: Bug Prison
skills.description: Aburame Shino (B) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy each turn permanently. The next skill that this enemy uses will be countered and then this skill will end. This skill becomes 'Chakra-Eating Assault' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Hidden Consumption
skills.description: Aburame Shino (B) targets one enemy. For 4 turns, everytime this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy.

skills.name: Bug Thread: Protective Trap
skills.description: Aburame Shino (B) targets himself or one ally. For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on the target will be countered and 'Hidden Consumption' will be applied on the countered enemy. If this skill does not counter an enemy skill, Aburame Shino (B) will gain 1 red and 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Surrounding Protectors
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra-Eating Assault
skills.description: Aburame Shino (B) deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy affected (and not countered yet) by 'Secret Technique: Bug Prison' and steals 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Achievement: Giant Bug Wall
skills.description: If Aburame Shino (B) uses 'Chakra-Eating Assault' while 'Hidden Consumption' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Giant Bug Wall': He gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense and for the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on him, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from Aburame Shino (B)'s skills permanently.

name: Kankuro (B)
description: Fifteen years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, Kankuro continues to be one of Gaara's protectors as well as the greatest puppeteer alive. Kankuro can not only easily control every puppet he is in power of, but also use his chakra threads to control the opponents' bodies. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Karasu Head Stab
skills.description: Kankuro (B) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 15 additional damage for each stack of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance' and removes all stacks afterwards.

skills.name: Chakra Thread Prison
skills.description: Kankuro (B) stuns one enemy for 0 turns. This skill lasts 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance' and removes all stacks afterwards.

skills.name: Puppet Preparation: Enhance
skills.description: Kankuro (B) gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense, improves 'Karasu Head Stab' and 'Chakra Thread Prison' and makes them cost 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Expert Backflip
skills.description: This skill makes Kankuro (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Expert Puppeteer
skills.description: If Kankuro (B) gets 4 stacks of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance', he will achieve 'Achievement: Expert Puppeteer': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore enemy stun effects.

name: Nara Temari
description: Years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, Temari married Shikamaru and became a member of the Nara clan, leaving the Hidden Sand Village to be a Hidden Leaf Village's citizen. She now works as a kunoichi for the village and is the mother of Shikadai. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind: Go Down
skills.description: Nara Temari deals 20 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. 'Cutting Whirlwind: Go Up' will deal 5 additional damage for the rest of the game. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind: Go Up
skills.description: Nara Temari deals 20 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to energy, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. 'Cutting Whirlwind: Go Down' will deal 5 additional damage for the rest of the game. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Moon Increase: Offense & Defense
skills.description: Nara Temari gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, 'Reactive Fan Block' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Reactive Fan Block
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Wind Release: Multi-Task of the Dragon
skills.description: Nara Temari deals 35 piercing damage to all enemies and makes her team invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 15 less damage.

skills.name: Achievement: Dragon Wind Awakening
skills.description: If Nara Temari uses 'Moon Increase: Offense & Defense' 3 times in the game, she will achieve 'Achievement: Dragon Wind Awakening': For the rest of the game, 'Moon Increase: Offense & Defense' will be replaced by 'Wind Release: Multi-Task of the Dragon'.

name: Deepa
description: Deepa is an Inner of Kara, a blood-thirsty sociopath capable of killing people without any hesitation or true provocation. His signature ability is to control the molecular-bonding of the carbon that he is exposed to. Alternatively, he can freely manipulate any raw carbon around him, shaping them into a myriad of forms. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Carbon Cube Rain
skills.description: For 3 turns, Deepa deals 10 damage to all enemies and makes their energy drain or removal skills remove 1 less random energy*. During this time, if Deepa is targeted by*: a new harmful physical skill, 'Carbon Ring' will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn; a new harmful non-physical skill, 'Carbon Whip' will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn.

skills.name: Carbon Ring
skills.description: Deepa deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Carbon Whip
skills.description: Deepa deals 15 damage to all enemies and makes his team ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Partial Carbon Cover
skills.description: This skill makes Deepa invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Carbon Armor
skills.description: If Deepa uses 'Carbon Ring' while having 50 or less health and then uses 'Partial Carbon Cover' and 'Carbon Whip' consecutively anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Carbon Armor': For the rest of the game, every original non-affliction damage dealt to him will be capped at 10; this effect cannot be ignored.

name: Rampage Boro
description: Without the core to keep his body stabilised, Boro mutates uncontrollably, causing him to enter Rampage Mode, in which he grew to extraordinary size and his limbs transformed into tentacles. In this mode, Boro is an enormous monster capable of destroying everything in its path.

skills.name: Rampage Mode
skills.description: Rampage Boro targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new non-strategic skill, 'Self-Rage' will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Self-Rage' permanently after used, cannot be countered or reflected, ignores invulnerability and ends if Rampage Boro dies or if it's removed from any of the affected characters.

skills.name: Rampage Punch
skills.description: Rampage Boro deals 30 damage to one enemy, plus 5 damage for each skill Rampage Boro has used. The target enemy will be stunned for 0 turns, plus 1 turn for each skill Rampage Boro has used (up to 9 turns).

skills.name: Rampage Crush
skills.description: Rampage Boro deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes his team ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 0 turns, plus 1 turn for each skill Rampage Boro has used.

skills.name: Enhanced Endurance
skills.description: Rampage Boro grants himself 30 points of permanent destructible defense and grants his allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense. These values are increased by 5 for each skill Rampage Boro has used.

skills.name: Self-Rage
skills.description: Rampage Boro gains 1 stack of 'Self-Rage'.

skills.name: Achievement: Enraged Rampage
skills.description: If Rampage Boro gets 5 stacks of 'Self-Rage', he will achieve 'Achievement: Enraged Rampage': All skills are removed from him and 'Rampage Mode' cannot be used again. He is healed for 50 health and then will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 3 turns. During this time, 'Rampage Punch' will instantly kill the target and 'Rampage Crush' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Skill Counter
skills.description: This is a counter of how many skills Rampage Boro has used.

name: Nara Shikamaru (B)
description: Now an adult, Shikamaru became the Seventh Hokage's assistant and Naruto's right hand. In his personal life, Shikamaru married Temari and had his son Shikadai; as a shinobi, Shikamaru is known to be one of the smartest - if not the smartest - ninja alive. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shadow Binding Ambush
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru (B) deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new mental or affliction skill, their mental and affliction skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Effortless Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru (B) deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new mental or affliction skill, their physical, energy and strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Master Analysis: Battlefield Control
skills.description: Nara Shikamaru (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses: a new non-strategic skill, 'Shadow Binding Ambush' and 'Effortless Shadow Imitation' will deal 15 additional damage for 1 turn; a new invulnerability skill, 'Shadow Binding Ambush' and 'Effortless Shadow Imitation' will make Nara Shikamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn; a new energy gain/removal/steal skill, Nara Shikamaru (B) will gain 1 white energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Defensive Shadow Hold
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Love-Driven Analysis
skills.description: If Nara Shikamaru (B) uses 'Defensive Shadow Hold' after killing an enemy using either 'Shadow Binding Ambush' or 'Effortless Shadow Imitation', he will achieve 'Achievement: Love-Driven Analysis': For the rest of the game, 'Master Analysis: Battlefield Control' will last permanently on its enemy target, will be visible and will be usable only once more.

name: Yamanaka Ino (B)
description: Inspired by her father's commitment to the village and noble sacrifice, Ino took the lead in rebuilding the village's sensory network after the Fourth Shinobi World War. Ino married Sai and had her son Inojin, and is now acknowledged as one of the greatest sensor ninja alive. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Furious Punch
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Memory Extraction
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets one enemy for 1 turn. If they use a new skill, Yamanaka Ino (B) will copy it and it will replace this skill for 1 turn and her skills will cost 1 less green, red, blue and random energies also for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sensing Machine
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets all enemies and all allies. For 3 turns, all new invisible skills all enemies use will become visible and they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. Every turn during this time, the first harmful mental or strategic skill used on each ally will be countered. This skill becomes 'Sensory Surveillance' for 3 turns after used, cannot be countered or reflected and ends if Yamanaka Ino (B) dies.

skills.name: Defensive Telepathy
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sensory Surveillance
skills.description: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, they will be countered, will take 25 piercing damage and Yamanaka Ino (B) will gain 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Achievement: Unsearchable Mind
skills.description: If Yamanaka Ino (B) uses any skill while 'Sensing Machine' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Unsearchable Mind': For the rest of the game, Yamanaka Ino (B) will become invulnerable to mental skills.

name: Rock Lee (B)
description: Years after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Rock Lee was promoted to jounin rank and had a son named Metal Lee. He keeps his position as one of the greatest taijutsu users in the whole world, mainly considering all his efforts and his lack of ninjutsu or genjutsu abilities.

skills.name: Elbow Hit
skills.description: Rock Lee (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy. 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 20 additional damage the next time it's used. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: High Speed Punch
skills.description: Rock Lee (B) deals 40 damage to one enemy. 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 30 additional damage the next time it's used. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Inner Gate Charge
skills.description: For 3 turns, the damage of the next use of 'High Pressure Kick' will be increased by 10 each turn. During this time, everytime a new harmful skill is used on Rock Lee (B), 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 10 additional damage the next time it's used. This effect stacks.

skills.name: High Pressure Kick
skills.description: Rock Lee (B) deals 0 damage to one enemy and 20 additional damage for each 30 health Rock Lee (B) has lost. Afterwards, Rock Lee (B)'s skills will be removed from him if active. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Achievement: Will of the Youth
skills.description: If Rock Lee (B) is targeted by a new harmful skill right after using 'High Pressure Kick', he will achieve 'Achievement: Will of the Youth': He will gain 1 green energy. For 2 turns, he will be unable to be killed.

name: Orochimaru (B)
description: Years after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Orochimaru formed a truce with the Hidden Leaf and the Five Great Nations that he would be pardoned for his crimes under the condition he is placed under strict 24-hour surveillance by Leaf Jounin. Following his experiments, Orochimaru created synthetic humans, such as Log and Mitsuki. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Dance of the Serpent
skills.description: Orochimaru (B) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. All the other enemies will have their affliction and strategic skills stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Limb Regeneration
skills.description: For 1 turn, the first time Orochimaru (B) is targeted by a new harmful skill, he will be healed for 40 health. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Four Black Snakes Formation
skills.description: Orochimaru (B) deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. All the other enemies will take 5 affliction damage instantly and each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sword Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Orochimaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Giant Snake Ambush
skills.description: If Orochimaru (B) uses 'Dance of the Serpent', 'Limb Regeneration' and 'Four Black Snakes Formation' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Giant Snake Ambush': For the rest of the game, 'Dance of the Serpent' and 'Four Black Snakes Formation' will apply all their effects on all enemies instead whenever used.

name: Yamanaka Sai
description: With the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Sai eventually married Ino and took on the Yamanaka name. They have a son together named Inojin, whom Sai helps train to become part of the new generation InoShikaChou alongside his wife. In the new era, Sai is the Anbu Chief of the Hidden Leaf Village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Stend

skills.name: Unexpected Neck Jab
skills.description: Yamanaka Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Art of the Attacking Bird' will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Art of the Attacking Bird
skills.description: Yamanaka Sai deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy, who will take 15 piercing damage the turn after. For 1 turn, 'Art of the Majestic Bird' will deal 5 additional damage and grant 5 additional points of destructible defense.

skills.name: Painting Preparation
skills.description: Yamanaka Sai targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use: a new harmful skill, 'Art of the Attacking Bird' will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn; a new friendly skill, Yamanaka Sai will become invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Art of the Majestic Bird' permanently after used and ends if Yamanaka Sai dies.

skills.name: Tactical Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Art of the Majestic Bird
skills.description: Yamanaka Sai deals 20 damage to all enemies and grants his team 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Achievement: Custom Scroll
skills.description: If Yamanaka Sai uses 'Unexpected Neck Jab' while having 70 or less health and then uses 'Art of the Attacking Bird' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Custom Scroll': For the rest of the game, the damage of 'Art of the Majestic Bird' will be concentrated on one target enemy.

name: Code
description: Code is the last active Inner from Kara. Carrying Isshiki's legacy within him, he inherited the Ootsutsuki clan's will to become a Celestial Being and continually evolve. While the true extent of his power is unknown, Amado has noted that his peak combat abilities far exceed Jigen's, making him the strongest member of Kara next to the resurrected Isshiki. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Razor Sharp Talons
skills.description: Code targets all enemies marked by 'Claw Mark', dealing 20 piercing damage to them and killing them if their health drops to 5 or below. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on him will be dealt 10 piercing damage.

skills.name: Shinobi-Ware: Giant Claw
skills.description: Code targets all enemies marked by 'Claw Mark', dealing 30 damage to them and stunning their harmful skills for 1 turn. The next enemy that uses a new skill on him will lose 1 random energy. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Claw Mark
skills.description: Code deals 5 damage to one enemy and then marks that enemy for 4 turns. For 1 turn, Code will ignore enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects. This skill ends if Code dies, cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and needs an available enemy to be used.

skills.name: Claw Mark Escape
skills.description: This skill makes Code invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: White Karma
skills.description: If Code uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Razor Sharp Talons' at least 3 times in the game and then uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Giant Claw' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: White Karma': For the rest of the game, the damage of his skills will be increased by 10 permanently each turn.

name: Sennin Mitsuki
description: Mitsuki possesses the ability to use Sage Transformation, able to activate with ease. Unique to him, he grows a single horn from his forehead and cyan chakra shroud. Mitsuki can also use Sage Mode, which increases his speed and power tremendously, but can be dangerous to his own body. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sage Art: Life-Draining Coil
skills.description: Sennin Mitsuki targets one enemy for 3 turns, each turn stealing 10 health from them. During this time**, if this enemy uses a new invulnerability skill, they will take 20 affliction damage*. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Sennin Mitsuki dies.

skills.name: Natural Energy Boost
skills.description: Sennin Mitsuki heals one ally for 15 health. For 1 turn, that ally's non-affliction skills will deal 5 additional damage and their non-strategic skills will cost 1 less random energy. After its third use, instead of doing its original effects, this skill will make one ally's skills cost 2 random energies instead for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sage Art: Great Snake Lightning
skills.description: For 2 turns, Sennin Mitsuki becomes invulnerable* and deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy each turn. During this time, his allies will deal 5 additional damage with energy skills*.

skills.name: High Speed Escape
skills.description: Sennin Mitsuki makes his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Quick Recharge
skills.description: If Sennin Mitsuki uses any skill while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Quick Recharge': He will be healed for 10 health each turn for 3 turns.

name: Mugino
description: Mugino is a jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village, an orphaned refugee in the Land of Fire. Eventually, Mugino became a close friend of Konohamaru. Mugino is very capable in taijutsu, as well as in using Earth Release techniques or even advanced sealing techniques. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Rock Gun Technique
skills.description: Mugino deals 10 damage to one enemy and reduces this enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 10 piercing damage and their damage will be reduced by 10 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction
skills.description: Mugino deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns and makes them ignore all helpful counters on them during this time*. Mugino's team will be grant 10 points of permanent destructible defense* that stacks. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Trapping Approach
skills.description: Mugino targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical or energy skill, they will be countered. If successfully countered, they will take 10 additional damage from Mugino's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and stacks.

skills.name: Spotless Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Mugino invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Barrier Release
skills.description: If Mugino uses 'Earth Release: Rock Gun Technique' twice in a row, he will achieve 'Achievement: Barrier Release': For the rest of the game, 'Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction' will also remove all harmful stun skills from Mugino's team when used.

name: Touno Katasuke
description: Katasuke is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village's Scientific Ninja Weapons Team. As a member of the Scientific Ninja Weapons Team and inventor of the innovative Shinobi Gauntlet, Katasuke is a highly intelligent man who uses science to enlarge the range of ninjutsu in the world. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Jutsu Absorption Arm
skills.description: Touno Katasuke targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on the target will be reflected back to their users. This skill will cost 1 additional random energy for 2 turns. This skill stacks and is invisible on the first turn.

skills.name: Stored Jutsu Barrage
skills.description: Touno Katasuke deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' will deal 10 additional damage for 3 turns. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shinobi Gauntlet
skills.description: Touno Katasuke grants one ally 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and replaces the skill in their fourth slot with 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, this ally will deal 10 additional damage with 'Stored Jutsu Barrage'. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Hiding Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Touno Katasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Reinforced Gauntlet
skills.description: If Touno Katasuke uses 'Shinobi Gauntlet' while 'Jutsu Absorption Arm' and 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' are both active on him, he will achieve 'Achievement: Reinforced Gauntlet': For 4 turns, new uses of 'Jutsu Absorption Arm' will not increase its own cost.

name: Akimichi Chouji (B)
description: Years after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Chouji married the Cloud kunoichi Karui and had his daughter Chouchou. As an adult, Chouji is one of the most physically strong shinobi in the world, who can now access his Butterfly Mode without any trouble. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Giant Butterfly Wings
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji (B) targets himself for 3 turns, each turn permanently increasing the damage of 'Butterfly Destruction Blow' by 10. During this time, Akimichi Chouji (B) gains 15 points of damage reduction and if he is targeted by a new harmful direct stun skill, he will gain 2 random energies.

skills.name: Butterfly Destruction Blow
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji (B) destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense, deals 25 damage to them, stuns them for 1 turn and makes them ignore healing effects for 1 turn. 'Giant Butterfly Wings' will be removed from Akimichi Chouji (B).

skills.name: Super Multi-Size Technique
skills.description: Akimichi Chouji (B) gains 75 points of permanent destructible defense. While Akimichi Chouji (B) has destructible defense from this skill, any enemy who uses a new skill on him will ignore healing effects until the destructible defense is up. This skill does not stack on Akimichi Chouji (B) and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Butterfly Blocking Palm
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Protein Eating
skills.description: If Akimichi Chouji (B) uses 'Butterfly Destruction Blow' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Protein Eating': He is healed for 20 health instantly and 10 health each following turn permanently.

name: Tenten (B)
description: In the new era, Tenten's hobby of collecting every type of ninja tool from across the world escalated to the point she opened a shop to sell the tools, though it's nearly always empty due to the peaceful era. She occasionally helps in the Chuunin Exams, being tasked with dwindling the genin. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Prepared Net Trap
skills.description: Tenten (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 10 damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army
skills.description: Tenten (B) deals 10 damage to all enemies for 4 turns.

skills.name: Ninja Tool Shop
skills.description: Tenten (B) targets one ally, replacing all of that ally's skills with her set of tools for 1 turn.

skills.name: Skilled Jounin Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Tenten (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shuriken Toy
skills.description: For the rest of the game, this character will have 5 points of damage reduction and their skills that directly grant destructible defense will grant 5 additional points of destructible defense. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

skills.name: Average Tool Set
skills.description: For the rest of the game, this character will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

skills.name: Special Makeshift Kunai
skills.description: For the rest of the game, this character will deal 15 piercing damage to any enemy who uses a new skill on them. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

skills.name: Six Paths Sacred Treasures
skills.description: For the rest of the game, this character will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes and all harmful skills will be removed from them each turn. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

skills.name: Achievement: Puppet Triggering
skills.description: If Tenten (B) uses 'Ninja Tool Shop' 3 times in the game while 'Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Puppet Triggering': For the rest of the game, the next uses of 'Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army' will last permanently instead.

name: Shigaraki Sumire
description: Sumire's father, Shigaraki Tanuki, bestowed her with Gozu Tennou. After his death, Sumire decided that it was best to wait and create a cover story before exacting her father's plan. When revealed, Sumire summoned Nue's full form to attack the Hidden Leaf Village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Spirit Wave Bullet
skills.description: Shigaraki Sumire deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if she is targeted by a new harmful skill, 'Water Spirit Wave Bullet' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This effect can only activate once per usage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Underworld Lifeforce Transfer
skills.description: Shigaraki Sumire heals one ally for 10 health each turn permanently. During this time, Shigaraki Sumire will take 10 affliction damage* each turn and will ignore healing effects. This skill cannot be removed, cannot be used while active and ends if Shigaraki Sumire dies.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Awakened Nue
skills.description: Shigaraki Sumire removes all helpful skills from all enemies and all harmful skills from all members of her team. All enemies take 20 damage and all members of her team gain 10 points of permanent damage reduction. This skill becomes 'Chakra Absorption Tendrils' permanently after used.

skills.name: Splashing Water Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Shigaraki Sumire invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra Absorption Tendrils
skills.description: Shigaraki Sumire targets one enemy, stealing 15 health and 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Achievement: Underworld Parasite
skills.description: If Shigaraki Sumire uses 'Underworld Lifeforce Transfer' while 'Major Summoning: Awakened Nue' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Underworld Parasite': For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on her, that enemy will take 15 affliction damage*.

name: Mitarashi Anko (B)
description: Ten years after the Fourth Shinobi World War ends, Anko becomes an instructor at the Hidden Leaf Village's Academy. With a slightly-changed look, Anko is one of the most reliable jounin of the village who still uses snake-related ninjutsu to fight. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Hands
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko (B) deals 5 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy. 'Field of Snakes' will last 1 additional turn and have 1 additional turn of cooldown the next time it's used. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Field of Snakes
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko (B) deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies, who will take 5 affliction damage the following 2 turns. This damage cannot be increased or decreased. For 3 turns, all enemies will take 5 additional damage from 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' and Mitarashi Anko (B)'s team will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

skills.name: Sly Mind Affect Technique
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko (B) targets all enemies, increasing the cost of their physical and energy skills by 1 white energy for 2 turns. During this time, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands'.

skills.name: Snake Hands Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Snake Clone
skills.description: If Mitarashi Anko (B) is targeted by a new harmful affliction-only skill right after using 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands', she will achieve 'Achievement: Snake Clone': She becomes invulnerable for 2 turns.

name: Restored Karma Kawaki
description: Kawaki decided to accept Amado's idea to reapply the Karma into his body, now functioning only as a weapon with Isshiki's soul gone. This restored Karma is advanced enough for Kawaki to access Isshiki's doujutsu and various techniques. It also contains data about Amado's daughter Akebi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Disruption Cube Field
skills.description: Restored Karma Kawaki deals 10 damage to all enemies and stuns their mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Hell on Earth
skills.description: Restored Karma Kawaki targets one enemy for 2 turns, each turn dealing 10 damage to them and stunning their non-mental skills.

skills.name: Perfect Karma Palm Thrust
skills.description: Restored Karma Kawaki deals 35 affliction damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, the non-conditional stun, energy removal or energy steal effects of that enemy's new skills will take no effect. This skill deals 10 additional damage for every 30 health Restored Karma Kawaki has lost.

skills.name: Perfect Karma Relocation
skills.description: Restored Karma Kawaki targets his team. For 1 turn, all new harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on them will be reflected back to their users.
