During this time, everytime any of them is targeted by a new harmful physical, mental or strategic skill, they will gain 1 red energy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Achievement: Isshiki's Doujutsu
skills.description: If Restored Karma Kawaki uses 'Disruption Cube Field', 'Hell on Earth' and 'Perfect Karma Palm Thrust' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Isshiki's Doujutsu': For the rest of the game, he will gain 1 additional red energy each turn.

name: Hyuuga Hiashi (B)
description: In the new era, Hiashi is an old man who is still very much capable at battle. However, he instead prefers to watch the new generation evolving, allowing himself to be a loving grandfather to Boruto and Himawari more than anything else. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Veteran Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hyuuga Hiashi (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Veteran Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hyuuga Hiashi (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

skills.name: Power Mastery
skills.description: First use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. Second use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will have 1 less turn of cooldown permanently. Third use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' will ignore invulnerability and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will remove 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill can only be used 3 times.

skills.name: Byakugan: Reactive Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Byakugan Mastery
skills.description: If Hyuuga Hiashi (B) uses 'Byakugan: Reactive Defense' with 3 stacks of 'Power Mastery', he will achieve 'Achievement: Byakugan Mastery': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore energy drain or removal effects.

name: Akimichi Karui
description: Years after the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, Karui moved to the Hidden Leaf Village and married Chouji, leading to her joining the Akimichi clan and having a daughter, whom they named Chouchou. Karui is a very protective mother who is willing to do everything to ensure that her family is safe. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning-Covered Fist
skills.description: Akimichi Karui deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, her allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal 20 or less original direct damage to an enemy in any form.

skills.name: Electric Discharge
skills.description: Akimichi Karui deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, her allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal 25 or less original direct damage to an enemy in any form.

skills.name: Ointment
skills.description: Akimichi Karui targets herself or an ally, healing the target for 20 health.

skills.name: Body Barrier: Ally Protection
skills.description: Akimichi Karui makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Fury of the Cloud
skills.description: If Akimichi Karui is targeted by a new harmful skill right after using 'Body Barrier: Ally Protection', she will achieve 'Achievement: Fury of the Cloud': For 3 turns, 'Lightning-Covered Fist' and 'Electric Discharge' will deal 20 additional damage.

name: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone
description: Shojoji, renowned as Shojoji of the Corpse Clone, is a missing-nin and the leader of the Mujina Bandits. He is a very powerful shinobi, who gained his epithet from his ability to transform into his victims with his Corpse Clone Technique. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Corpse Clone Technique
skills.description: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone steals 55 health from one enemy. For 2 turns, if this enemy uses a new skill, Shojoji of the Corpse Clone will copy it and will be able to use it for no cost for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sword of the Wind Count
skills.description: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. During this time, everytime they don't use a new skill, they will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack on an enemy and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Shield of the Wind Count
skills.description: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will be dealt 30 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Strong Hand Block
skills.description: This skill makes Shojoji of the Corpse Clone invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Wind Count Reinforcement
skills.description: If Shojoji of the Corpse Clone uses 'Sword of the Wind Count' at least 3 times in the game and then uses 'Strong Hand Block' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Wind Count Reinforcement': For 3 turns, new uses of 'Sword of the Wind Count' will target all enemies instead and new uses of 'Shield of the Wind Count' will target Shojoji of the Corpse Clone's entire team instead.

name: Omoi (B)
description: Years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, Omoi became the Fifth Raikage's bodyguard. The cautious shinobi became a jounin who fights using his sword and his nature transformation, by coordinating attacks with his allies. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Cloud-Style Deception Beheading
skills.description: Omoi (B) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If Omoi (B)'s health is at 70 or below, this skill will increase the damage of its further uses by 5 permanently. This skill stacks and removes all helpful skills from Omoi (B) afterwards, but it cannot be removed itself.

skills.name: Cloud-Style Afterimage
skills.description: Omoi (B) takes 15 affliction damage* that cannot kill him. The turn after, he will be healed for 30 health. The next time 'Cloud-Style Deception Beheading' is used, it will deal another instance of 20 piercing damage to its target. This skill stacks up to 3 times.

skills.name: Lightning Release: Shadow Clone
skills.description: Omoi (B) targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the target will be unable to be killed and any enemy who uses a new skill on them will take 5 piercing damage instantly and each following turn permanently. This skill is invisible and stacks.

skills.name: Cloud-Style Sword Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Omoi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Coordinated Fight
skills.description: If Omoi (B) uses 'Lightning Release: Shadow Clone' while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Coordinated Fight': The next use of 'Cloud-Style Deception Beheading' will also increase the physical and energy damage of Omoi (B)'s allies by 10 permanently.

name: Victor
description: An old man who works as an Inner for Kara, Victor is a former shinobi who became the president of a huge medical care manufacturing company in the Land of Valleys. Victor has powerful regenerative abilities and is capable of naturally using all five nature transformations. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Dust Wind
skills.description: For 1 turn, Victor's team will have 20 points of damage reduction and all enemies will be unable to use skills with non-conditional stun, counter or reflect effects (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Wind Release: Great Balloon
skills.description: For 1 turn, all enemies will deal 15 less non-affliction damage and any enemy who uses a new skill on Victor will deal 5 less non-affliction damage permanently. For 1 turn, if Victor is targeted by a new harmful skill, 'Lightning Release: Heavenly Lightning' will cost 1 less blue energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Lightning Release: Heavenly Lightning
skills.description: Victor deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

skills.name: Walking Stick Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Victor invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Arm Growth
skills.description: If Victor uses any skill except 'Walking Stick Defense' while having 30 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Arm Growth': He is healed for 25 health.

name: Rokushou Aoi
description: Aoi is a jounin from the Hidden Rain Village and a missing-nin from the Hidden Leaf Village. A former instructor in the Hidden Leaf, he tricked Idate to steal the legendary Sword of the Thunder God, which had once belonged to Senju Tobirama, the Second Hokage. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Senbon Shower
skills.description: Rokushou Aoi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 affliction damage* the following 3 turns. During this time, the main target will ignore healing effects.

skills.name: Umbrella Shock Wave
skills.description: Rokushou Aoi destroys all enemies' destructible defense and deals 10 damage to them. The next time 'Senbon Shower' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sword of the Thunder God
skills.description: Permanently, Rokushou Aoi will deal 10 piercing damage instantly to any enemy who uses a new skill on him and during this time, 'Senbon Shower' and 'Umbrella Shock Wave' will be replaced by 'Lightning Moon Cut' and 'Ring of Electricity' respectively. This skill cannot be used while active and ends when Rokushou Aoi uses 'Lightning Moon Cut' 3 times or 'Ring of Electricity' once.

skills.name: Umbrella Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Rokushou Aoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Lightning Moon Cut
skills.description: Rokushou Aoi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Ring of Electricity
skills.description: Rokushou Aoi deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns them for 2 turns. For the rest of the game, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns. This skill stacks.

name: Kurosuki Raiga
description: Kurosuki Raiga, renowned as the Thunder of the Hidden Mist, was a jounin from the Hidden Mist Village as well as a member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist. Raiga wields Kiba, twin swords imbued with lightning. Considered the sharpest swords ever made, they can cut through anything. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Ball
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy, who will take 5 additional damage from Kurosuki Raiga's skills permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Kurosuki Raiga dies.

skills.name: Feast of Lightning
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga makes all enemies take 5 additional damage from his skills permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Kurosuki Raiga dies.

skills.name: Fangs of Lightning
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and increases the cost of that enemy's non-strategic skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning' permanently after used.

skills.name: Lightning Strike Armor
skills.description: This skill makes Kurosuki Raiga invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga ends all active control skills on all enemies, deals 15 piercing damage to the main target and 5 piercing damage to all others. This skill becomes 'Siege of Lightning' permanently after used.

skills.name: Siege of Lightning
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga targets all enemies. For 2 turns, everytime they use a new skill, they will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill becomes 'Lightning Dragon Tornado' permanently after used.

skills.name: Lightning Dragon Tornado
skills.description: Kurosuki Raiga deals 60 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill becomes 'Lightning Demon' permanently after used.

skills.name: Lightning Demon
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Kurosuki Raiga, that enemy will be dealt 100 piercing damage. This skill can only be used once and cannot be removed.

name: Yamanaka Santa
description: Santa is a jounin from the Hidden Leaf Village's Yamanaka clan. Even amongst the Yamanaka, Santa has been noted to be a keen sensor and can excel in battle even without the use of sight. He was placed in the Third Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Advanced Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Yamanaka Santa targets one enemy, who will take 25 damage at the end of their next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Yamanaka Santa. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, it will replace this skill for 1 turn and Yamanaka Santa will be able to use it for no cost. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Sensory Focus
skills.description: For the rest of the game, skills that Yamanaka Santa uses will stun for 1 additional turn if they are stun skills and will deal 5 additional damage if they are non-affliction skills. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Teamwork Tactics
skills.description: Until this skill is used again, Yamanaka Santa targets all allies. Everytime they use a new skill, the destructible defense this skill grants will be increased by 10 points. The next time this skill is used, it will grant Yamanaka Santa's allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense and its usage count will be reset. This skill does not stack on allies and will remove itself from them if already active.

skills.name: Reactionary Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Santa invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Naka
description: Naka was a shinobi of the Hidden Leaf Village's Uchiha clan. A close comrade of Naori, he was able to awaken his Mangekyou Sharingan and became obsessed with the technique Izanagi, which he used to kill some of his own clansmen. Naka was also skilled in kenjutsu. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Straight Line Illusion Cut
skills.description: Uchiha Naka deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

skills.name: Mutilation: Reality Reveal
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Naka's team. If used on an enemy, they will be healed for 10 health and all helpful skills will be removed from them. If used on a member of Uchiha Naka's team, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage* and all harmful skills will be removed from them. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

skills.name: Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion
skills.description: Uchiha Naka gains 4 reality changes and can now use his other skills. Each one of them will consume 1 reality change upon use. This skill becomes 'Precise Kunai Illusion Wave' after used and it ends when all reality changes are consumed.

skills.name: Aerial Fight
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Naka invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

skills.name: Precise Kunai Illusion Wave
skills.description: Uchiha Naka deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Falls of Truth
description: The Falls of Truth is a waterfall located on the Island Turtle. The waterfall itself is peculiar in that by sitting on the platform at its base and concentrating, the person is transported into their mind. Once there, the waterfall becomes a mirror which reflects one's true self. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Truth: Step 1
skills.description: Falls of Truth will deal 10 damage to one enemy at the end of this enemy's next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Falls of Truth. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 1' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Truth: Step 2
skills.description: Falls of Truth will counter the first harmful physical skill used on them for 1 turn. One enemy is targeted. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 2' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Truth: Step 3
skills.description: Falls of Truth will deal 10 piercing damage to one enemy at the end of this enemy's next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Falls of Truth. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 3' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Revelation
skills.description: The specific energy on this skill's cost changes with each use, going green -> red -> blue -> white. For the rest of the game, Falls of Truth's skills will cost 1 less energy of the type that this skill is costing when used. This skill can only be used 4 times and cannot be removed.

name: Edo Tensei Heiji
description: Heiji, also known as Heiji of the Rain Shelter, was a shinobi from the Hidden Rain Village as well as the right-hand man of Kandachi. Capable of using a tag with a technique formula on it to create a smokescreen, Kabuto found him useful enough to be revived during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Changeable Smoke Tag
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Heiji's allies will have 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. If Edo Tensei Heiji is targeted by a new harmful: physical skill, 'Winding Smoke Assault' and 'Winding Smoke Assist' will cost 1 red energy for 1 turn; energy skill, 1 blue energy; affliction-only skill, 1 white energy. This skill cannot be used while active and its effects activate only once per turn for each class. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Heiji dies.

skills.name: Winding Smoke Assault
skills.description: Edo Tensei Heiji deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill's secondary effect is different depending on its cost from 'Changeable Smoke Tag'. / Red: The enemy is stunned for 1 turn. / Blue: The enemy takes 15 affliction damage*. / White: The enemy loses 1 random energy. This skill's costs and effects from 'Changeable Smoke Tag' add up.

skills.name: Winding Smoke Assist
skills.description: Edo Tensei Heiji grants one ally 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill's secondary effect is different depending on its cost from 'Changeable Smoke Tag'. / Red: The ally becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. / Blue: The ally is healed for 20 health. / White: The ally gains 1 random energy. This skill's costs and effects from 'Changeable Smoke Tag' add up.

skills.name: Coffin of Reincarnation
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Heiji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kisame of the Cypher Division
description: Originally, Kisame was to guard the Cypher Division under orders from his superior, Suikazan Fuguki. Kisame chose to kill the Cypher Division members to keep their intel from being leaked out, but eventually, after learning that Fuguki was selling information to other ninja villages, Kisame killed him and took Samehada for himself. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Invasion Warning Trap
skills.description: The next enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Kisame of the Cypher Division will take 15 damage and this skill will end. While active, this skill will deal 15 additional damage each turn, stacking to a maximum of 45, and it cannot be used again. When triggered, this skill cannot be used for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Silent Killing
skills.description: Kisame of the Cypher Division deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 20 additional damage. This skill ends if Kisame of the Cypher Division is targeted by a new harmful skill. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: The Mission Above All
skills.description: Kisame of the Cypher Division deals 20 affliction damage* to one ally. For 3 turns, Kisame of the Cypher Division will become invulnerable and 'Silent Killing' will cost 1 random energy instead.

skills.name: Clever Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Kisame of the Cypher Division invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Ajisai
description: Ajisai is a kunoichi of the Hidden Rain Village, who later became the second Animal Path of the Six Paths of Pain. Ajisai specialises in sealing techniques, showing considerable proficiency in storage-style scroll sealing. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Unsealing: Shuriken
skills.description: Ajisai deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be reduced by 5 the first turn and by 15 the second turn. This skill becomes 'Enclosing Technique' for 2 turns* after used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Unsealing: Paper Snowstorm
skills.description: Ajisai deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new skill, their strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn. While it's active, Ajisai can use this skill for no cost to change the target of it to a new enemy (the damage won't be dealt again). This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Summoning: Panda
skills.description: Ajisai deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. While it's active, Ajisai can use this skill for no cost to change the target of it to a new enemy (the damage won't be dealt again). This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Summoning: Rainwater Gate
skills.description: This skill makes Ajisai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Enclosing Technique
skills.description: Ajisai deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and 5 affliction damage to all other enemies.

name: Mecha Kurama
description: After Mecha Naruto turned on Orochimaru, cutting him in two, he was forced to summon Mecha Kurama to the Hidden Leaf Village. This robot version of the bijuu is insanely strong as it causes chaos everywhere.

skills.name: Area Destruction
skills.description: Mecha Kurama deals 10 damage to all enemies. The main target will take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Violet Beam
skills.description: Mecha Kurama becomes invulnerable for 1 turn, deals 30 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.

skills.name: Power Conversion
skills.description: Mecha Kurama deals 20 affliction damage* to itself or an ally. Mecha Kurama gains 25 points of permanent destructible defense and increases the damage of its skills by 10 permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Hiding in Wreckage
skills.description: This skill makes Mecha Kurama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kyuusuke
description: Kyuusuke is a shinobi from the Hidden Rain Village and one of the original founding Akatsuki members. He is an extremely fast-moving shinobi whose speed earned him his nickname, Swift Foot Kyuusuke. He can also use Lava Release. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Exploding Kunai Assault
skills.description: Kyuusuke deals 10 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to one enemy. The next time 'Swift Foot: Punch' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Swift Foot: Punch
skills.description: Kyuusuke deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Kyuusuke will ignore enemy stun effects. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Lava Release: Quicklime Congealing
skills.description: Kyuusuke deals 10 damage to one enemy that doubles each turn for the rest of the game. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Swift Foot Kyuusuke
skills.description: This skill makes Kyuusuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin
description: This shinobi was reincarnated by Yakushi Kabuto to steal the KIA scroll during the Fourth Shinobi World War. A violent man who enjoys fighting, he uses an axe in battle to attack his enemies. ORIGINAL DESIGN: djackbyron

skills.name: Axe Maneuver: Side Strike
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin destroys one enemy's destructible defense and deals 20 damage to them.

skills.name: Axe Maneuver: Spin Trap
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 3 turns, if this enemy is targeted by 'Axe Maneuver: Side Strike', this stun effect will be applied again.

skills.name: Axe Maneuver: Dust Wind
skills.description: For 3 turns, all enemies will take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills and will deal 5 less damage with physical and energy skills.

skills.name: Shadow Clone Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Daibutsu
description: Daibutsu is a member of the original Akatsuki, a quiet person who only nods in response to what his leader Yahiko tells him. Daibutsu uses a bou in conjunction with his Water Release to quickly perform strong techniques. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Flying Water Prison Technique
skills.description: Daibutsu deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This skill targets one additional different random enemy with each use. After being used 3 times, this effect will be reset.

skills.name: Water Bullet
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Daibutsu's team. If used on an enemy, Daibutsu deals 25 piercing damage to them and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn. If used on a member of Daibutsu's team, Daibutsu heals them for 25 health and removes all enemy affliction skills from them.

skills.name: Bou Rotation
skills.description: Daibutsu targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, all enemy physical skills used on that character will be reflected to the user of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Bou: Defensive Maneuver
skills.description: This skill makes Daibutsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin
description: This shinobi was reincarnated by Yakushi Kabuto to steal the KIA scroll during the Fourth Shinobi World War. He was a skilled taijutsu user, fighting nimbly and acrobatically while using his weapon of choice, spiked bombs, which sent a hail of shrapnel at his opponents. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Spiked Bomb
skills.description: Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. For 0 turns*, any enemy who uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin will be dealt 10 piercing damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Hail of Shrapnel
skills.description: Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns. For 0 turns*, Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin's team will be invulnerable to physical skills. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Acrobatic Dance of the Plague
skills.description: Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin deals 5 damage to one enemy. If this skill was used the previous turn, it will have 2 turns of cooldown and for the rest of the game new uses of 'Spiked Bomb' and 'Hail of Shrapnel' will last 2 additional turns. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Cross Arm Block
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Cloud Plague Nin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Chuukaku
description: Chuukaku was a ninja monk from the Fire Temple and the mentor of Chiriku. He possessed knowledge on sealing techniques' formulas, what was one of the reasons that made Kabuto revive him during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Prayer Beads
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chuukaku deals 20 damage to one enemy. If Edo Tensei Chuukaku's health is at 60 or below, then for 1 turn 'Ritual of Refinement' will grant him 1 additional random energy if used.

skills.name: Sealing/Unsealing Technique
skills.description: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Edo Tensei Chuukaku's team. If used on an enemy, they will have all helpful skills removed from them, will take 30 affliction damage and then will become invulnerable to helpful skills for 2 turns. If used on a member of Edo Tensei Chuukaku's team, they will have all harmful skills removed from them, will be healed for 30 health and then will become invulnerable to harmful skills for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ritual of Refinement
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chuukaku gains 1 red energy and 1 white energy.

skills.name: Coffin of Reincarnation
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chuukaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Daimaru
description: Daimaru was a shinobi from the Hidden Sand Village who referred to himself as the Red Sand Cloud. In life, he was in love with Temari and fairly capable in battle, hence why Kabuto revived him during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Sand Dance
skills.description: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Daimaru deals 20 damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10*. During this time*, 'Moving Sand Barrier' and 'Pushover' will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Moving Sand Barrier
skills.description: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Daimaru targets himself or an ally, granting the target 35 points of destructible defense and making them ignore enemy stun effects. During this time, 'Earth Release: Sand Dance' and 'Pushover' will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Pushover
skills.description: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Daimaru deals 10 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills*. During this time*, 'Earth Release: Sand Dance' and 'Moving Sand Barrier' will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Coffin of Reincarnation
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Daimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yuukimaru
description: Yuukimaru is a young orphan who became one of Orochimaru's test subjects, due to his ability to partially control the Three-Tails. Yuukimaru can do it for a short while without the aid of Kabuto's pills, as when he restrained it when Guren was in danger of being harmed. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Crystalized Flower
skills.description: For 2 turns, new skills Yuukimaru uses will refund him the energy/energies they originally cost and will deal 10 affliction damage* to him for every energy they originally cost. Yuukimaru will ignore healing effects during this time.

skills.name: Human Barrier
skills.description: Yuukimaru targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful skills used on that ally will be reflected to Yuukimaru. Yuukimaru also gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn, increased by 5 for each time he has used 'Three-Tails Chakra: Release', 'Isobu: Tail Slam' and 'Isobu: Great Water Mass Bullet' in the game.

skills.name: Three-Tails Chakra: Release
skills.description: Yuukimaru deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Crystalized Flower' and 'Human Barrier' will be replaced and if the target enemy uses a new harmful skill, Yuukimaru will gain 1 random energy.

skills.name: Reactionary Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Yuukimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Isobu: Tail Slam
skills.description: Yuukimaru deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if any of them uses a new invulnerability skill, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Isobu: Great Water Mass Bullet' permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Isobu: Great Water Mass Bullet
skills.description: Yuukimaru deals 20 damage and 15 piercing damage to one enemy.

name: Kigiri
description: Kigiri is a shinobi from the Hidden Sound Village and a member of Team Guren. Kigiri's primary battle tactics revolve around the manipulation of smoke. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Multiple Smoke Clone
skills.description: For 4 turns, everytime Kigiri is targeted by a new harmful skill, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same class as the skill that was used on him (only main classes considered).

skills.name: Destroying Smell Smoke Prison
skills.description: Kigiri targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, everytime they use a new skill, their skills with the same class as the skill they used will be stunned for 1 turn (only main classes considered).

skills.name: Exploding Flame Shot
skills.description: Kigiri deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy, increased by 10 if the enemy is stunned.

skills.name: Smoke Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Kigiri invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nurari
description: Nurari is a shinobi from the Hidden Sound Village and a member of Team Guren. He wears a slime suit which he uses to improve his special water technique, Viscous Water Mass. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Viscous Water Mass Shot
skills.description: Nurari targets one enemy for 1 turn, dealing 20 damage to them and stunning them.

skills.name: Viscous Water Mass Shield
skills.description: Nurari makes his team invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Casualty Puppet
skills.description: Nurari targets one ally, dealing 5 affliction damage* to them each turn permanently. During this time, 'Viscous Water Mass Shot' and 'Viscous Water Mass Shield' will last 1 additional turn and will have their cooldowns increased by 1 and 2 turns respectively. This skill stacks and ends if Nurari dies.

skills.name: Hiding with Camouflage Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Nurari invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kihou
description: Kihou is a shinobi from the Hidden Sound Village and a member of Team Guren. Using his wrist/arm-mounted rocket launcher, Kihou can fire smoke bombs to obscure an opponent's field of vision or to create a smoke dragon. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Dark Smoke Sphere
skills.description: First use: Kihou deals 40 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. Second use: Kihou deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to strategic skills for 1 turn. Third use: Kihou deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to mental skills for 1 turn and this skill will then need 'Reload' so it can be used again.

skills.name: Smoke Dragon
skills.description: First use: Kihou deals 55 damage to one enemy. Second use: Kihou deals 45 damage to one enemy. Third use: Kihou deals 35 damage to one enemy and this skill will then need 'Reload' so it can be used again.

skills.name: Reload
skills.description: Kihou restarts the usage count of 'Dark Smoke Sphere' and 'Smoke Dragon'.

skills.name: Cursed Seal Activation
skills.description: 'Reload' will permanently cost 1 less random energy. Kihou takes 20 affliction damage* that cannot kill him. This skill stacks but can only be used twice.

name: Gozu
description: Gozu is a shinobi from the Hidden Sound Village and a member of Team Guren. Gozu is able to use the Earth Release nature transformation. With it, he can create mud to slow an enemy down and defend himself and his allies. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Mud Wave
skills.description: Gozu targets all enemies, applying 'Chakra Mudshot' twice on the main target and once on the other enemies. This skill becomes 'Last Resort: Mud Save' for 2 turns after used.

skills.name: Earth Release: Mud Body
skills.description: Gozu targets himself or an ally, granting the target 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. Any enemy who uses a new skill on them during this time will have 'Chakra Mudshot' applied 3 times on them. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Body Alteration: Swift Punch
skills.description: Gozu deals 20 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Earth Release: Mud Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Gozu invulnerable for 1 turn. Any enemy who uses a new skill on him during this time will have 'Chakra Mudshot' applied on them.

skills.name: Last Resort: Mud Save
skills.description: Gozu targets one ally. For 1 turn, the first time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 50. This skill is invisible and can only be used if Gozu's health is at 50 or below.

skills.name: Chakra Mudshot
skills.description: The target will take 10 piercing damage and will take 5 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. This skill cannot be removed.

name: Rinji
description: Rinji is a shinobi from the Hidden Sound Village and a member of Team Guren, while being also an underling of Orochimaru. Rinji is a bat-user; he has the ability to manipulate bats via the method Bat Controlling. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Bat Controlling
skills.description: Rinji gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. 'Bat Controlling: Bat Assault' and 'Bat Controlling: Ultrasonic Mind Waves' will last 1 additional turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Bat Controlling: Bat Assault
skills.description: Rinji targets one enemy and one random different enemy, changing the cost of their physical skills to 2 white energies for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and ends if Rinji dies.

skills.name: Bat Controlling: Ultrasonic Mind Waves
skills.description: Rinji deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 1 turn and reduces their damage by 5 also for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Fire Teleportation
skills.description: This skill makes Rinji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fudou
description: Fudou is a member of Furido's Team. Using the earth around him, he can cause cave-ins and warping grounds to crush his opponents, or skewer them with stone spikes. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Rock Armor: Offense
skills.description: Fudou deals 25 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Release: Fissure
skills.description: Fudou targets all enemies, stunning their physical skills for 2 turns. During this time, Fudou's allies will become invulnerable to non-physical skills.

skills.name: Earth Release: Antlion Technique
skills.description: Fudou targets one enemy for 7 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, that enemy will take 100 damage. This skill lasts 1 turn less for every skill Fudou has used in the game and then resets this count.

skills.name: Rock Armor: Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Fudou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fuen
description: Fuen is a member of Furido's 4-Man Team, a group of grave robbers who dug up the corpses of four of the dead Twelve Guardian Ninja. She can manipulate the terrain around her through scroll-held architectural pieces. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Poison Moth Genjutsu
skills.description: Fuen deals 30 damage to one enemy and increases the cost of that enemy's skills by 1 white energy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Altering Terrain Technique
skills.description: First use: All enemies will deal 25 less physical and energy damage for 1 turn. Second use: All enemies will become invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. Third use: One enemy takes 30 damage, all other enemies take 25 damage and this skill will get back to its first use version.

skills.name: Castle Closing Eight Gates
skills.description: Fuen makes her team invulnerable for 2 turns. For 2 turns, all enemies will take 10 affliction damage everytime they use a new strategic skill.

skills.name: Earth Release: Defensive Earth Spear
skills.description: This skill makes Fuen invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fuuka
description: Fuuka is a kunoichi from the group of grave robbers who had dug up four of the dead Twelve Guardian Ninja. She has separated her consciousness from her actual body and stored it in her hair, and is also able to manipulate all five nature transformations. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Fire Release: Phoenix Sage Fire
skills.description: Fuuka deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, 'Wind Release: Spiralling Wind Ball' can be used on them and this skill will be replaced by 'Wind Release: Spiralling Wind Ball'. This skill ends on any enemy that uses a new skill.

skills.name: Water Release: Stormy Blockade
skills.description: Fuuka deals 5 damage to all enemies and stuns their mental, affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Lightning Release: Electromagnetic Murder' can be used on them and this skill will be replaced by 'Lightning Release: Electromagnetic Murder'. This skill ends on any enemy that uses a new skill.

skills.name: Execution by Kiss
skills.description: Fuuka targets one enemy permanently, each turn stealing 1 random energy from them. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Fuuka*. The first enemy to use a new harmful skill on Fuuka will take 10 additional damage from her skills permanently*. During this time, Fuuka will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable*.

skills.name: Colour Course Change
skills.description: Fuuka will be unable to be killed for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and can only be used 5 times.

skills.name: Wind Release: Spiralling Wind Ball
skills.description: Fuuka targets all enemies affected by 'Fire Release: Phoenix Sage Fire', dealing 10 damage to them and then reducing their non-affliction damage by 5 permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Lightning Release: Electromagnetic Murder
skills.description: Fuuka targets all enemies affected by 'Water Release: Stormy Blockade', dealing 5 piercing damage to them and then making their stun effects last 1 turn less and their energy drain or removal skills remove 1 less energy permanently. This skill stacks.

name: Kazuma
description: Kazuma, also known as Furido, was a member of the Twelve Guardian Ninja, and eventually led half of the group to stage a coup d'etat against the Hidden Leaf Village, and more specifically, the Hokage. He is the father of Sora and imbued Kurama's chakra into his own son. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra-Enhancing Fruit
skills.description: For the rest of the game, Kazuma will gain 1 random energy everytime a new harmful skill is used on him. This skill can only be used once.

skills.name: Five Elements Unseal
skills.description: Kazuma deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their strategic skills for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Earth Release: Corpse Soil
skills.description: Kazuma targets all dead allies, reviving them with 40 health, making them invulnerable for 2 turns and replacing all their skills with 'Corpse Attack' permanently. Kazuma will instantly die when this skill is used; this self-death effect cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Shokujou Block
skills.description: This skill makes Kazuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Corpse Attack
skills.description: This character deals 20 damage to one enemy. This enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Corpse Attack' permanently. This skill stacks and ignores invulnerability.

name: Rouga Nadare
description: Nadare is a shinobi from the Hidden Snow Village and a member of Kazahana Doto's group, Doto's Three-Man-Team alongside Kakuyoku Fubuki and Fuyukuma Mizore. With his variant of the Ice Release, Nadare is able to create creatures of ice to cause physical impact damage. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ice Release: Tearing Dragon Fierce Tiger
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new physical skill on Rouga Nadare, that enemy's physical skills will be stunned for 1 turn. Rouga Nadare can use this skill while active for 1 blue energy to deal 20 damage to one enemy, increased by 15 for each time a new harmful physical skill was used on Rouga Nadare since this skill was last used. This damage resets each time it is used.

skills.name: Ice Release: Wolf Fang Avalanche
skills.description: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new energy skill on Rouga Nadare, that enemy's energy skills will be stunned for 1 turn. Rouga Nadare can use this skill while active for 1 white energy to deal 20 damage to one enemy, increased by 15 for each time a new harmful energy skill was used on Rouga Nadare since this skill was last used. This damage resets each time it is used.

skills.name: Ice Release: One Horned White Whale
skills.description: Rouga Nadare deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, all enemies' mental and affliction skills will be stunned.

skills.name: Skilled Hand-to-Hand Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Rouga Nadare invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kakuyoku Fubuki
description: Fubuki is a kunoichi from the Hidden Snow Village and a member of Kazahana Doto's group, Doto's Three-Man-Team alongside Rouga Nadare and Fuyukuma Mizore. Fubuki is able to use Ice Release to pull pillars of ice out of the ground to imprison her opponents or defend against attacks. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Ice Release: Swallow Snow Storm
skills.description: Kakuyoku Fubuki deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. Each turn, the next use of either 'Ice Prison Technique' or 'Ice Bomb' on that enemy will be improved; 'Ice Prison Technique' will last 1 additional turn and 'Ice Bomb' will deal 10 additional damage to them. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Ice Prison Technique
skills.description: Kakuyoku Fubuki stuns one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ice Bomb
skills.description: Kakuyoku Fubuki deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. Any enemy whose health drops to 50 or below will have 'Ice Prison Technique' applied on them, though lasting 1 turn only regardless.

skills.name: Ice Block Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Kakuyoku Fubuki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fuyukuma Mizore
description: Mizore is a shinobi from the Hidden Snow Village and a member of Kazahana Doto's group, Doto's Three-Man-Team alongside Kakuyoku Fubuki and Rouga Nadare. His method of fighting includes the use of a snowboard for quick movement and a metal arm that can fire cables or be launched at a target and retracted. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Get Over Here
skills.description: Fuyukuma Mizore targets one enemy, ending any control skill they are using. For 1 turn, 'Great Strength Ice Strike' will deal double damage to that enemy.

skills.name: Great Strength Ice Strike
skills.description: Fuyukuma Mizore deals 30 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Retractable Cable Net
skills.description: Fuyukuma Mizore stuns one enemy's physical and energy skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. For 3 turns, 'Great Strength Ice Strike' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks. If Fuyukuma Mizore's health is at 50 or below, this skill will reduce its own cooldown by 1 turn this usage.

skills.name: Armor Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Fuyukuma Mizore invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hozuki Suigetsu (B)
description: Years after the war, Suigetsu is still at Orochimaru's side. He assisted in the experiment that resulted in Mitsuki and is a recorrent partner of Juugo and Karin to these days. The mist and sound shinobi continues to use his water-related skills to defeat any danger to his cause. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Slicer
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes any new skill they use that directly grants destructible defense grant no destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, any enemy who uses a new skill on Hozuki Suigetsu (B) will have this skill applied on them.

skills.name: Water Release: Water Hail
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu (B) deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time*, everytime an enemy uses a new harmful skill, 'Hydrification Merge' will heal 5 additional health for 1 turn. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Hydrification Merge
skills.description: Hozuki Suigetsu (B) heals himself and his allies for 15 health each turn for 2 turns. For 1 turn, he will be unable to use 'Water Slicer' and 'Water Release: Water Hail'.

skills.name: Agility of the Mist
skills.description: This skill makes Hozuki Suigetsu (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Water-Made Body
skills.description: If Hozuki Suigetsu (B) uses 'Hydrification Merge' while not being at full health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Water-Made Body': For 1 turn, he will ignore all harmful non-affliction damage.

name: Juugo (B)
description: Sometime after the Fourth Shinobi World War ended, Juugo went to a village on the outskirts of the Land of Fire. His Sage Transformation randomly activated again, causing him to go berserk. Juugo does not have complete control of his power, but he is now a much more mature man. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Chakra Cannon
skills.description: Juugo (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun and the energy drain or removal effects of any new skill this enemy uses will take no effect.

skills.name: Cellular Regeneration Absorption
skills.description: Juugo (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 30 health.

skills.name: Jet Booster Jump
skills.description: Juugo (B) becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. With 1 stack of this skill, 'Chakra Cannon' and 'Cellular Regeneration Absorption' will target one additional random enemy. With 2 stacks, they will target all enemies instead. This skill can only be used twice.

skills.name: Shield Fist
skills.description: This skill makes Juugo (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Psychotic Self
skills.description: If Juugo (B) gets 2 stacks of 'Jet Booster Jump' and then uses 'Chakra Cannon' and 'Cellular Regeneration Absorption' consecutively anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Psychotic Self': He is healed for 25 health. For the rest of the game, he will take 5 affliction damage* and gain 15 points of permanent destructible defense each turn.

name: Jounin Tsunade
description: Although their team under Hiruzen's leadership had disbanded, Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade continued fighting together during the Second Shinobi World War. During that time, Tsunade became one of the "Legendary Sannin", nickname given by Hanzo. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Continuous Healing Palm
skills.description: Jounin Tsunade heals herself or an ally for 25 health each turn for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ground-Wrecking Punch
skills.description: Jounin Tsunade destroys all enemies' destructible defense and deals 20 damage to the main target and 10 damage to all other enemies. This skill becomes 'Earth Boulder Wall' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Quick Summoning: Katsuyu
skills.description: Jounin Tsunade heals herself and her allies for 15 health. For 3 turns, Jounin Tsunade's team will be healed for 5 health each turn.

skills.name: Defensive Kunai Combat
skills.description: This skill makes Jounin Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn. If Jounin Tsunade's health is at 50 or below, 'Quick Summoning: Katsuyu' will be replaced by Tsunade's 'Major Summoning: Katsuyu' permanently.

skills.name: Earth Boulder Wall
skills.description: Jounin Tsunade targets herself or an ally, granting that character 55 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks.

name: Jounin Jiraiya
description: Although their team under Hiruzen's leadership had disbanded, Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade continued fighting together during the Second Shinobi World War. During that time, Jiraiya became one of the "Legendary Sannin", nickname given by Hanzo. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Spy Toad
skills.description: Jounin Jiraiya targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime Jounin Jiraiya uses a new skill on that enemy, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Needle Jizou
skills.description: Jounin Jiraiya targets one ally and himself permanently, dealing 10 piercing damage instantly to any enemy who uses a new skill on them. This skill becomes 'Needle Hell' permanently after used and ends when 'Needle Hell' is used. This skill needs an available ally to be used on and ends if removed from any of the affected characters.

skills.name: Quick Summoning: Gamabunta
skills.description: Jounin Jiraiya deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, the enemy team will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills.

skills.name: Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Jounin Jiraiya invulnerable for 1 turn. If Jounin Jiraiya's health is at 50 or below, 'Quick Summoning: Gamabunta' will be replaced by Jiraiya's 'Major Summoning: Gamabunta' permanently (it won't trigger 'Spy Toad').

skills.name: Needle Hell
skills.description: Jounin Jiraiya deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies.

name: Jounin Orochimaru
description: Although their team under Hiruzen's leadership had disbanded, Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade continued fighting together during the Second Shinobi World War. During that time, Orochimaru became one of the "Legendary Sannin", nickname given by Hanzo. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Snake-Like Strangulation
skills.description: Jounin Orochimaru deals 20 damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 10 additional damage and grant 10 additional points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Coil
skills.description: Jounin Orochimaru stuns one enemy's physical, affliction and strategic skills for 3 turns. This skill becomes 'Hidden Snake Affliction' for 3 turns after used.

skills.name: Quick Summoning: Manda
skills.description: Jounin Orochimaru deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 1 random energy.

skills.name: Skilled Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Jounin Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn. If Jounin Orochimaru's health is at 50 or below, 'Quick Summoning: Manda' will be replaced by Orochimaru's 'Major Summoning: Manda' permanently.

skills.name: Hidden Snake Affliction
skills.description: Jounin Orochimaru deals 10 affliction damage to the enemy affected by 'Hidden Shadow Snake Coil'.

name: Karin (B)
description: Years after the war, Karin delivered Sasuke's and Sakura's baby Sarada and gave her a pair of glasses at some point. Now, Karin is Sakura's friend who is happy for Sasuke, while she still is one of the best kunoichi at sensing skills to ever live. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Intensive Care
skills.description: Karin (B) heals one ally for 10 health each turn for 3 turns. During this time, 'Desperate Heal Bite' will heal 10 additional health and everytime that ally uses a new strategic skill they will be healed for 10 health.

skills.name: Adamantine Locking Chains
skills.description: Karin (B) deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical skills for 1 turn. 'Intensive Care' will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desperate Heal Bite
skills.description: Karin (B) heals one ally for 35 health and makes them ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn. Karin (B) takes 10 affliction damage*.

skills.name: Sensor Speed
skills.description: This skill makes Karin (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: The Mind's Eye
skills.description: If Karin (B) uses 'Intensive Care', she will achieve 'Achievement: The Mind's Eye': Until she uses either 'Adamantine Locking Chains' or 'Sensor Speed', new uses of 'Desperate Heal Bite' will also make Karin (B)'s allies unable to be killed for 1 turn.

name: Shira
description: Shira is a chuunin of the Hidden Sand Village and a teammate of Sen and Yome. Because of his lack of the other two main ninja skills, Shira instead honed his taijutsu prowess to masterful levels, which became the sole focus of his fighting style. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Mastered Taijutsu
skills.description: One random enemy will have all their destructible defense destroyed, take 25 damage and become unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Silent Fist
skills.description: One random enemy will take 35 damage, have their physical skills stunned for 2 turns and have the cooldown of their skills increased by 1 turn for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Seven Heavens Breathing Method
skills.description: For 2 turns, Shira will become invulnerable to physical skills, will have 20 points of damage reduction and 20 points of destructible defense, and all effects of 'Mastered Taijutsu' and 'Silent Fist' will affect one targeted enemy instead. During this time Shira will gain 1 green energy each turn.

skills.name: Taijutsu Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Shira invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akatsuchi (B)
description: A war-experienced point-of-pride for the Hidden Rock Village, Akatsuchi's unwavering loyalty to Ohnoki earned him the title as his "shield". Even years after the Fourth Shinobi World War ended, Akatsuchi is still one of the most formidable Rock shinobi at defensive techniques. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Earth Release: Fist Rock
skills.description: Akatsuchi (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Akatsuchi (B) will be stunned for 1 additional turn from the next use of 'Earth Release: Minor Antlion'.

skills.name: Multi-Task Golem
skills.description: Akatsuchi (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy, 15 damage to all other enemies and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Akatsuchi (B) will be stunned for 1 additional turn from the next use of 'Earth Release: Minor Antlion'.

skills.name: Earth Release: Minor Antlion
skills.description: Akatsuchi (B) stuns one enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Golem Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Akatsuchi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Rock Reinforcement
skills.description: If Akatsuchi (B) uses 'Golem Wall' while having 40 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Rock Reinforcement': For the rest of the game, 'Earth Release: Fist Rock' and 'Multi-Task Golem' will grant 15 additional points of destructible defense.

name: Lightning Suit Denki
description: Using a Lightning Release Suit of his own design, Denki is able to pressure his enemies with a combination of enhanced reflexes and predictive analysis of their movements. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning-Covered Descending Fist
skills.description: Lightning Suit Denki deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. Until 'Lightning-Covered Flying Kick' is used on that enemy, everytime they don't use a new skill they will take 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Lightning-Covered Flying Kick
skills.description: Lightning Suit Denki deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. Until 'Lightning-Covered Descending Fist' is used on that enemy, everytime they use a new skill they will take 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Battle Visor
skills.description: Lightning Suit Denki targets one enemy permanently. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new invulnerability skill, Lightning Suit Denki will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill can be used while active to change the target of it to a new enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sliding Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Lightning Suit Denki invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Lightning-Sliding Boots
skills.description: If Lightning Suit Denki uses 'Sliding Dodge', he will achieve 'Achievement: Lightning-Sliding Boots': For the rest of the game, new uses of 'Sliding Dodge' will make Lightning Suit Denki invulnerable for 2 turns instead.

name: Kyuubi Sora
description: Sora's father, Kazuma, collected Kyuubi's chakra and sealed it into Sora's body, to produce a partial copy of the Nine-Tails, turning Sora into a pseudo-jinchuuriki. In his Kyuubi form, Sora goes Sora berserk and attacks everything in his path. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Kyuubi-Enhanced Beast Tearing Palm
skills.description: Kyuubi Sora deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Kyuubi Sora will take 15 affliction damage instantly. For 1 turn, 'Great Wind Roar' will be improved.

skills.name: Great Wind Roar
skills.description: Kyuubi Sora deals X damage to one enemy, where X equals half of Kyuubi Sora's missing health. If improved, X will equal Kyuubi Sora's missing health instead.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Fury
skills.description: Kyuubi Sora takes 20 affliction damage* that cannot kill him and gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks.

skills.name: Enraged Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Kyuubi Sora invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Maito Gai (B)
description: While no longer able to continue active duty as a ninja but still wanting to help the new generation grow, Gai became a teacher at the Academy, giving regular lectures and instructing students in taijutsu. Even though he is not as capable as he once was, Gai still fights if the need for it comes. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Pressure Fist
skills.description: Maito Gai (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy. The next physical skill that enemy uses will deal 10 less damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Wheelchair Run
skills.description: For 4 turns, Maito Gai (B) will have 10 points of damage reduction and 'Pressure Fist' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Air Kick Interruption
skills.description: Maito Gai (B) targets all enemies. The next physical or energy skill they use will be countered and this skill will then end on them. This skill cannot be used on enemies already affected by it. If used during 'Wheelchair Run', this skill will be invisible the first turn.

skills.name: Effortless Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Gai (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: On Your Feet!
skills.description: If Maito Gai (B) uses 'Air Kick Interruption' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: On Your Feet!': For the rest of the game, new uses of 'Wheelchair Run' will not grant damage reduction and will increase the damage of 'Pressure Fist' by 20 instead.

name: Haido
description: Haido is a warlord looking for the Stone of Gelel claiming that he wants to create a peaceful utopia, while in reality, he searches for the stone to obtain the power to rule the world. Temujin works for him without knowing that Haido was the one that destroyed his village when he was a kid. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Gelel Blast
skills.description: Haido deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 4 turns. For the rest of the game, 'Gelel Resurrection' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks and ends if Haido dies.

skills.name: Gelel Laser
skills.description: Haido deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. For the rest of the game, 'Gelel Resurrection' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks and ends if Haido dies.

skills.name: Gelel Resurrection
skills.description: The next time Haido's health reaches 0, he will have his health set to 50. This skill cannot be used while active.

skills.name: Impervious Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Haido invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Onomichi Hassaku
description: Hassaku is a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village and a member of the New Seven Ninja Swordsmen. Hassaku carries the Executioner's Blade. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Executioner Rush
skills.description: Onomichi Hassaku deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage for every 25 health Onomichi Hassaku has lost, and then 5 additional damage for every 25 health the target enemy have lost.

skills.name: Flash Slash
skills.description: Onomichi Hassaku steals 10 health from one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Declaration of Rivalry
skills.description: Onomichi Hassaku targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, the main target will take 10 additional damage from Onomichi Hassaku's skills and the other targets will take 10 less damage from Onomichi Hassaku's skills. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill will end if Onomichi Hassaku dies.

skills.name: Executioner Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Onomichi Hassaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Onomichi Hassaku uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Fuefuki Kyohou
description: Kyohou is a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village and a member of the New Seven Ninja Swordsmen. Kyohou carries Kabutowari. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Kabutowari: Hammer Smash
skills.description: Fuefuki Kyohou deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Kabutowari: Axe Cut
skills.description: Fuefuki Kyohou deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's non-physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Combined Combat
skills.description: Fuefuki Kyohou gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if either 'Kabutowari: Hammer Smash' or 'Kabutowari: Axe Cut' is used, the other mentioned skill will be applied on the same enemy.

skills.name: Long-Distance Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Fuefuki Kyohou invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Fuefuki Kyohou uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Hebiichigo
description: Hebiichigo is a kunoichi from the Hidden Mist Village and a member of the New Seven Ninja Swordsmen. Hebiichigo carries Nuibari. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Longsword Ninja Art: Needle Shot
skills.description: Hebiichigo deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Stitching Dance
skills.description: Until 'Longsword Ninja Art: Massacre Method' is used, its next use will last 3 turns instead. During this time, 'Longsword Ninja Art: Needle Shot' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Hebiichigo' will have 15 points of damage reduction. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Longsword Ninja Art: Massacre Method
skills.description: Hebiichigo stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from damaging skills.

skills.name: Defensive Wire Maneuvering
skills.description: This skill makes Hebiichigo invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Hebiichigo uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, her harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Oniyuzu Ichirouta
description: Ichirouta is a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village and a member of the New Seven Ninja Swordsmen. Ichirouta carries Shibuki. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Shibuki: Front Explosion
skills.description: Oniyuzu Ichirouta deals 20 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Suicide Explosion' will deal affliction damage instead.

skills.name: Shibuki: Ground Explosion
skills.description: For 1 turn, Oniyuzu Ichirouta will make his team invulnerable and will make all enemies unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. For 1 turn, 'Suicide Explosion' will deal 20 affliction damage to Oniyuzu Ichirouta instead.

skills.name: Suicide Explosion
skills.description: Oniyuzu Ichirouta deals 40 damage to one enemy and to another random enemy. Oniyuzu Ichirouta takes 40 affliction damage*.

skills.name: Shibuki Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Oniyuzu Ichirouta invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Oniyuzu Ichirouta uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Kurosuki Buntan
description: Buntan is a kunoichi from the Hidden Mist Village and a member of the New Seven Ninja Swordsmen. Buntan carries Kiba. She is the daughter of the Thunder of the Mist, Kurosuki Raiga. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Lightning Fish
skills.description: Kurosuki Buntan deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Lightning Ball'.

skills.name: Lightning Ball
skills.description: Kurosuki Buntan deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Lightning Fish'.

skills.name: Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning
skills.description: Kurosuki Buntan deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, every enemy who uses a new skill on any member of Kurosuki Buntan's team will take 5 piercing damage.

skills.name: Lightning Strike Armor
skills.description: This skill makes Kurosuki Buntan invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Kurosuki Buntan uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, her harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Karatachi Kagura
description: Kagura is a shinobi from the Hidden Mist Village and the grandson of the Fourth Mizukage Yagura. Kagura works as an aide to the Sixth Mizukage, and a special advisor of the village. Kagura carries Hiramekarei. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Long-Sword Form: Destruction
skills.description: Karatachi Kagura deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy dies after this skill is used on them, then for 1 turn the original specific energies in the costs of Karatachi Kagura's skills will be random energies instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Clear Mirror Still Water
skills.description: Karatachi Kagura targets one ally or himself. For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on that character will be reflected onto the enemy team. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Hammer Form: Destruction
skills.description: Karatachi Kagura deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 3 random energies from them. For 1 turn, Karatachi Kagura's other skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

skills.name: Hiramekarei Protection
skills.description: This skill makes Karatachi Kagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Karatachi Kagura uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Hoshigaki Shizuma
description: Shizuma is a missing-nin of the Hidden Mist Village's Hoshigaki clan. Shizuma created his own personal Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist to aid him in his mission to kill the Mizukage. Shizuma carries Samehada. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Water Release: Water Spikes
skills.description: Hoshigaki Shizuma deals 10 piercing damage twice to one enemy.

skills.name: Samehada Shred
skills.description: Hoshigaki Shizuma steals 20 health from one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill with an energy gain/removal/stealing effect, they will take 20 piercing damage.

skills.name: Bloody Mist Absorption
skills.description: Hoshigaki Shizuma targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, any new invisible skill they use will be visible, their affliction-only skills will deal 10 less damage and consecutive uses of 'Water Release: Water Spikes' or 'Samehada Shred' will also remove 1 random energy from their targets.

skills.name: Samehada Wind Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Shizuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
skills.description: If Hoshigaki Shizuma uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

name: Samehada Fusion Shizuma
description: In the climax of the fight against Boruto and Kagura, Samehada began absorbing Shizuma, making him go on a feral rampage. This combined form of weapon and shinobi is very dangerous for anyone who crosses their path. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Thoughtless Blow
skills.description: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies he is able to, destroying their destructible defense and dealing 25 piercing damage to them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Thoughtless Bite
skills.description: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies he is able to, dealing 35 piercing damage to them and removing 1 random energy from each one of them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Thoughtless Fight
skills.description: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new harmful skill, they will be able to be targeted by 'Thoughtless Blow' and 'Thoughtless Bite' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and ends if Samehada Fusion Shizuma dies. This skill cannot be removed.

skills.name: Thoughtless Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Samehada Fusion Shizuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: A Fair Trade
skills.description: If Samehada Fusion Shizuma uses 'Thoughtless Fight' while not being at full health, he will achieve 'Achievement: A Fair Trade': He takes 25 affliction damage* and gains 2 random energies.

name: Umino Iruka (S)
description: Now that Naruto is back to the Hidden Leaf Village, Iruka is confident in his growth. Although not the strongest shinobi, Iruka is still one of the most respectable sensei in the entire village. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Alexandre

skills.name: String Light Formation
skills.description: Umino Iruka (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill deals 15 additional damage and stuns for 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Fluid Chakra Control' Umino Iruka (S) has, then all stacks of it are removed.

skills.name: Surprise Team Tactics
skills.description: Umino Iruka (S) targets his team, granting them 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and healing them for 5 health. This skill heals 5 additional health and grants damage reduction for 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Fluid Chakra Control' Umino Iruka (S) has, then all stacks of it are removed.

skills.name: Fluid Chakra Control
skills.description: Umino Iruka (S) heals himself or an ally for 15 health, increased by 5 for each 15 health Umino Iruka (S) has lost. The next use of 'String Light Formation' or 'Surprise Team Tactics' will be improved. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Instant Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Umino Iruka (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Furui
description: Furui is an elite shinobi from the Hidden Cloud Village and a member of the Eight-Tails Subduing Team. The father of Motoi, Furui's death strained the friendly relationship between his son and Killer Bee. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Kusari Strike
skills.description: Furui deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if 'Kusari Hold' is used on them, its damage increase effect will be 25 instead.

skills.name: Kusari Hold
skills.description: Furui stuns one enemy's strategic skills for 1 turn. After 3 turns, this enemy will take 0 damage, increased by 20 for each skill they used during this skill. This skill ends if Furui dies.

skills.name: Lightning Release: Kusari Charge
skills.description: For 3 turns, 'Kusari Strike' and 'Kusari Hold' will deal piercing damage, will ignore invulnerability and any enemy who uses a new skill on Furui will take 10 piercing damage.

skills.name: Kusari Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Furui invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Morino Ibiki (B)
description: Ibiki keeps his position as the the leader of the Torture and Interrogation force and a special jounin for his village. Even though he was assigned to take over as Team 40's leader, Ibiki decided to train Enko personally as an interrogator. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Sedative
skills.description: Morino Ibiki (B) stuns one enemy for 3 turns. This skill ends if the enemy successfully receives new harmful damage.

skills.name: Ground Boulder
skills.description: Morino Ibiki (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be reduced by 10 for 2 turns. This skill ends if the enemy successfully receives new harmful damage.

skills.name: Selfless Rescue
skills.description: For 1 turn, all new harmful skills used on Morino Ibiki (B)'s allies will be reflected to him. During this time, Morino Ibiki (B) cannot be killed. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Defense Movement Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Morino Ibiki (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Torture Genjutsu
skills.description: If Morino Ibiki (B) uses 'Sedative' twice in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Torture Genjutsu': 'Sedative' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, new uses of 'Sedative' will also deal 30 affliction damage to its target instantly.

name: Killer Bee (B)
description: In the new era, Bee was the first person approached by members of the Ootsutsuki clan in their search for Kaguya's scattered chakra. Against his enemies, Bee is either showing how strong he is or how smart he is while escaping. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Bijuu Telepathy
skills.description: For 2 turns, Killer Bee (B) and one random member of his team will have 20 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb
skills.description: Killer Bee (B) deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill requires 'Gyuuki's Awakening Control' to be active.
