skills.name: Gyuuki's Awakening Control
skills.description: Killer Bee (B) gains 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Bijuu Telepathy' cannot be used and 'Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb' can. This skill is also instantly activated if 'Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb' is used.

skills.name: Quick Reaction
skills.description: This skill makes Killer Bee (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Octopus Leg Clone
skills.description: If Killer Bee (B) uses 'Bijuu Telepathy' 4 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Octopus Leg Clone': 'Bijuu Telepathy' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, all harmful skills will be removed from him each turn.

name: Log
description: Log is a synthetic human created by Orochimaru and the older clone brother of Mitsuki. With his Armor-Eater technique, Log is able to manipulate his armour into various shapes to aid him in battle, such as encasing and restraining his opponent. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Expert Kenjutsu: Attack
skills.description: Log deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Log will gain 20 points of destructible defense and will ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Armor-Eater
skills.description: Log heals himself for 15 health. The first time it's used, this skill will permanently make 'Expert Kenjutsu: Attack' deal 20 additional damage and not grant destructible defense. The second time it's used, this skill will permanently make 'Expert Kenjutsu: Attack' stun its target for 1 turn and not make Log ignore enemy stun effects. This skill can only be used twice.

skills.name: Temporary Paralysis Technique
skills.description: Log reduces one enemy's physical and energy damage by 5 permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical or strategic skill, then for 3 turns 'Temporary Paralysis Technique' will cost 1 random energy and will have no cooldown. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Log dies.

skills.name: Expert Kenjutsu: Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Log invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Restraining Liquid
skills.description: If Log uses 'Armor-Eater' for the second time while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Restraining Liquid': For the rest of the game, every enemy that uses a new skill on Log will have their physical and strategic skills stunned for 1 turn.

name: Ada
description: Ada is a member of Kara and the older sister of Daemon. Being infused with the DNA from the remains of Ootsutsuki Shibai, Ada gained the power of clairvoyance by awakening the Senrigan in her left eye. All who see her face are instantly enchanted, and her influence makes them unable to harm her or resist her commands. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Senrigan: Clairvoyance
skills.description: For 1 turn, Ada will take 5 additional damage from damaging skills and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. One enemy is targeted. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, they will be countered and healed for 20 health. The target of this skill is invisible. If this skill is empowered, it won't increase the damage Ada takes from damaging skills.

skills.name: Omnipotence's Seduction
skills.description: Ada deals 10 damage to one enemy and for 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical, energy, mental or affliction skill, Ada will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with that same main class. If this skill is empowered, it may trigger to strategic skills too.

skills.name: Love Threat
skills.description: Ada targets one ally. For the rest of the game, every enemy that uses a new skill on that ally will take 5 additional damage from 'Omnipotence's Seduction' for 1 turn. This skill stacks. If this skill is empowered, that ally will also ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ada's Stasis Pod
skills.description: For 3 turns, Ada becomes invulnerable, unable to use her skills and unable to be killed. If this skill is empowered, it won't make 'Omnipotence's Seduction' unable to be used along with the other skills.

skills.name: Achievement: Omnipotence's Desire
skills.description: If Ada uses a new skill, she will achieve 'Achievement: Omnipotence's Desire': Her skills will be empowered for 1 turn.

name: Daemon
description: Daemon is a member of Kara and the younger brother of Ada. Being infused with DNA from the remains of Ootsutsuki Shibai, Daemon gained the Shinjutsu to instantly, even without intent or awareness, turn an opponent's attack on him against them. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Human Reflection Backpack
skills.description: Daemon targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on that ally will be reflected back upon their users. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Intended Reflection
skills.description: Daemon targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on Daemon will be reflected back upon their users. This skill is invisible and needs an available ally to be used on.

skills.name: Science-Enhanced Taijutsu
skills.description: Daemon deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Human Reflection Backpack' and 'Intended Reflection' will be visible if used.

skills.name: Daemon's Stasis Pod
skills.description: For 3 turns, Daemon becomes invulnerable, unable to use his skills and unable to be killed.

skills.name: Achievement: Initial Reflection
skills.description: If Daemon uses 'Science-Enhanced Taijutsu' for the first time in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Initial Reflection': For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on him will be reflected back upon their users.

name: Gatou
description: Gatou is a shipping magnate and the founder of Gatou Company. He also is secretly a drug dealer as well as the owner of a smuggling business, the one that took control of the Land of Waves. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Thug Call
skills.description: The next enemy that uses a new skill on Gatou will take 20 damage and then 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Bloodful Command
skills.description: The next enemy that uses a new skill on Gatou will take 10 damage and then 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Public Crucifixion
skills.description: Gatou deals 15 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Crimelord Mind
skills.description: This skill makes Gatou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Tokuma
description: Tokuma is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village's Hyuuga clan. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, he was part of the revised Infiltration and Reconnaissance Party. Tokuma currently possesses the best Byakugan in his clan. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Hyuuga Rush
skills.description: Hyuuga Tokuma deals 20 damage to one enemy. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical skills.

skills.name: Pressure Point Reveal
skills.description: Hyuuga Tokuma targets one enemy. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will lose 1 random energy everytime they take harmful damage.

skills.name: Insightful Prediction
skills.description: Hyuuga Tokuma targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new invisible skill, they will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Strategic Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Tokuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shizuka
description: Shizuka is a kunoichi and the current leader of the Nadeshiko Village. She was destined to marry a student of Jiraiya that can defeat her, because of a law from her village.

skills.name: Deep Crimson Dance
skills.description: Shizuka deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Hardliner Gale Fist
skills.description: Shizuka targets one enemy. If this enemy's health is at 30 or below, they will be instantly killed. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Violent Whirlwind
skills.description: Shizuka targets all enemies for 3 turns, increasing the cooldown of any new skill they use by 2 turns.

skills.name: Nadeshiko-Style Acrobatics
skills.description: This skill makes Shizuka invulnerable for 1 turn. Shizuka also instantly gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn everytime she uses a new skill (except this one).

name: Ohnoki (B)
description: Ohnoki retired as Tsuchikage and passed on the title to his granddaughter Kurotsuchi. Not wanting to see innocent people die, Ohnoki unearthed a jutsu as an alternative to shinobi protecting his village, devising the creatures to do the fighting so humans would remain safe and unharmed. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Akuta
skills.description: Ohnoki (B) gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense, then grants 20 points of permanent destructible defense to one random member of his team, then grants 10 points of permanent destructible defense to his team. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Attachment of the Primitive World
skills.description: Ohnoki (B) targets himself or an ally, granting the target 30 points of damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time, everytime they take new non-affliction damage, 'Speedy Dust Release' will deal 15 additional damage for 1 turn. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Speedy Dust Release
skills.description: Ohnoki (B) deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, if this enemy uses a new skill that directly grants damage reduction or destructible defense, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

skills.name: Floating Chair
skills.description: This skill makes Ohnoki (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Speed Floating
skills.description: If Ohnoki (B) is targeted by a new harmful non-strategic skill right after using 'Floating Chair', he will achieve 'Achievement: Speed Floating': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of damage reduction. This damage reduction effect cannot be ignored.

name: White Zetsu Monster
description: A large attack force that was created by Ootsutsuki Kaguya, the White Zetsu Army can become a huge monster capable of great damage. While it was believed that all of the White Zetsu had been annihilated during the Fourth Shinobi World War, the Ootsutsuki clan ruins beneath the Mountains' Graveyard housed a handful of White Zetsu. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Liann

skills.name: Wind Blast
skills.description: White Zetsu Monster deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, White Zetsu Monster's team will have 5 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Lightning Blast
skills.description: White Zetsu Monster deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any enemy who uses a new skill on White Zetsu Monster will take 10 piercing damage.

skills.name: Flame Blast
skills.description: White Zetsu Monster deals 50 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, White Zetsu Monster will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Impervious Skin
skills.description: This skill makes White Zetsu Monster invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Achievement: Three-Element Blast
skills.description: If White Zetsu Monster uses 'Wind Blast', 'Lightning Blast' or 'Flame Blast' while the other 2 are both active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Three-Element Blast': White Zetsu Monster's skills are removed from him. For 1 turn, if used, 'Wind Blast', 'Lightning Blast' and 'Flame Blast' will also apply the other 2 mentioned skills on the enemy target.
